2014-03-11.name: Ancestral Healing
2014-03-11.text: Restore a minion\nto full Health and\ngive it Taunt.
2014-03-11.flavor: I personally prefer some non-ancestral right-the-heck-now healing, but maybe that is just me.

2014-03-11.name: Backstab
2014-03-11.text: Deal $2 damage to an undamaged minion.
2014-03-11.flavor: It's funny how often yelling "Look over there!" gets your opponent to turn around.

2014-03-11.name: Innervate
2014-03-11.text: Gain 1 Mana Crystal this turn only.
2014-03-11.flavor: Some druids still have flashbacks from strangers yelling "Innervate me!!" at them.

2014-03-11.name: Moonfire
2014-03-11.flavor: "Cast Moonfire, and never stop." - How to Be a Druid, Chapter 5, Section 3

2014-03-11.name: Power Word: Shield
2014-03-11.flavor: Sure the extra protection is nice, but the shield really reduces visibility.

2014-03-11.name: Sacrificial Pact
2014-03-11.text: Destroy a friendly Demon. Restore #5 Health to your hero.
2014-03-11.flavor: This is the reason that Demons never really become friends with Warlocks.

2014-03-11.name: Totemic Might
2014-03-11.flavor: Totem-stomping is no longer recommended.

2014-03-11.name: Arcane Missiles
2014-03-11.text: Deal $3 damage randomly split among all enemies.
2014-03-11.flavor: You'd think you'd be able to control your missiles a little better since you're a powerful mage and all.

2014-03-11.name: Arcane Shot
2014-03-11.flavor: Magi conjured arcane arrows to sell to hunters, until hunters learned just enough magic to do it themselves.  The resulting loss of jobs sent Stormwind into a minor recession.

2014-03-11.name: Blessing of Might
2014-03-11.flavor: "As in, you MIGHT want to get out of my way." - Toad Mackle, recently buffed.

2014-03-11.name: Charge
2014-03-11.text: Give a friendly minion Charge. It can't attack heroes this turn.
2014-03-11.flavor: "Guys! Guys! Slow down!" - some kind of non-warrior minion

2014-03-11.name: Claw
2014-03-11.text: Give your hero +2_Attack this turn. Gain 2 Armor.
2014-03-11.flavor: The claw decides who will stay and who will go.

2014-03-11.name: Corruption
2014-03-11.text: Choose an enemy minion. At the start of your turn, destroy it.
2014-03-11.flavor: It starts with stealing a pen from work, and before you know it, BOOOM!  Corrupted!

2014-03-11.name: Deadly Poison
2014-03-11.flavor: Rogues guard the secrets to poison-making carefully, lest magi start incorporating poison into their spells.  Poisonbolt? Rain of Poison?  Poison Elemental?  Nobody wants that.

2014-03-11.name: Elven Archer
2014-03-11.flavor: Don't bother asking her out on a date.  She'll shoot you down.

2014-03-11.name: Frost Shock
2014-03-11.text: Deal $1 damage to an enemy character and Freeze it.
2014-03-11.flavor: FROST SHOCK!

2014-03-11.name: Goldshire Footman
2014-03-11.flavor: If 1/2 minions are all that is defending Goldshire, you would think it would have been overrun years ago.

2014-03-11.name: Grimscale Oracle
2014-03-11.flavor: These are the brainy murlocs.  It turns out that doesn’t mean much.

2014-03-11.name: Hand of Protection
2014-03-11.flavor: This spell has been renamed so many times, even paladins don’t know what it should be called anymore.

2014-03-11.name: Holy Smite
2014-03-11.flavor: It doesn't matter how pious you are.  Everyone needs a good smiting now and again.

2014-03-11.name: Humility
2014-03-11.flavor: This card makes something really damp.  Oh wait.  That's "Humidity."

2014-03-11.name: Light's Justice
2014-03-11.flavor: Prince Malchezaar was a collector of rare weapons. He'd animate them and have them dance for him.

2014-03-11.name: Mind Vision
2014-03-11.text: Put a copy of a random card in your opponent's hand into your hand.
2014-03-11.flavor: I see what you did there.

2014-03-11.name: Mirror Image
2014-03-11.flavor: Oh hey it's Mirror Image! !egamI rorriM s'ti yeh hO

2014-03-11.name: Mortal Coil
2014-03-11.text: Deal $1 damage to a minion. If that kills it, draw a card.
2014-03-11.flavor: If your spells look like horrifying skulls, let's be honest, you should get to draw some cards.

2014-03-11.name: Murloc Raider
2014-03-11.flavor: Mrrraggglhlhghghlgh, mrgaaag blarrghlgaahahl mrgggg glhalhah a bghhll graggmgmg Garrosh mglhlhlh mrghlhlhl!!

2014-03-11.name: Psychic Conjurer
2014-03-11.text: Battlecry: Copy a card in your opponent’s deck and add it to your hand.
2014-03-11.flavor: "I see... a WISP? Why do you have a wisp?!"

2014-03-11.name: Radiance
2014-03-11.flavor: Because you're worth it!

2014-03-11.name: Shadowhoof Slayer
2014-03-11.flavor: Was a humble Elven Archer before Sargeras got to him.

2014-03-11.name: Sinister Strike
2014-03-11.flavor: There's something about this strike that just feels off.  Sinister, even.

2014-03-11.name: Soulfire
2014-03-11.flavor: Are you lighting a soul on fire? Or burning someone with your OWN soul? This seems like an important distinction.

2014-03-11.name: Stonetusk Boar
2014-03-11.flavor: This card is boaring.

2014-03-11.name: Timber Wolf
2014-03-11.flavor: Other beasts totally dig hanging out with timber wolves.

2014-03-11.name: Tracking
2014-03-11.text: Look at the top 3 cards of your deck. Draw one and discard the_others.
2014-03-11.flavor: For the person who just cannot decide what card to put into a deck!

2014-03-11.name: Voidwalker
2014-03-11.flavor: No relation to "The Voidsteppers", the popular Void-based dance troupe.

2014-03-11.name: Voodoo Doctor
2014-03-11.flavor: Voodoo is an oft-misunderstood art. But it is art.

2014-03-11.name: Whirlwind
2014-03-11.flavor: The way to tell seasoned warriors from novice ones: the novices yell "wheeeee" while whirlwinding.

2014-03-11.name: Acidic Swamp Ooze
2014-03-11.flavor: Oozes love Flamenco.  Don't ask.

2014-03-11.name: Arcane Explosion
2014-03-11.text: Deal $1 damage to all enemy minions.
2014-03-11.flavor: This spell is much better than Arcane Implosion.

2014-03-11.name: Bloodfen Raptor
2014-03-11.flavor: "Kill 30 raptors." - Hemet Nesingwary

2014-03-11.name: Bluegill Warrior
2014-03-11.flavor: He just wants a hug.   A sloppy... slimy... hug.

2014-03-11.name: Chaos Strike
2014-03-11.text: Give your hero +2_Attack this turn. Draw a card.
2014-03-11.flavor: "What do we want?" "CHAOS!"\n "When do we want it?"\n "WHEN LEAST EXPECTED!"

2014-03-11.name: Cleave
2014-03-11.flavor: Hey you two…could you stand next to each other for a second…

2014-03-11.name: Execute
2014-03-11.flavor: It's okay, he deserved it.

2014-03-11.name: Felstalker
2014-03-11.flavor: This puppy chews up cards instead of shoes.

2014-03-11.name: Frostbolt
2014-03-11.text: Deal $3 damage to a_character and Freeze it.
2014-03-11.flavor: It is customary to yell "Chill out!" or "Freeze!" or "Ice ice, baby!" when you play this card.

2014-03-11.name: Frostwolf Grunt
2014-03-11.flavor: Grunting is what his father did and his father before that.   It's more than just a job.

2014-03-11.name: Heroic Strike
2014-03-11.flavor: Really, if you're a hero, this is every strike.

2014-03-11.name: Holy Light
2014-03-11.flavor: If you are often bathed in Holy Light, you should consider wearing sunscreen.

2014-03-11.name: Hunter's Mark
2014-03-11.flavor: Never play 'Hide and Go Seek' with a Hunter.

2014-03-11.name: Kobold Geomancer
2014-03-11.flavor: In the old days, Kobolds were the finest candle merchants in the land. Then they got pushed too far...

2014-03-11.name: Mark of the Wild
2014-03-11.text: Give a minion Taunt and +2/+2.\n(+2 Attack/+2 Health)
2014-03-11.flavor: Not to be confused with Jim of the Wild.

2014-03-11.name: Murloc Tidehunter
2014-03-11.flavor: "Death will rise, from the tides!"

2014-03-11.name: Novice Engineer
2014-03-11.flavor: "Half of this class will not graduate… since they'll have been turned to chickens." - Tinkmaster Overspark, teaching Gizmos 101.

2014-03-11.name: River Crocolisk
2014-03-11.flavor: Edward "Lefty" Smith tried to make luggage out of a river crocolisk once.

2014-03-11.name: Rockbiter Weapon
2014-03-11.text: Give a friendly character +3 Attack this turn.
2014-03-11.flavor: This would be real handy if your enemy is made of rock.

2014-03-11.name: Sap
2014-03-11.text: Return an enemy minion to your opponent's hand.
2014-03-11.flavor: Rogues love sappy movies.

2014-03-11.name: Shadow Word: Death
2014-03-11.text: Destroy a minion with 5_or more Attack.
2014-03-11.flavor: If you miss, it leaves a lightning-bolt-shaped scar on your target.

2014-03-11.name: Shadow Word: Pain
2014-03-11.text: Destroy a minion with 3_or less Attack.
2014-03-11.flavor: A step up from a spell cast by many beginning acolytes: "Shadow Word: Annoy".

2014-03-11.name: Shiv
2014-03-11.flavor: Rogues are experts at SHIV-al-ry.

2014-03-11.name: Sightless Watcher
2014-03-11.text: Battlecry: Look at 3 cards in your deck. Choose one to put on top.
2014-03-11.flavor: What he lacks in sight, he makes up for in sleight-of-tentacle tricks.

2014-03-11.name: Windfury
2014-03-11.flavor: Windfury is like Earthfury and Firefury, but more light and airy.

2014-03-11.name: Aldrachi Warblades
2014-03-11.flavor: The ancient Aldrachi were the greatest warriors in the universe. Imagine their power if they'd put the handle at the END of the blade.

2014-03-11.name: Animal Companion
2014-03-11.flavor: You could summon Misha, Leokk, or Huffer!  Huffer is more trouble than he's worth.

2014-03-11.name: Arcane Intellect
2014-03-11.flavor: Playing this card makes you SMARTER.  And let's face it: we could all stand to be a little smarter.

2014-03-11.name: Coordinated Strike
2014-03-11.flavor: Undisputed champions of "Dancing with the Satyrs."

2014-03-11.name: Dalaran Mage
2014-03-11.flavor: You don't see a lot of Dalaran warriors.

2014-03-11.name: Drain Life
2014-03-11.text: Deal $2 damage. Restore #2 Health to your hero.
2014-03-11.flavor: "I've just sucked one year of your life away."

2014-03-11.name: Fan of Knives
2014-03-11.text: Deal $1 damage to all enemy minions. Draw_a card.
2014-03-11.flavor: I wouldn't say I LOVE knives, but I'm definitely a fan.

2014-03-11.name: Fiery War Axe
2014-03-11.flavor: During times of tranquility and harmony, this weapon was called by its less popular name, Chilly Peace Axe.

2014-03-11.name: Flametongue Totem
2014-03-11.flavor: Totemsmiths like to use the rarest woods for their totems.  There are even rumors of totems made of Ironbark Protectors.

2014-03-11.name: Frost Nova
2014-03-11.flavor: Hey man, that's cold.  Literally and metaphorically.

2014-03-11.name: Healing Touch
2014-03-11.flavor: 8 Health, no waiting.

2014-03-11.name: Ironforge Rifleman
2014-03-11.flavor: "Ready! Aim! Drink!"

2014-03-11.name: Ironfur Grizzly
2014-03-11.flavor: "Bear Carcass 1/10"

2014-03-11.name: Kill Command
2014-03-11.text: Deal $3 damage. If you control a Beast, deal\n$5 damage instead.
2014-03-11.flavor: "Kill!", he commanded.

2014-03-11.name: Magma Rager
2014-03-11.flavor: He likes to think he is powerful, but pretty much anyone can solo Molten Core now.

2014-03-11.name: Raid Leader
2014-03-11.flavor: "That's a 50 DKP minus!"

2014-03-11.name: Razorfen Hunter
2014-03-11.flavor: Someone did mess with Tuskerr once.  ONCE.

2014-03-11.name: Satyr Overseer
2014-03-11.text: After your hero attacks, summon a 2/2 Satyr.
2014-03-11.flavor: What he lacks in communication skills, he makes up for with highly responsive staffing allocations.

2014-03-11.name: Savage Roar
2014-03-11.flavor: What do they roar? Nobody can quite tell, but it sounds like "Elephant Macho Breeze".  It's probably not that, though.

2014-03-11.name: Shadow Bolt
2014-03-11.flavor: It’s a Bolt.   It's made out of Shadow.   What more do you need to know!

2014-03-11.name: Shattered Sun Cleric
2014-03-11.flavor: They always have a spare flask of Sunwell Energy Drink™!

2014-03-11.name: Shield Block
2014-03-11.flavor: Shields were invented because Face Block is USELESS.

2014-03-11.name: Silverback Patriarch
2014-03-11.flavor: He likes to act like he's in charge, but the silverback matriarch actually runs things.

2014-03-11.name: Soul Cleave
2014-03-11.text: Lifesteal\nDeal $2 damage to two random enemy minions.
2014-03-11.flavor: The way to a demon's soul is through its stomach.

2014-03-11.name: Warsong Commander
2014-03-11.flavor: The Warsong clan is such drama. It's really not worth it to become a commander.

2014-03-11.name: Wild Growth
2014-03-11.flavor: Grow your own mana crystals with this Mana Crystal Growth Kit, only 39.99!

2014-03-11.name: Wolfrider
2014-03-11.flavor: Orcish raiders ride wolves because they are well adapted to harsh environments, and because they are soft and cuddly.

2014-03-11.name: Blessing of Kings
2014-03-11.flavor: Given the number of kings who have been assassinated, are you sure you want their blessing?

2014-03-11.name: Chillwind Yeti
2014-03-11.flavor: He always dreamed of coming down from the mountains and opening a noodle shop, but he never got the nerve.

2014-03-11.name: Consecration
2014-03-11.flavor: Consecrated ground glows with Holy energy.  But it smells a little, too.

2014-03-11.name: Dragonling Mechanic
2014-03-11.flavor: She is still working on installing the rocket launcher add-on for Mr. Bitey.

2014-03-11.name: Fireball
2014-03-11.flavor: This spell is useful for burning things.  If you're looking for spells that toast things, or just warm them a little, you're in the wrong place.

2014-03-11.name: Gnomish Inventor
2014-03-11.flavor: She's never quite sure what she's making, she just knows it's AWESOME!

2014-03-11.name: Hammer of Wrath
2014-03-11.flavor: A good paladin has many tools.  Hammer of Wrath, Pliers of Vengeance, Hacksaw of Justice, etc.

2014-03-11.name: Hellfire
2014-03-11.flavor: It's spells like these that make it hard for Warlocks to get decent help.

2014-03-11.name: Hex
2014-03-11.text: Transform a minion into a 0/1 Frog with Taunt.
2014-03-11.flavor: If you Hex a Murloc... it really isn't much of a change, is it?

2014-03-11.name: Holy Nova
2014-03-11.text: Deal $2 damage to all enemy minions. Restore #2 Health to all friendly characters.
2014-03-11.flavor: If the Holy Light forsakes you, good luck casting this spell.  Also, you're probably a jerk.

2014-03-11.name: Houndmaster
2014-03-11.flavor: "Who let the dogs out?" he asks.  It's rhetorical.

2014-03-11.name: Kor'kron Elite
2014-03-11.flavor: The Kor'kron are the elite forces of Garrosh Hellscream. Let's just say you don't want to run into these guys while wearing a blue tabard.

2014-03-11.name: Multi-Shot
2014-03-11.text: Deal $3 damage to two random enemy minions.
2014-03-11.flavor: You see, it's all about throughput.

2014-03-11.name: Oasis Snapjaw
2014-03-11.flavor: His dreams of flying and breathing fire like his idol will never be realized.

2014-03-11.name: Ogre Magi
2014-03-11.flavor: Training Ogres in the art of spellcasting is a questionable decision.

2014-03-11.name: Plaguebringer
2014-03-11.flavor: One sip and you've got the grippe.

2014-03-11.name: Polymorph
2014-03-11.flavor: There was going to be a pun in this flavor text, but it just came out baa-d.

2014-03-11.name: Power Infusion
2014-03-11.flavor: It infuses, it enthuses, it amuses!

2014-03-11.name: Sen'jin Shieldmasta
2014-03-11.flavor: Sen'jin Village is nice, if you like trolls and dust.

2014-03-11.name: Stormwind Knight
2014-03-11.flavor: They're still embarrassed about "The Deathwing Incident".

2014-03-11.name: Swipe
2014-03-11.text: Deal $4 damage to an enemy and $1 damage to all other enemies.
2014-03-11.flavor: When a bear rears back and extends his arms, he's about to Swipe!  ... or hug.

2014-03-11.name: Truesilver Champion
2014-03-11.text: Whenever your hero attacks, restore #2_Health to it.
2014-03-11.flavor: It Slices, it Dices. You can cut a tin can with it. (But you wouldn't want to.)

2014-03-11.name: Water Elemental
2014-03-11.text: Freeze any character damaged by this minion.
2014-03-11.flavor: Don't summon a water elemental at a party.  It'll dampen the mood.

2014-03-11.name: Windspeaker
2014-03-11.flavor: Is there anything worse than a Windspeaker with halitosis?

2014-03-11.name: Arcanite Reaper
2014-03-11.flavor: No… actually you should fear the Reaper.

2014-03-11.name: Assassin's Blade
2014-03-11.flavor: Guaranteed to have been owned by a real assassin.   Certificate of authenticity included.

2014-03-11.name: Assassinate
2014-03-11.flavor: If you don't want to be assassinated, move to the Barrens and change your name. Good luck!

2014-03-11.name: Bloodlust
2014-03-11.flavor: blaarghghLLGHRHARAAHAHHH!!

2014-03-11.name: Booty Bay Bodyguard
2014-03-11.flavor: You can hire him... until someone offers him enough gold to turn on you.

2014-03-11.name: Chaos Nova
2014-03-11.flavor: Illin' Illidan laying down the damage, flinging out the chaos as far as he can manage.

2014-03-11.name: Darkscale Healer
2014-03-11.text: Battlecry: Restore #2 Health to all friendly characters.
2014-03-11.flavor: Healing is just something she does in her free time.  It's more of a hobby really.

2014-03-11.name: Frostwolf Warlord
2014-03-11.text: Battlecry: Gain +1/+1 for each other friendly minion on the battlefield.
2014-03-11.flavor: The Frostwolves are locked in combat with the Stormpike Expedition over control of Alterac Valley.  Every attempt at peace-talks has ended with Captain Galvangar killing the mediator.

2014-03-11.name: Glaivebound Adept
2014-03-11.text: Battlecry: If your hero attacked this turn,\ndeal 4 damage.
2014-03-11.flavor: "Initiate, this is your glaive. Think of it as an extension of yourself... Did you just throw it?!"

2014-03-11.name: Gurubashi Berserker
2014-03-11.text: Whenever this minion takes damage, gain +3_Attack.
2014-03-11.flavor: No Pain, No Gain.

2014-03-11.name: Nightblade
2014-03-11.flavor: Your face is the place you'd probably least like a dagger, and where rogues are most likely to deliver them.

2014-03-11.name: Starving Buzzard
2014-03-11.text: Whenever you summon a Beast, draw a card.
2014-03-11.flavor: If you feed him, he loses his whole identity.

2014-03-11.name: Stormpike Commando
2014-03-11.flavor: The Stormpike Commandos are demolition experts.  They also bake a mean cupcake.

2014-03-11.name: Tundra Rhino
2014-03-11.flavor: Tundra rhinos are often mistaken for kodos.  Or am I mistaken?

2014-03-11.name: Archmage
2014-03-11.flavor: You earn the title of Archmage when you can destroy anyone who calls you on it.

2014-03-11.name: Boulderfist Ogre
2014-03-11.flavor: "ME HAVE GOOD STATS FOR THE COST"

2014-03-11.name: Dread Infernal
2014-03-11.text: Battlecry: Deal 1 damage to ALL other characters.
2014-03-11.flavor: "INFERNOOOOOOOOOO!" - Jaraxxus, Eredar Lord of the Burning Legion

2014-03-11.name: Fire Elemental
2014-03-11.flavor: He can never take a bath. Ewww.

2014-03-11.name: Lord of the Arena
2014-03-11.flavor: He used to be a 2100+ rated arena player, but that was years ago and nobody can get him to shut up about it.

2014-03-11.name: Reckless Rocketeer
2014-03-11.flavor: One Insane Rocketeer.   One Rocket full of Explosives.   Infinite Fun.

2014-03-11.name: Starfire
2014-03-11.flavor: Balance is important to druids.  This card is perfectly balanced.

2014-03-11.name: Core Hound
2014-03-11.flavor: You don’t tame a Core Hound. You just train it to eat someone else before it eats you.

2014-03-11.name: Flamestrike
2014-03-11.text: Deal $4 damage to all enemy minions.
2014-03-11.flavor: When the ground is on fire, you should not stop, drop, and roll.

2014-03-11.name: Guardian of Kings
2014-03-11.flavor: Holy beings from the beyond are so cliché!

2014-03-11.name: Sprint
2014-03-11.flavor: Rogues are not good joggers.

2014-03-11.name: Stormwind Champion
2014-03-11.flavor: When Deathwing assaulted the capital, this soldier was the only member of his squad to survive. Now he's all bitter and stuff.

2014-03-11.name: War Golem
2014-03-11.flavor: Golems are not afraid, but for some reason they still run when you cast Fear on them.  Instinct, maybe?  A desire to blend in?

2014-03-11.name: Inner Demon
2014-03-11.flavor: Critical component of any tragic backstory.

2014-03-11.name: Ironbark Protector
2014-03-11.flavor: I dare you to attack Darnassus.

2014-03-11.name: Mind Control
2014-03-11.text: Take control of an enemy minion.
2014-03-11.flavor: Nominated as "Spell Most Likely to Make Your Opponent Punch the Wall."

2014-03-11.name: Circle of Healing
2014-03-11.flavor: It isn't really a circle.

2014-03-11.name: Inner Rage
2014-03-11.text: Deal $1 damage to a minion and give it +2_Attack.
2014-03-11.flavor: They're only smiling on the outside.

2014-03-11.name: Preparation
2014-03-11.text: The next spell you cast this turn costs (2) less.
2014-03-11.flavor: "Be Prepared" - Rogue Motto

2014-03-11.name: Shadowstep
2014-03-11.text: Return a friendly minion to your hand. It_costs (2) less.
2014-03-11.flavor: Rogue dance troops will sometimes Shadowstep away at the end of a performance.  Crowds love it.

2014-03-11.name: Silence
2014-03-11.flavor: Reserved for enemy spellcasters, evil liches from beyond the grave, and karaoke nights at the Grim Guzzler.

2014-03-11.name: Wisp
2014-03-11.flavor: If you hit an Eredar Lord with enough Wisps, it will explode.   But why?

2014-03-11.name: Abusive Sergeant
2014-03-11.flavor: ADD ME TO YOUR DECK, MAGGOT!

2014-03-11.name: Angry Chicken
2014-03-11.flavor: There is no beast more frightening (or ridiculous) than a fully enraged chicken.

2014-03-11.name: Argent Squire
2014-03-11.flavor: "I solemnly swear to uphold the Light, purge the world of darkness, and to eat only burritos." - The Argent Dawn Oath

2014-03-11.name: Bestial Wrath
2014-03-11.text: Give a friendly Beast +2 Attack and Immune this turn.
2014-03-11.flavor: The seething wrath is just beneath the surface.  Beneath that is wild abandon, followed by slight annoyance.

2014-03-11.name: Blessing of Wisdom
2014-03-11.text: Choose a minion. Whenever it attacks, draw a card.
2014-03-11.flavor: Apparently with wisdom comes the knowledge that you should probably be attacking every turn.

2014-03-11.name: Blood Imp
2014-03-11.text: [x] Stealth. At the end of your \nturn, give another random\n friendly minion +1 Health.
2014-03-11.flavor: Imps are content to hide and viciously taunt everyone nearby.

2014-03-11.name: Bloodsail Corsair
2014-03-11.flavor: Every pirate uses the same four digits to access Automated Gold Dispensers.  It's called the "Pirate's Code".

2014-03-11.name: Call of the Void
2014-03-11.text: Add a random Demon to your hand.
2014-03-11.flavor:
"Marco!"
"Polo!"
"Marco!"
"Who dares summon me?!"

2014-03-11.name: Dust Devil
2014-03-11.flavor: Westfall is full of dust devils. And buzzards. And crazed golems. And pirates. Why does anyone live here?

2014-03-11.name: Earth Shock
2014-03-11.text: Silence a minion, then deal $1 damage to it.
2014-03-11.flavor: Earth Shock? Shouldn't it be "Azeroth Shock"?

2014-03-11.name: Eye for an Eye
2014-03-11.text: Secret: When your hero takes damage, deal_that much damage to the enemy hero.
2014-03-11.flavor: Justice sometimes takes the form of a closed fist into a soft cheek.

2014-03-11.name: Flame Imp
2014-03-11.flavor: Imps like being on fire.  They just do.

2014-03-11.name: Forked Lightning
2014-03-11.flavor: If you combine it with Spooned Lightning and Knived Lightning, you have the full dining set.

2014-03-11.name: Hungry Crab
2014-03-11.flavor: Murloc.  It's what's for dinner.

2014-03-11.name: Inner Fire
2014-03-11.text: Change a minion's Attack to be equal to its Health.
2014-03-11.flavor: Good idea: Buffing your minions.  Bad idea: Starting a conversation in the Barrens.

2014-03-11.name: Leper Gnome
2014-03-11.flavor: He really just wants to be your friend, but the constant rejection is starting to really get to him.

2014-03-11.name: Lightning Bolt
2014-03-11.flavor: Lightning Bolt! Lightning Bolt! Lightning Bolt!

2014-03-11.name: Lightwarden
2014-03-11.text: Whenever a character is healed, gain +2 Attack.
2014-03-11.flavor: She’s smaller than her sisters Mediumwarden and Heavywarden.

2014-03-11.name: Murloc Tidecaller
2014-03-11.text: Whenever you summon a Murloc, gain +1 Attack.
2014-03-11.flavor: This guy gets crazy strong at family reunions.

2014-03-11.name: Noble Sacrifice
2014-03-11.text: Secret: When an enemy attacks, summon a 2/1 Defender as the new target.
2014-03-11.flavor: We will always remember you, "Defender!"

2014-03-11.name: Pilfer
2014-03-11.text: Add a random card from another class to_your hand.
2014-03-11.flavor: The class is always greener on the other side of the board.

2014-03-11.name: Redemption
2014-03-11.text: Secret: When a friendly minion dies, return it to life with 1 Health.
2014-03-11.flavor: I am not sure how you get demptioned the first time.  It’s a mystery!

2014-03-11.name: Repentance
2014-03-11.text: Secret: After your opponent plays a minion, reduce its Health to 1.
2014-03-11.flavor: Repentance often comes in the moment before obliteration. Curious.

2014-03-11.name: Savagery
2014-03-11.text: Deal damage equal to your hero's Attack to a minion.
2014-03-11.flavor: It is true that some druids are savage, but others still enjoy a quiet moment and a spot of tea.

2014-03-11.name: Scarlet Subjugator
2014-03-11.text: Battlecry: Give an enemy minion -2 Attack until your_next turn.
2014-03-11.flavor: At the Scarlet Monastery, he learned the sacred art of kicking people when they're up.

2014-03-11.name: Secretkeeper
2014-03-11.flavor: Where is Mankrik’s wife? She’ll never tell.

2014-03-11.name: Shield Slam
2014-03-11.text: Deal 1 damage to a minion for each Armor you have.
2014-03-11.flavor: "What is a better weapon? The sharp one your enemies expect, or the blunt one they ignore?" - The Art of Warrior, Chapter 9

2014-03-11.name: Shieldbearer
2014-03-11.flavor: Have you seen the size of the shields in this game??  This is no easy job.

2014-03-11.name: Southsea Deckhand
2014-03-11.text: Has Charge while you have a weapon equipped.
2014-03-11.flavor: Pirates are into this new fad called "Planking".

2014-03-11.name: Tome of Intellect
2014-03-11.text: Add a random Mage spell to your hand.
2014-03-11.flavor: Just a compilation of napkins of intellect.

2014-03-11.name: Upgrade!
2014-03-11.text: If you have a weapon, give it +1/+1. Otherwise equip a 1/3 weapon.
2014-03-11.flavor: Easily worth 50 DKP.

2014-03-11.name: Worgen Infiltrator
2014-03-11.flavor: If you want to stop a worgen from infiltrating, just yell, "No! Bad boy!"

2014-03-11.name: Young Dragonhawk
2014-03-11.flavor: They were the inspiration for the championship Taurenball team: The Dragonhawks.

2014-03-11.name: Young Priestess
2014-03-11.text: At the end of your turn, give another random friendly minion +1 Health.
2014-03-11.flavor: She can't wait to learn Power Word: Fortitude Rank 2.

2014-03-11.name: Amani Berserker
2014-03-11.flavor: If an Amani berserker asks "Joo lookin' at me?!", the correct response is "Nah, mon".

2014-03-11.name: Ancestral Spirit
2014-03-11.text: Give a minion "Deathrattle: Resummon this minion."
2014-03-11.flavor: It was just a flesh wound.

2014-03-11.name: Ancient Watcher
2014-03-11.flavor: Why do its eyes seem to follow you as you walk by?

2014-03-11.name: Argent Protector
2014-03-11.flavor: "I'm not saying you can dodge fireballs.  I'm saying with this shield, you won't have to."

2014-03-11.name: Armorsmith
2014-03-11.text: Whenever a friendly minion_takes damage, gain 1 Armor.
2014-03-11.flavor: She accepts guild funds for repairs!

2014-03-11.name: Battle Rage
2014-03-11.text: Draw a card for each damaged friendly character.
2014-03-11.flavor: "You won't like me when I'm angry."

2014-03-11.name: Betrayal
2014-03-11.text: Force an enemy minion to deal its damage to the minions next to it.
2014-03-11.flavor: Everyone has a price. Gnomes, for example, can be persuaded by stuffed animals and small amounts of chocolate.

2014-03-11.name: Bloodmage Thalnos
2014-03-11.flavor: He's in charge of the Annual Scarlet Monastery Blood Drive!

2014-03-11.name: Bloodsail Raider
2014-03-11.text: Battlecry: Gain Attack equal to the Attack\nof your weapon.
2014-03-11.flavor: "I only plunder on days that end in 'y'."

2014-03-11.name: Cold Blood
2014-03-11.text: Give a minion +2 Attack. Combo: +4 Attack instead.
2014-03-11.flavor: "I'm cold blooded, check it and see!"

2014-03-11.name: Commanding Shout
2014-03-11.text: Your minions can't be reduced below 1 Health this turn. Draw a card.
2014-03-11.flavor: "Shout! Shout! Let it all out!" - Advice to warriors-in-training

2014-03-11.name: Crazed Alchemist
2014-03-11.text: Battlecry: Swap the Attack and Health of a minion.
2014-03-11.flavor: "You'll love my new recipe!" he says... especially if you're not happy with your current number of limbs.

2014-03-11.name: Cruel Taskmaster
2014-03-11.text: Battlecry: Deal 1 damage to a minion and give it +2_Attack.
2014-03-11.flavor: "I'm going to need you to come in on Sunday." - Cruel Taskmaster

2014-03-11.name: Defias Ringleader
2014-03-11.flavor: He stole the deed to town years ago, so technically the town is his. He just calls people Scrub to be mean.

2014-03-11.name: Demonfire
2014-03-11.text: Deal $2 damage to a minion. If it’s a friendly Demon, give it +2/+2 instead.
2014-03-11.flavor: Demonfire is like regular fire except for IT NEVER STOPS BURNING HELLLPPP

2014-03-11.name: Dire Wolf Alpha
2014-03-11.flavor: We are pretty excited about the upcoming release of Dire Wolf Beta, just repost this sign for a chance at a key.

2014-03-11.name: Doomsayer
2014-03-11.text: At the start of your turn, destroy ALL minions.
2014-03-11.flavor: He's almost been right so many times. He was sure it was coming during the Cataclysm.

2014-03-11.name: Eviscerate
2014-03-11.flavor: There is a high cost to Eviscerating your opponent. You might tweak your elbow! That really hurts!

2014-03-11.name: Explosive Trap
2014-03-11.text: Secret: When your hero is attacked, deal $2 damage to all enemies.
2014-03-11.flavor: It traps your food AND cooks it for you!

2014-03-11.name: Faerie Dragon
2014-03-11.text: Can't be targeted by spells or Hero Powers.
2014-03-11.flavor: Adorable.  Immune to Magic.  Doesn't pee on the rug.  The perfect pet!

2014-03-11.name: Flare
2014-03-11.text: All minions lose Stealth. Destroy all enemy Secrets. Draw a card.
2014-03-11.flavor: Not only does it reveal your enemies, but it's also great for parties!

2014-03-11.name: Freezing Trap
2014-03-11.text: Secret: When an enemy minion attacks, return it to its owner's hand. It costs (2) more.
2014-03-11.flavor: "Dang, that's cold." - appropriate response to Freezing Trap, or a mean joke.

2014-03-11.name: Icicle
2014-03-11.text: Deal $2 damage to a minion. If it's Frozen, draw a card.
2014-03-11.flavor: This may appear weak at frost glance, but it's actually a very ice spell.

2014-03-11.name: Knife Juggler
2014-03-11.text: [x]After you summon a\nminion, deal 1 damage\nto a random enemy.
2014-03-11.flavor: Ambitious Knife Jugglers sometimes graduate to Bomb Jugglers.    They never last long enough to make it onto a card though.

2014-03-11.name: Kul Tiran Chaplain
2014-03-11.flavor: The maritime Kul Tiran clergy are unique among priests for using holy saltwater.

2014-03-11.name: Lightwell
2014-03-11.text: At the start of your turn, restore #3 Health to a damaged friendly character.
2014-03-11.flavor: It isn't clear if people ignore the Lightwell, or if it is just invisible.

2014-03-11.name: Loot Hoarder
2014-03-11.flavor: Always roll need.

2014-03-11.name: Lorewalker Cho
2014-03-11.text: Whenever a player casts a spell, put a copy into the other player’s hand.
2014-03-11.flavor: Lorewalker Cho archives and shares tales from the land of Pandaria, but his favorite story is the one where Joey and Phoebe go on a road trip.

2014-03-11.name: Mad Bomber
2014-03-11.text: Battlecry: Deal 3 damage randomly split between all other characters.
2014-03-11.flavor: He's not really all that crazy, he is just not as careful with explosives as he should be.

2014-03-11.name: Mana Addict
2014-03-11.text: Whenever you cast a spell, gain +2 Attack this turn.
2014-03-11.flavor: She’s trying to kick the habit, but still takes some mana whenever she has a stressful day.

2014-03-11.name: Mana Wraith
2014-03-11.flavor: They come out at night to eat leftover mana crystals. "Mmmmmm," they say.

2014-03-11.name: Mana Wyrm
2014-03-11.text: Whenever you cast a spell, gain +1 Attack.
2014-03-11.flavor: These wyrms feed on arcane energies, and while they are generally considered a nuisance rather than a real threat, you really shouldn't leave them alone with a bucket of mana.

2014-03-11.name: Master Swordsmith
2014-03-11.text: At the end of your turn, give another random friendly minion +1 Attack.
2014-03-11.flavor: He's currently trying to craft a "flail-axe", but all the other swordsmiths say it can't be done.

2014-03-11.name: Millhouse Manastorm
2014-03-11.flavor: "I'm gonna light you up, sweetcheeks!"

2014-03-11.name: Misdirection
2014-03-11.text: Secret: When an enemy attacks your hero, instead it attacks another random character.
2014-03-11.flavor: Sometimes it's as simple as putting on a fake mustache and pointing at someone else.

2014-03-11.name: Nat Pagle
2014-03-11.text: At the start of your turn, you have a 50% chance to draw an extra card.
2014-03-11.flavor: Nat Pagle, Azeroth's premier fisherman!  He invented the Auto-Angler 3000, the Extendo-Pole 3000, and the Lure-o-matic 2099 (still in testing).

2014-03-11.name: Patient Assassin
2014-03-11.flavor: He’s not really that patient. It just takes a while for someone to walk by that he can actually reach.

2014-03-11.name: Pint-Sized Summoner
2014-03-11.text: The first minion you play each turn costs (1) less.
2014-03-11.flavor: She's quite jealous of the Gallon-Sized Summoner.

2014-03-11.name: Power of the Wild
2014-03-11.text: Choose One - Give your minions +1/+1; or Summon a 3/2 Panther.
2014-03-11.flavor: Never look a panther in the eye.  Or is it 'Always look a panther in the eye'?  Well, it's one of those.

2014-03-11.name: Rampage
2014-03-11.flavor: Minion get ANGRY.   Minion SMASH!

2014-03-11.name: Scavenging Hyena
2014-03-11.text: Whenever a friendly Beast dies, gain +2/+1.
2014-03-11.flavor: Hyenas prefer the bones of kodos or windserpents, but they'll eat pretty much anything.  Even Brussels sprouts.

2014-03-11.name: Slam
2014-03-11.text: Deal $2 damage to a minion. If it survives, draw a card.
2014-03-11.flavor: "Dun da dun, dun da dun": if you've heard an ogre sing this, it's too late.

2014-03-11.name: Snake Trap
2014-03-11.text: Secret: When one of your minions is attacked, summon three 1/1 Snakes.
2014-03-11.flavor: Why did it have to be snakes?

2014-03-11.name: Snipe
2014-03-11.text: Secret: After your opponent plays a minion, deal $4 damage to it.
2014-03-11.flavor: A great sniper hits the spot.  Just like a delicious flank of boar. Mmmmm.

2014-03-11.name: Sorcerer's Apprentice
2014-03-11.flavor: Apprentices are great for bossing around.  "Conjure me some mana buns! And a coffee!  Make that a mana coffee!"

2014-03-11.name: Stormforged Axe
2014-03-11.flavor: Yo, that's a nice axe.

2014-03-11.name: Sunfury Protector
2014-03-11.flavor: She carries a shield, but only so she can give it to someone she can stand behind.

2014-03-11.name: Thoughtsteal
2014-03-11.text: Copy 2 cards in your opponent's deck and add them to your hand.
2014-03-11.flavor: "What do you get when you cast Thoughtsteal on an Orc?  Nothing!" - Tauren joke

2014-03-11.name: Wild Pyromancer
2014-03-11.text: After you cast a spell, deal 1 damage to ALL minions.
2014-03-11.flavor: BOOM BABY BOOM!  BAD IS GOOD!  DOWN WITH GOVERNMENT!

2014-03-11.name: Wrath
2014-03-11.text: Choose One -\nDeal $3 damage to a minion; or $1 damage\nand draw a card.
2014-03-11.flavor: The talk around the Ratchet Inn is that this card is too good and should be a Legendary.

2014-03-11.name: Youthful Brewmaster
2014-03-11.text: Battlecry: Return a friendly minion from the battlefield to your hand.
2014-03-11.flavor: His youthful enthusiasm doesn’t always equal excellence in his brews.   Don’t drink the Mogu Stout!

2014-03-11.name: Alarm-o-Bot
2014-03-11.text: [x]At the start of your turn,\nswap this minion with a\n   random one in your hand.
2014-03-11.flavor: WARNING.  WARNING.  WARNING.

2014-03-11.name: Aldor Peacekeeper
2014-03-11.flavor: The Aldor hate two things: the Scryers and smooth jazz.

2014-03-11.name: Arcane Golem
2014-03-11.text: Battlecry: Give your opponent a Mana Crystal.
2014-03-11.flavor: Having Arcane golems at home really classes up the place, and as a bonus they are great conversation pieces.

2014-03-11.name: Blood Knight
2014-03-11.text: Battlecry: All minions lose Divine Shield. Gain +3/+3 for each Shield lost.
2014-03-11.flavor: The Blood Knights get their holy powers from the Sunwell, which you should NOT bathe in.

2014-03-11.name: Brightwing
2014-03-11.text: Battlecry: Add a random Legendary minion to your_hand.
2014-03-11.flavor: Little faerie dragons are made of sugar and spice and maniacal vice.

2014-03-11.name: Coldlight Seer
2014-03-11.flavor: The Coldlight murlocs reside in the darkest pits of the Abyssal Depths.  So no, there's no getting away from murlocs.

2014-03-11.name: Counterspell
2014-03-11.text: Secret: When your opponent casts a spell, Counter it.
2014-03-11.flavor: What's the difference between a mage playing with Counterspell and a mage who isn't?  The mage who isn't is getting Pyroblasted in the face.

2014-03-11.name: Deadly Shot
2014-03-11.flavor: Our ballista operator is effective, but not picky.

2014-03-11.name: Demolisher
2014-03-11.text: At the start of your turn, deal 2 damage to a random enemy.
2014-03-11.flavor: Laying siege isn't fun for anyone.  It's not even all that effective, now that everyone has a flying mount.

2014-03-11.name: Eaglehorn Bow
2014-03-11.flavor: First Lesson: Put the pointy end in the other guy.

2014-03-11.name: Earthen Ring Farseer
2014-03-11.flavor: He can see really far, and he doesn't use a telescope like those filthy pirates.

2014-03-11.name: Edwin VanCleef
2014-03-11.text: Combo: Gain +2/+2 for each other card you've played this turn.
2014-03-11.flavor: He led the Stonemasons in the reconstruction of Stormwind, and when the nobles refused to pay, he founded the Defias Brotherhood to, well, deconstruct Stormwind.

2014-03-11.name: Emperor Cobra
2014-03-11.flavor: The Sholazar Basin is home to a lot of really horrible things. If you're going to visit, wear bug spray.  And plate armor.

2014-03-11.name: Far Sight
2014-03-11.text: Draw a card. That card costs (3) less.
2014-03-11.flavor: Drek'thar can't see, but he can see. You know what I mean? It's ok if you don't.

2014-03-11.name: Felguard
2014-03-11.text: Taunt\nBattlecry: Destroy one of your Mana Crystals.
2014-03-11.flavor: Yes, he'll fight for you.  BUT HE'S NOT GOING TO LIKE IT.

2014-03-11.name: Feral Spirit
2014-03-11.flavor: Spirit wolves are like regular wolves with pom-poms.

2014-03-11.name: Flesheating Ghoul
2014-03-11.text: Whenever a minion dies, gain +1 Attack.
2014-03-11.flavor: 'Flesheating' is an unfair name.  It's just that there's not really much else for him to eat.

2014-03-11.name: Frothing Berserker
2014-03-11.text: Whenever a minion takes damage, gain +1 Attack.
2014-03-11.flavor: He used to work as an accountant before he tried his hand at Berserkering.

2014-03-11.name: Harvest Golem
2014-03-11.flavor: "Overheat threshold exceeded. System failure. Wheat clog in port two. Shutting down."

2014-03-11.name: Headcrack
2014-03-11.text: Deal $2 damage to the enemy hero. Combo: Return this to your hand next turn.
2014-03-11.flavor: When all else fails, nothing beats a swift whack upside the head.

2014-03-11.name: Ice Barrier
2014-03-11.flavor: This is Rank 1.  Rank 2 is Chocolate Milk Barrier.

2014-03-11.name: Imp Master
2014-03-11.text: [x]At the end of your turn, deal\n1 damage to this minion\n and summon a 1/1 Imp.
2014-03-11.flavor: She would enjoy the job a lot more if she just could get the imps to QUIT BITING HER.

2014-03-11.name: Injured Blademaster
2014-03-11.flavor: He claims it is an old war wound, but we think he just cut himself shaving.

2014-03-11.name: Ironbeak Owl
2014-03-11.flavor: Their wings are silent but their screech is... whatever the opposite of silent is.

2014-03-11.name: Jungle Panther
2014-03-11.flavor: Stranglethorn is a beautiful place to visit, but you wouldn't want to live there.

2014-03-11.name: King Mukla
2014-03-11.flavor: King Mukla wanders Jaguero Isle, searching for love.

2014-03-11.name: Kirin Tor Mage
2014-03-11.text: [x]Battlecry: The next Secret\nyou play this turn costs (0).
2014-03-11.flavor: The Kirin Tor reside in the floating city of Dalaran.  How do you make a Dalaran float?  Two scoops of ice cream, one scoop of Dalaran.

2014-03-11.name: Lava Burst
2014-03-11.flavor: It's like an ocean of liquid magma in your mouth!

2014-03-11.name: Lightning Storm
2014-03-11.flavor: An umbrella won't be effective, I'm afraid.

2014-03-11.name: Mana Tide Totem
2014-03-11.text: At the end of your turn, draw a card.
2014-03-11.flavor: It is said that some shaman can say "Floatin' totem" 10 times, fast.

2014-03-11.name: Mark of Nature
2014-03-11.text: Choose One - Give a minion +4 Attack; or +4 Health and Taunt.
2014-03-11.flavor: Druids call it the "Mark of Nature."  Everyone else calls it "needing a bath."

2014-03-11.name: Mirror Entity
2014-03-11.text: Secret: After your opponent plays a minion, summon a copy of it.
2014-03-11.flavor: "You go first." - Krush'gor the Behemoth, to his pet boar.

2014-03-11.name: Murloc Warleader
2014-03-11.flavor: Do Murlocs ever get tired of making the same old sound?  Nope!  Mrglglrglglglglglglgl!

2014-03-11.name: Perdition's Blade
2014-03-11.flavor: Perdition's Blade is Ragnaros's back-up weapon while Sulfuras is in the shop.

2014-03-11.name: Questing Adventurer
2014-03-11.text: Whenever you play a card, gain +1/+1.
2014-03-11.flavor: "Does anyone have some extra Boar Pelts?"

2014-03-11.name: Raging Worgen
2014-03-11.flavor: If he's raging now, just wait until he gets nerfed.

2014-03-11.name: Scarlet Crusader
2014-03-11.flavor: Never wash your whites with a Scarlet Crusader.

2014-03-11.name: Sense Demons
2014-03-11.flavor: Generally demons are pretty obvious and you don’t need a spell to sense them.

2014-03-11.name: Shadow Madness
2014-03-11.text: Gain control of an enemy minion with 3 or less Attack until end of turn.
2014-03-11.flavor: You can rationalize it all you want, it's still a mean thing to do.

2014-03-11.name: SI:7 Agent
2014-03-11.flavor: The agents of SI:7 are responsible for Stormwind's covert activities.  Their duties include espionage, assassination, and throwing surprise birthday parties for the royal family.

2014-03-11.name: Southsea Captain
2014-03-11.flavor: When he saves enough plunder, he's going to commission an enormous captain's hat.  He has hat envy.

2014-03-11.name: Spellbender
2014-03-11.text: Secret: When an enemy casts a spell on a minion, summon a 1/3 as the new target.
2014-03-11.flavor: While it's fun to intercept enemy lightning bolts, a spellbender much prefers to intercept opposing Marks of the Wild.  It just feels meaner.  And blood elves... well, they're a little mean.

2014-03-11.name: Sword of Justice
2014-03-11.text: After you summon a minion, give it +1/+1 and this loses 1_Durability.
2014-03-11.flavor: I dub you Sir Loin of Beef!

2014-03-11.name: Tauren Warrior
2014-03-11.flavor: Tauren Warrior: Champion of Mulgore, Slayer of Quilboar, Rider of Thunderbluff Elevators.

2014-03-11.name: Thrallmar Farseer
2014-03-11.flavor: He's stationed in the Hellfire Peninsula, but he's hoping for a reassignment closer to Orgrimmar, or really anywhere the ground is less on fire.

2014-03-11.name: Tinkmaster Overspark
2014-03-11.text: [x]Battlecry: Transform another random minion into a 5/5 Devilsaur or a 1/1 Squirrel.
2014-03-11.flavor: Tinkmaster Overspark nearly lost his Tinker's license after the Great Ironforge Squirrel Stampede of '09.

2014-03-11.name: Unbound Elemental
2014-03-11.text: Whenever you play a card_with Overload, gain_+1/+1.
2014-03-11.flavor: Unlike bound elementals, Unbound ones really enjoy a night on the town.

2014-03-11.name: Unleash the Hounds
2014-03-11.text: For each enemy minion, summon a 1/1 Hound with Charge.
2014-03-11.flavor: You must read the name of this card out loud each time you play it.

2014-03-11.name: Vaporize
2014-03-11.text: Secret: When a minion attacks your hero, destroy it.
2014-03-11.flavor: Rumor has it that Deathwing brought about the Cataclysm after losing a game to this card.  We may never know the truth.

2014-03-11.name: Void Terror
2014-03-11.text: [x]Battlecry: Destroy both\nadjacent minions and gain\n their Attack and Health.
2014-03-11.flavor: If you put this into your deck, you WILL lose the trust of your other minions.

2014-03-11.name: Ancient Brewmaster
2014-03-11.text: Battlecry: Return a friendly minion from the battlefield to your hand.
2014-03-11.flavor: Most pandaren say his brew tastes like yak.  But apparently that's a compliment.

2014-03-11.name: Ancient Mage
2014-03-11.flavor: Sometimes he forgets and just wanders into someone else's game.

2014-03-11.name: Arathi Weaponsmith
2014-03-11.flavor: 50% off fist weapons, limited time only!

2014-03-11.name: Bite
2014-03-11.text: Give your hero +4_Attack this turn. Gain 4 Armor.
2014-03-11.flavor: Chew your food!

2014-03-11.name: Blade Flurry
2014-03-11.text: Destroy your weapon and deal its damage to all enemy minions.
2014-03-11.flavor: "Look, it's not just about waving daggers around really fast.  It's a lot more complicated than that." - Shan, Rogue Trainer

2014-03-11.name: Cone of Cold
2014-03-11.text: Freeze a minion and the minions next to it, and deal $1 damage to them.
2014-03-11.flavor: Magi of the Kirin Tor were casting Cubes of Cold for many years before Cones came into fashion some 90 years ago.

2014-03-11.name: Cult Master
2014-03-11.text: After a friendly minion dies, draw a card.
2014-03-11.flavor: She may be an evil cult master, but she still calls her parents once a week.

2014-03-11.name: Dark Iron Dwarf
2014-03-11.flavor: Guardians of Dark Iron Ore.  Perhaps the most annoying ore, given where you have to forge it.

2014-03-11.name: Defender of Argus
2014-03-11.flavor: You wouldn’t think that Argus would need this much defending.  But it does.

2014-03-11.name: Dread Corsair
2014-03-11.flavor: "Yarrrr" is a pirate word that means "Greetings, milord."

2014-03-11.name: Equality
2014-03-11.text: Change the Health of ALL minions to 1.
2014-03-11.flavor: We are all special unique snowflakes... with 1 Health.

2014-03-11.name: Ethereal Arcanist
2014-03-11.text: If you control a Secret at_the end of your turn, gain +2/+2.
2014-03-11.flavor: The ethereals are wrapped in cloth to give form to their non-corporeal bodies. Also because it's nice and soft.

2014-03-11.name: Keeper of the Grove
2014-03-11.flavor: These guys just show up and start Keeping your Groves without even asking.

2014-03-11.name: Lightspawn
2014-03-11.text: This minion's Attack is always equal to its Health.
2014-03-11.flavor: Spawn of the Light? Or Pawn of the Lights?

2014-03-11.name: Mass Dispel
2014-03-11.text: Silence all enemy minions. Draw a card.
2014-03-11.flavor: It dispels buffs, powers, hopes, and dreams.

2014-03-11.name: Master of Disguise
2014-03-11.text: Battlecry: Give a friendly minion Stealth until your next turn.
2014-03-11.flavor: She's actually a male tauren.  People don't call him "Master of Disguise" for nothing.

2014-03-11.name: Mindgames
2014-03-11.text: Put a copy of\na random minion from\nyour opponent's deck into the battlefield.
2014-03-11.flavor: Sometimes it feels like this is all a game.

2014-03-11.name: Mogu'shan Warden
2014-03-11.flavor: All these guys ever do is talk about the Thunder King.   BOOOORRRINNG!

2014-03-11.name: Mortal Strike
2014-03-11.text: Deal $4 damage. If you have 12 or less Health, deal $6 instead.
2014-03-11.flavor: "If you only use one ability, use Mortal Strike." - The Warrior Code, Line 6

2014-03-11.name: Pit Lord
2014-03-11.flavor: Mannoroth, Magtheridon, and Brutallus may be dead, but it turns out there are a LOT of pit lords.

2014-03-11.name: Shadow Word: Ruin
2014-03-11.text: Destroy all minions with 5 or more Attack.
2014-03-11.flavor: Discovered by a worgen priest after a giant spilled a drink on her new white robes.

2014-03-11.name: Shadowflame
2014-03-11.text: Destroy a friendly minion and deal its Attack damage to all enemy minions.
2014-03-11.flavor: Start with a powerful minion and stir in Shadowflame and you have a good time!

2014-03-11.name: SI:7 Infiltrator
2014-03-11.flavor: What will she destroy? It’s a secret!

2014-03-11.name: Silvermoon Guardian
2014-03-11.flavor: The first time they tried to guard Silvermoon against the scourge, it didn’t go so well…

2014-03-11.name: Soul of the Forest
2014-03-11.text: Give your minions "Deathrattle: Summon a 2/2 Treant."
2014-03-11.flavor: "Reforestation" is suddenly a terrifying word.

2014-03-11.name: Summoning Portal
2014-03-11.text: Your minions cost (2) less, but not less than (1).
2014-03-11.flavor: NOT LESS THAN 1!  Don't get any ideas!

2014-03-11.name: Twilight Drake
2014-03-11.text: Battlecry: Gain +1 Health for each card in your hand.
2014-03-11.flavor: Twilight drakes feed on Mystical Energy.  And Tacos.

2014-03-11.name: Violet Teacher
2014-03-11.text: Whenever you cast a spell, summon a 1/1 Violet Apprentice.
2014-03-11.flavor: If you don't pay attention, you may be turned into a pig.  And then you get your name on the board.

2014-03-11.name: Abomination
2014-03-11.flavor: Abominations enjoy Fresh Meat and long walks on the beach.

2014-03-11.name: Bane of Doom
2014-03-11.text: Deal $2 damage to_a character. If that kills it, summon a random Demon.
2014-03-11.flavor: My advice to you is to avoid Doom, if possible.

2014-03-11.name: Big Game Hunter
2014-03-11.text: Battlecry: Destroy a minion with 7 or more Attack.
2014-03-11.flavor: Mere devilsaurs no longer excite him.  Soon he'll be trying to catch Onyxia with only a dull Krol Blade.

2014-03-11.name: Blessed Champion
2014-03-11.flavor: This card causes double the trouble AND double the fun.

2014-03-11.name: Brawl
2014-03-11.text: Destroy all minions except one. (chosen randomly)
2014-03-11.flavor: Do you know the first rule of Brawl Club?

2014-03-11.name: Captain Greenskin
2014-03-11.flavor: He was this close to piloting a massive juggernaut into Stormwind Harbor. If it weren't for those pesky kids!

2014-03-11.name: Doomhammer
2014-03-11.flavor: Orgrim Doomhammer gave this legendary weapon to Thrall.  His name is a total coincidence.

2014-03-11.name: Druid of the Claw
2014-03-11.text: [x]Choose One - Transform\ninto a 4/4 with Charge;\nor a 4/6 with Taunt.
2014-03-11.flavor: Cat or Bear?  Cat or Bear?!  I just cannot CHOOSE!

2014-03-11.name: Earth Elemental
2014-03-11.flavor: Nothing beats rock.

2014-03-11.name: Explosive Shot
2014-03-11.text: Deal $5 damage to a minion and $2 damage to adjacent ones.
2014-03-11.flavor: Pull the pin, count to 5, then shoot.  Then duck.

2014-03-11.name: Faceless Manipulator
2014-03-11.text: Battlecry: Choose a minion and become a copy of it.
2014-03-11.flavor: The Faceless Ones are servants of Yogg-Saron, and they feed on fear. Right now they are feeding on your fear of accidentally disenchanting all your good cards.

2014-03-11.name: Fen Creeper
2014-03-11.flavor: He used to be called Bog Beast, but it confused people because he wasn't an actual beast.   Boom, New Name!

2014-03-11.name: Force of Nature
2014-03-11.flavor: "I think I'll just nap under these trees. Wait... AAAAAHHH!" - Blinkfizz, the Unfortunate Gnome

2014-03-11.name: Harrison Jones
2014-03-11.text: Battlecry: Destroy your opponent's weapon and draw cards equal to its Durability.
2014-03-11.flavor: “That belongs in the Hall of Explorers!”

2014-03-11.name: Holy Wrath
2014-03-11.text: Draw a card and deal_damage equal to_its Cost.
2014-03-11.flavor: C'mon Molten Giant!!

2014-03-11.name: Righteousness
2014-03-11.flavor: Shield yourself in righteousness! It feels like a warm fuzzy blanket.

2014-03-11.name: Silver Hand Knight
2014-03-11.flavor: It's good to be a knight.   Less so to be one's squire.

2014-03-11.name: Spiteful Smith
2014-03-11.text: Your weapon has +2 Attack while this is damaged.
2014-03-11.flavor: She'll craft you a sword, but you'll need to bring her 5 Steel Ingots, 3 Motes of Earth, and the scalp of her last customer.

2014-03-11.name: Stampeding Kodo
2014-03-11.text: Battlecry: Destroy a random enemy minion with 2 or less Attack.
2014-03-11.flavor: This Kodo is so big that he can stampede by himself.

2014-03-11.name: Starfall
2014-03-11.text: Choose One -\nDeal $5 damage to a minion; or $2 damage to all enemy minions.
2014-03-11.flavor: Is the sky falling?  Yes.  Yes it is.

2014-03-11.name: Stranglethorn Tiger
2014-03-11.flavor: The wonderful thing about tigers is tigers are wonderful things!

2014-03-11.name: Temple Enforcer
2014-03-11.flavor: He also moonlights Thursday nights as a bouncer at the Pig and Whistle Tavern.

2014-03-11.name: Venture Co. Mercenary
2014-03-11.flavor: No Job is too big.  No fee is too big.

2014-03-11.name: Argent Commander
2014-03-11.flavor: The Argent Dawn stands vigilant against the Scourge, as well as people who cut in line at coffee shops.

2014-03-11.name: Avenging Wrath
2014-03-11.text: Deal $8 damage randomly split among all enemies.
2014-03-11.flavor: Wham! Wham! Wham! Wham! Wham! Wham! Wham! Wham!

2014-03-11.name: Blizzard
2014-03-11.text: Deal $2 damage to all enemy minions and Freeze them.
2014-03-11.flavor: This spell can be very Entertaining.

2014-03-11.name: Cabal Shadow Priest
2014-03-11.text: Battlecry: Take control of an enemy minion that has 2 or less Attack.
2014-03-11.flavor: You never know who may be secretly working for the Cabal....

2014-03-11.name: Cairne Bloodhoof
2014-03-11.flavor: Cairne was killed by Garrosh, so... don't put this guy in a Warrior deck.  It's pretty insensitive.

2014-03-11.name: Frost Elemental
2014-03-11.flavor: When a Water elemental and an Ice elemental love each other VERY much...

2014-03-11.name: Gadgetzan Auctioneer
2014-03-11.text: Whenever you cast a spell, draw a card.
2014-03-11.flavor: He used to run the black market auction house, but there was just too much violence and he had to move.

2014-03-11.name: Hogger
2014-03-11.text: At the end of your turn, summon a 2/2 Gnoll with_Taunt.
2014-03-11.flavor: Hogger is super powerful. If you kill him, it's because he let you.

2014-03-11.name: Kidnapper
2014-03-11.text: Combo: Return a minion to_its owner's hand.
2014-03-11.flavor: He just wants people to see his vacation photos.

2014-03-11.name: Nourish
2014-03-11.text: Choose One - Gain 2_Mana Crystals; or Draw 3 cards.
2014-03-11.flavor: Druids take nourishment from many things: the power of nature, the songbird's chirp, a chocolate cake.

2014-03-11.name: Priestess of Elune
2014-03-11.flavor: If she threatens to "moon" you, it's not what you think.

2014-03-11.name: Savannah Highmane
2014-03-11.flavor: In the jungle, the mighty jungle, the lion gets slowly consumed by hyenas.

2014-03-11.name: Siphon Soul
2014-03-11.text: Destroy a minion. Restore #3 Health to_your hero.
2014-03-11.flavor: You probably should avoid siphoning your own soul.  You might create some kind of weird infinite loop.

2014-03-11.name: Sunwalker
2014-03-11.flavor: She doesn’t ACTUALLY walk on the Sun.  It's just a name.  Don’t worry!

2014-03-11.name: The Beast
2014-03-11.text: Deathrattle: Summon a 3/3 Finkle Einhorn for your opponent.
2014-03-11.flavor: He lives in Blackrock Mountain.  He eats Gnomes.  That's pretty much it.

2014-03-11.name: The Black Knight
2014-03-11.flavor: He was sent by the Lich King to disrupt the Argent Tournament.   We can pretty much mark that a failure.

2014-03-11.name: Windfury Harpy
2014-03-11.flavor: Harpies are not pleasant sounding.  That's the nicest I can put it.

2014-03-11.name: Xavius
2014-03-11.text: After you play a card, summon a 2/1 Satyr.
2014-03-11.flavor: Xavius has grand nightmares of summoning Sargeras into this world, but a few Satyr will have to do for now.

2014-03-11.name: Ancient of Lore
2014-03-11.text: Choose One - Draw a card; or Restore #5 Health.
2014-03-11.flavor: Go ahead, carve your initials in him.

2014-03-11.name: Ancient of War
2014-03-11.flavor: Young Night Elves love to play "Who can get the Ancient of War to Uproot?"  You lose if you get crushed to death.

2014-03-11.name: Archmage Antonidas
2014-03-11.text: Whenever you cast a spell, add a 'Fireball' spell to_your hand.
2014-03-11.flavor: Antonidas was the Grand Magus of the Kirin Tor, and Jaina's mentor.  This was a big step up from being Grand Magus of Jelly Donuts.

2014-03-11.name: Baron Geddon
2014-03-11.text: At the end of your turn, deal 2 damage to ALL other characters.
2014-03-11.flavor: Baron Geddon was Ragnaros's foremost lieutenant, until he got FIRED.

2014-03-11.name: Barrens Stablehand
2014-03-11.flavor: It’s never Huffer.

2014-03-11.name: Gladiator's Longbow
2014-03-11.flavor: The longbow allows shots to be fired from farther away and is useful for firing on particularly odorous targets.

2014-03-11.name: Gorehowl
2014-03-11.text: Attacking a minion costs 1 Attack instead of 1 Durability.
2014-03-11.flavor: Grommash Hellscream's famous axe.  Somehow this ended up in Prince Malchezaar's possession.  Quite the mystery!

2014-03-11.name: High Inquisitor Whitemane
2014-03-11.text: Battlecry: Summon all friendly minions that died_this turn.
2014-03-11.flavor: No one told her that champions want to sleep in.

2014-03-11.name: Ravenholdt Assassin
2014-03-11.flavor: Just mail him a package with a name and 10,000 gold.  He'll take care of the rest.

2014-03-11.name: Siegebreaker
2014-03-11.flavor: Has a side hustle as a siegebroker.

2014-03-11.name: Al'Akir the Windlord
2014-03-11.flavor: He is the weakest of the four Elemental Lords.  And the other three don't let him forget it.

2014-03-11.name: Arcane Devourer
2014-03-11.text: Whenever you cast a spell, gain +2/+2.
2014-03-11.flavor: Likes her magic with a pinch of salt.

2014-03-11.name: Gift of the Wild
2014-03-11.flavor: The gift that keeps on living.

2014-03-11.name: Grommash Hellscream
2014-03-11.flavor: Grommash drank the tainted blood of Mannoroth, dooming the orcs to green skin and red eyes!  Maybe not his best decision.

2014-03-11.name: Gruul
2014-03-11.text: At the end of each turn, gain +1/+1 .
2014-03-11.flavor: He's Gruul "the Dragonkiller".  He just wanted to cuddle them… he never meant to…

2014-03-11.name: Lay on Hands
2014-03-11.flavor: A grammatically awkward life saver.

2014-03-11.name: Natalie Seline
2014-03-11.text: Battlecry: Destroy a minion and gain its Health.
2014-03-11.flavor: She discovered Xal'atath, Blade of the Black Empire, a terrible weapon of shadow magic that could both swallow a soul and cut a mean julienne.

2014-03-11.name: Tirion Fordring
2014-03-11.flavor: If you haven't heard the Tirion Fordring theme song, it's because it doesn't exist.

2014-03-11.name: Twisting Nether
2014-03-11.flavor: The Twisting Nether is a formless place of magic and illusion and destroyed minions.

2014-03-11.name: Alexstrasza
2014-03-11.text: Battlecry: Set a hero's remaining Health to 15.
2014-03-11.flavor: Alexstrasza the Life-Binder brings life and hope to everyone.  Except Deathwing.  And Malygos.  And Nekros.

2014-03-11.name: Cenarius
2014-03-11.text: Choose One - Give your other minions +2/+2; or Summon two 2/2 Treants with Taunt.
2014-03-11.flavor: Yes, he's a demigod. No, he doesn't need to wear a shirt.

2014-03-11.name: King Krush
2014-03-11.flavor: The best defense against King Krush is to have someone you don’t like standing in front of you.

2014-03-11.name: Lord Jaraxxus
2014-03-11.text: Battlecry: Destroy your hero and replace it with Lord Jaraxxus.
2014-03-11.flavor: "TRIFLING GNOME! YOUR ARROGANCE WILL BE YOUR UNDOING!!!!"

2014-03-11.name: Malygos
2014-03-11.flavor: Malygos hates it when mortals use magic.  He gets so mad!

2014-03-11.name: Nozdormu
2014-03-11.text: Players only have 15 seconds to take their_turns.
2014-03-11.flavor: Time to write some flavor text.

2014-03-11.name: Onyxia
2014-03-11.text: Battlecry: Summon 1/1 Whelps until your side of the battlefield is full.
2014-03-11.flavor: Onyxia long manipulated the Stormwind Court by disguising herself as Lady Katrana Prestor.   You would have thought that the giant wings and scales would have been a giveaway.

2014-03-11.name: Ysera
2014-03-11.text: At the end of your turn, add_a Dream Card to_your hand.
2014-03-11.flavor: Ysera rules the Emerald Dream.  Which is some kind of green-mirror-version of the real world, or something?

2014-03-11.name: Deathwing
2014-03-11.text: Battlecry: Destroy all other minions and discard your_hand.
2014-03-11.flavor: Once a noble dragon known as Neltharion, Deathwing lost his mind and shattered Azeroth before finally being defeated.  Daddy issues?

2014-03-11.name: Pyroblast
2014-03-11.flavor: Take the time for an evil laugh after you draw this card.

2014-03-11.name: Sea Giant
2014-03-11.text: Costs (1) less for each other minion on the battlefield.
2014-03-11.flavor: See?  Giant.

2014-07-22.name: Avenge
2014-07-22.text: Secret: When one of your minions dies, give a random friendly minion +3/+2.
2014-07-22.flavor: Several paladins have joined together to deliver justice under the name "Justice Force".  Their lawyer talked them out of calling themselves the Justice League.

2014-07-22.name: Undertaker
2014-07-22.text: Whenever you summon a minion with Deathrattle, gain +1 Attack.
2014-07-22.flavor: In a world where you can run to a spirit healer and resurrect yourself, Undertakers do pretty light business.

2014-07-22.name: Webspinner
2014-07-22.text: Deathrattle: Add a random Beast card to your hand.
2014-07-22.flavor: Spider cocoons are like little piñatas!

2014-07-22.name: Zombie Chow
2014-07-22.text: Deathrattle: Restore #5 Health to the enemy hero.
2014-07-22.flavor: Zombie.  It's what's for dinner.

2014-07-22.name: Echoing Ooze
2014-07-22.text: Battlecry: Summon an exact copy of this minion at the end of the turn.
2014-07-22.flavor: OOZE... Ooze... Ooze... (ooze...)

2014-07-22.name: Haunted Creeper
2014-07-22.text: Deathrattle: Summon two 1/1 Spectral Spiders.
2014-07-22.flavor: Arachnofauxbia: Fear of fake spiders.

2014-07-22.name: Mad Scientist
2014-07-22.text: Deathrattle: Put a Secret from your deck into the battlefield.
2014-07-22.flavor: His mother wanted him to be a mage or a warlock, but noooooooo, he had to go and be a scientist like his father.

2014-07-22.name: Nerub'ar Weblord
2014-07-22.text: Minions with Battlecry cost (2) more.
2014-07-22.flavor: Weblords spend all day making giant trampoline parks.

2014-07-22.name: Nerubian Egg
2014-07-22.text: Deathrattle: Summon a 4/4 Nerubian.
2014-07-22.flavor: Eggs are a good source of protein and Nerubians.

2014-07-22.name: Reincarnate
2014-07-22.text: Destroy a minion, then return it to life with full Health.
2014-07-22.flavor: It's like birth, except you're an adult and you were just dead a second ago.

2014-07-22.name: Unstable Ghoul
2014-07-22.text: Taunt. Deathrattle: Deal 1 damage to all minions.
2014-07-22.flavor: Filling your Ghouls with Rocket Fuel is all the rage at Necromancer school.

2014-07-22.name: Dancing Swords
2014-07-22.text: Deathrattle: Your opponent draws a card.
2014-07-22.flavor: They like to dance to reggae.

2014-07-22.name: Dark Cultist
2014-07-22.text: Deathrattle: Give a random friendly minion +3 Health.
2014-07-22.flavor: The Cult of the Damned has found it's best not to mention their name when recruiting new cultists.

2014-07-22.name: Deathlord
2014-07-22.text: Taunt. Deathrattle: Your opponent puts a minion from their deck into the battlefield.
2014-07-22.flavor: "Rise from your grave!" - Kel'Thuzad

2014-07-22.name: Duplicate
2014-07-22.text: Secret: When a friendly minion dies, put 2 copies of it into your hand.
2014-07-22.flavor: The one time when duping cards won't get your account banned!

2014-07-22.name: Shade of Naxxramas
2014-07-22.text: Stealth. At the start of your turn, gain +1/+1.
2014-07-22.flavor: The Shades of Naxxramas hate the living. They even have a slur they use to refer them: Livers.

2014-07-22.name: Stoneskin Gargoyle
2014-07-22.text: At the start of your turn, restore this minion to full Health.
2014-07-22.flavor: Stoneskin Gargoyles love freeze tag.

2014-07-22.name: Anub'ar Ambusher
2014-07-22.text: Deathrattle: Return a random friendly minion to your hand.
2014-07-22.flavor: Originally he was called "Anub'ar Guy who bounces a guy back to your hand", but it lacked a certain zing.

2014-07-22.name: Baron Rivendare
2014-07-22.text: Your minions trigger their Deathrattles twice.
2014-07-22.flavor: There used to be five Horsemen but one of them left because a job opened up in the deadmines and the benefits were better.

2014-07-22.name: Death's Bite
2014-07-22.text: Deathrattle: Deal 1 damage to all minions.
2014-07-22.flavor: "Take a bite outta Death." - McScruff the Deathlord

2014-07-22.name: Poison Seeds
2014-07-22.text: Destroy all minions and summon 2/2 Treants to replace them.
2014-07-22.flavor: "Poisonseed Bagel" is the least popular bagel at McTiggin's Druidic Bagel Emporium.

2014-07-22.name: Voidcaller
2014-07-22.text: Deathrattle: Put a random Demon from your hand into the battlefield.
2014-07-22.flavor: "Void!  Here, void!  Here, buddy!"

2014-07-22.name: Wailing Soul
2014-07-22.text: Battlecry: Silence your other minions.
2014-07-22.flavor: This soul just wails on you. Dang, soul, let up already.

2014-07-22.name: Feugen
2014-07-22.text: Deathrattle: If Stalagg also died this game, summon Thaddius.
2014-07-22.flavor: Feugen is sad because everyone likes Stalagg better.

2014-07-22.name: Loatheb
2014-07-22.text: Battlecry: Enemy spells cost (5) more next turn.
2014-07-22.flavor: Loatheb used to be a simple Bog Beast.  This is why we need stricter regulations on mining and agriculture.

2014-07-22.name: Sludge Belcher
2014-07-22.text: Taunt\nDeathrattle: Summon a 1/2 Slime with Taunt.
2014-07-22.flavor: DO NOT GIVE HIM A ROOT BEER.

2014-07-22.name: Spectral Knight
2014-07-22.text: Can't be targeted by spells or Hero Powers.
2014-07-22.flavor: What do Faerie Dragons and Spectral Knights have in common?  They both love pasta!

2014-07-22.name: Stalagg
2014-07-22.text: Deathrattle: If Feugen also died this game, summon Thaddius.
2014-07-22.flavor: Stalagg want to write own flavor text.  "STALAGG AWESOME!"

2014-07-22.name: Maexxna
2014-07-22.text: Poisonous
2014-07-22.flavor: Maexxna gets super mad when people introduce her as "Maxina" or "Maxxy".

2014-07-22.name: Kel'Thuzad
2014-07-22.text: At the end of each turn, summon all friendly minions that died this turn.
2014-07-22.flavor: Kel'Thuzad could not resist the call of the Lich King. Even when it's just a robo-call extolling the Lich King's virtues.

2014-12-08.name: Target Dummy
2014-12-08.text: Taunt
2014-12-08.flavor: The engineering equivalent of a "Kick Me" sticker.

2014-12-08.name: Clockwork Gnome
2014-12-08.text: Deathrattle: Add a Spare Part card to your hand.
2014-12-08.flavor: Clockwork gnomes are always asking what time it is.

2014-12-08.name: Cogmaster
2014-12-08.text: Has +2 Attack while you have a Mech.
2014-12-08.flavor: After a while, you don't see the cogs and sprockets. All you see is a robot, a spider tank, a deathray...

2014-12-08.name: Light of the Naaru
2014-12-08.text: Restore #3 Health. If the target is still damaged, summon a Lightwarden.
2014-12-08.flavor: "Light it up!" - Command given to both Lightwardens and Goblins holding Flamecannons.

2014-12-08.name: Shadowbomber
2014-12-08.text: Battlecry: Deal 3 damage to each hero.
2014-12-08.flavor: Shadowbomber does her job, but she's kind of phoning it in at this point.

2014-12-08.name: Warbot
2014-12-08.text: Has +1 Attack while damaged.
2014-12-08.flavor: Mass production of warbots was halted when it was discovered that they were accidentally being produced at "sample size."

2014-12-08.name: Annoy-o-Tron
2014-12-08.text: Taunt\nDivine Shield
2014-12-08.flavor: The inventor of the Annoy-o-Tron was immediately expelled from Tinkerschool, Tinkertown, and was eventually exiled from the Eastern Kingdoms altogether.

2014-12-08.name: Anodized Robo Cub
2014-12-08.text: Taunt. Choose One -\n+1 Attack; or +1 Health.
2014-12-08.flavor: It's adorable! AND OH MY GOODNESS WHY IS IT EATING MY FACE

2014-12-08.name: Call Pet
2014-12-08.text: Draw a card.\nIf it's a Beast, it costs (4) less.
2014-12-08.flavor: Real hunters tame hungry crabs.

2014-12-08.name: Crackle
2014-12-08.text: Deal $3-$6 damage. Overload: (1)
2014-12-08.flavor: Snap! This card! Pop!

2014-12-08.name: Darkbomb
2014-12-08.text: Deal $3 damage.
2014-12-08.flavor: If you're looking to make an "Emo" deck, this card is perfect!

2014-12-08.name: Explosive Sheep
2014-12-08.text: Deathrattle: Deal 2 damage to all minions.
2014-12-08.flavor: How is this supposed to work? Your enemies think, "Hey! Cute sheep!" and run over to cuddle it?

2014-12-08.name: Feign Death
2014-12-08.text: Trigger all Deathrattles on your minions.
2014-12-08.flavor: The hardest part about doing a "Feign Death" convincingly is learning how to make the right smell. It takes a lot of commitment.

2014-12-08.name: Flamecannon
2014-12-08.text: Deal $4 damage to a random enemy minion.
2014-12-08.flavor: Calling something a flamecannon really doesn't do much to distinguish it from other goblin devices.

2014-12-08.name: Gilblin Stalker
2014-12-08.text: Stealth
2014-12-08.flavor: "Shhh, I think I hear something."\n\n"Ah, it's probably nothing." - Every Henchman

2014-12-08.name: Glaivezooka
2014-12-08.text: Battlecry: Give a random friendly minion +1 Attack.
2014-12-08.flavor: For the times when a regular bazooka just isn't enough.

2014-12-08.name: Goblin Auto-Barber
2014-12-08.text: Battlecry: Give your weapon +1 Attack.
2014-12-08.flavor: This guy is excellent at adjusting your haircut and/or height.

2014-12-08.name: Mechwarper
2014-12-08.text: Your Mechs cost (1) less.
2014-12-08.flavor: Mechs that summon mechs? What's next? Donuts that summon donuts? Mmmmm.

2014-12-08.name: Micro Machine
2014-12-08.text: At the start of each turn, gain +1 Attack.
2014-12-08.flavor: This card is the real thing.

2014-12-08.name: One-eyed Cheat
2014-12-08.text: Whenever you summon a Pirate, gain Stealth.
2014-12-08.flavor: When pirates say there is no "Eye" in "team," they are very literal about it.

2014-12-08.name: Puddlestomper
2014-12-08.flavor: He pays homage to Morgl, the great murloc oracle! (Who doesn't??)

2014-12-08.name: Queen of Pain
2014-12-08.text: Lifesteal
2014-12-08.flavor: Her sister is the Queen of Pane who sells windows and shower doors.

2014-12-08.name: Recombobulator
2014-12-08.text: Battlecry: Transform a friendly minion into a random minion with the same Cost.
2014-12-08.flavor: For when you didn’t combobulate quite right the first time around.

2014-12-08.name: Seal of Light
2014-12-08.text: Restore #4 Health to your hero and gain +2 Attack this turn.
2014-12-08.flavor: The walrus of Light restores EIGHT Health.

2014-12-08.name: Shadowboxer
2014-12-08.text: Whenever a minion is healed, deal 1 damage to a random enemy.
2014-12-08.flavor: Punching is its primary function. Also, its secondary function.

2014-12-08.name: Shielded Minibot
2014-12-08.text: Divine Shield
2014-12-08.flavor: He chooses to believe what he is programmed to believe!

2014-12-08.name: Ship's Cannon
2014-12-08.text: [x]After you summon a\nPirate, deal 2 damage\nto a random enemy.
2014-12-08.flavor: If you hear someone yell, "Cannonball!" you're about to get wet. Or crushed.

2014-12-08.name: Shrinkmeister
2014-12-08.text: Battlecry: Give a minion -2_Attack this turn.
2014-12-08.flavor: After the debacle of the Gnomish World Enlarger, gnomes are wary of size-changing inventions.

2014-12-08.name: Snowchugger
2014-12-08.text: Freeze any character damaged by this minion.
2014-12-08.flavor: Do the slow chant when he waddles by: "Chug! Chug! Chug!"

2014-12-08.name: Steamwheedle Sniper
2014-12-08.text: Your Hero Power can target minions.
2014-12-08.flavor: Goblins seldom have the patience for sniping. Most prefer lobbing explosives.

2014-12-08.name: Stonesplinter Trogg
2014-12-08.text: Whenever your opponent casts a spell, gain +1 Attack.
2014-12-08.flavor: The only thing worse than smelling troggs is listening to their poetry.

2014-12-08.name: Unstable Portal
2014-12-08.text: Add a random minion to your hand. It costs (3) less.
2014-12-08.flavor: The denizens of Azeroth have no idea how much work goes into stabilizing portals.  We spend like 30% of GDP on portal upkeep.

2014-12-08.name: Vitality Totem
2014-12-08.text: At the end of your turn, restore #4 Health to your hero.
2014-12-08.flavor: You can usually find these at the totemist's market on Saturdays.

2014-12-08.name: Whirling Zap-o-matic
2014-12-08.text: Windfury
2014-12-08.flavor: If you pay a little extra, you can get it in "candy-apple red."

2014-12-08.name: Bouncing Blade
2014-12-08.text: Deal $1 damage to a random minion. Repeat until a minion dies.
2014-12-08.flavor: Only goblins would think this was a good idea. Even they are starting to have their doubts.

2014-12-08.name: Coghammer
2014-12-08.text: Battlecry: Give a random friendly minion Divine Shield and Taunt.
2014-12-08.flavor: So you ripped this out of a machine, carved some runes on it, stuck it on a handle, and now it's a weapon of great divine power? Seems legit.

2014-12-08.name: Cogmaster's Wrench
2014-12-08.text: Has +2 Attack while you have a Mech.
2014-12-08.flavor: For tightening cogs and smashin' troggs!

2014-12-08.name: Flying Machine
2014-12-08.text: Windfury
2014-12-08.flavor: To operate, this contraption needs a hula doll on the dashboard. Otherwise it's just a “falling machine.”

2014-12-08.name: Gnomeregan Infantry
2014-12-08.text: Charge\nTaunt
2014-12-08.flavor: The gnomes are valiant and ready to return to their irradiated, poorly ventilated homeland!

2014-12-08.name: Gnomish Experimenter
2014-12-08.text: Battlecry: Draw a card. If it's a minion, transform it into a Chicken.
2014-12-08.flavor: He's legitimately surprised every time he turns himself into a chicken.

2014-12-08.name: Goblin Sapper
2014-12-08.text: Has +4 Attack while your opponent has 6 or more cards in hand.
2014-12-08.flavor: He’s not such a binge exploder anymore. These days, he only explodes socially.

2014-12-08.name: Grove Tender
2014-12-08.text: Choose One - Give each player a Mana Crystal; or Each player draws a card.
2014-12-08.flavor: Likes: Hiking and the great outdoors. Dislikes: Goblin shredders and sandals. (Can’t find any that fit!).

2014-12-08.name: Hobgoblin
2014-12-08.text: Whenever you play a 1-Attack minion, give it +2/+2.
2014-12-08.flavor: Hobgoblins are meeting next week to discuss union benefits.  First on the list: dental plan.

2014-12-08.name: Illuminator
2014-12-08.text: If you control a Secret at the end of your turn, restore #4 Health to your hero.
2014-12-08.flavor: "LUMOS!" is not what they yell. What do you think this is, Hogwarts?

2014-12-08.name: Iron Sensei
2014-12-08.text: At the end of your turn, give another friendly Mech +2/+2.
2014-12-08.flavor: Mechs like learning from him because he really speaks their language.\n\n0110100001101001

2014-12-08.name: Lil' Exorcist
2014-12-08.text: Taunt\nBattlecry: Gain +1/+1 for each enemy Deathrattle minion.
2014-12-08.flavor: Warlocks have the town exorcist on speed dial in case they unleash the wrong demon.

2014-12-08.name: Metaltooth Leaper
2014-12-08.text: Battlecry: Give your other Mechs +2 Attack.
2014-12-08.flavor: Don't leave them out in the rain. In Un'Goro Crater there is a whole colony of rust-tooth leapers.

2014-12-08.name: Muster for Battle
2014-12-08.text: Summon three 1/1 Silver Hand Recruits. Equip a 1/4 Weapon.
2014-12-08.flavor: "I'm bringing the guacamole!" – One of the most successful (yet rare) Silver Hand rallying cries

2014-12-08.name: Ogre Brute
2014-12-08.text: 50% chance to attack the wrong enemy.
2014-12-08.flavor: Ogres have really terrible short-term chocolate.

2014-12-08.name: Ogre Warmaul
2014-12-08.text: 50% chance to attack the wrong enemy.
2014-12-08.flavor: Simple, misguided, and incredibly dangerous. You know, like most things ogre.

2014-12-08.name: Powermace
2014-12-08.text: Deathrattle: Give a random friendly Mech +2/+2.
2014-12-08.flavor: People assume that shamans control the elements, but really, they have to ask them stuff and the elements are like, "Yeah ok, sure."

2014-12-08.name: Scarlet Purifier
2014-12-08.text: Battlecry: Deal 2 damage to all minions with Deathrattle.
2014-12-08.flavor: The Scarlet Crusade is doing market research to find out if the "Mauve Crusade" would be better received.

2014-12-08.name: Soot Spewer
2014-12-08.text: Spell Damage +1
2014-12-08.flavor: The inventor of the goblin shredder is involved in several patent disputes with the inventor of the soot spewer.

2014-12-08.name: Spider Tank
2014-12-08.flavor: "What if we put guns on it?" -Fizzblitz, staring at the spider-transportation-machine

2014-12-08.name: Tinkertown Technician
2014-12-08.text: Battlecry: If you have a Mech, gain +1/+1 and add a Spare Part to your hand.
2014-12-08.flavor: Won't you take me to... Tinkertown?

2014-12-08.name: Velen's Chosen
2014-12-08.text: Give a minion +2/+4 and Spell Damage +1.
2014-12-08.flavor: Velen wrote a "Lovely Card" for Tyrande with a picture of the Deeprun Tram that said "I Choo-Choo-Choose you!"

2014-12-08.name: Ancestor's Call
2014-12-08.text: Put a random minion from each player's hand into the battlefield.
2014-12-08.flavor: "Hey! Ancestors!" - Ancestor's call

2014-12-08.name: Arcane Nullifier X-21
2014-12-08.text: Taunt\nCan't be targeted by spells or Hero Powers.
2014-12-08.flavor: There was some hard talk between gnome magi and engineers about inventing this mech.

2014-12-08.name: Burly Rockjaw Trogg
2014-12-08.text: Whenever your opponent casts a spell, gain +2 Attack.
2014-12-08.flavor: He's burly because he does CrossFit.

2014-12-08.name: Dunemaul Shaman
2014-12-08.text: Windfury, Overload: (1)\n50% chance to attack the wrong enemy.
2014-12-08.flavor: He just closes his eyes and goes for it. Raarararrrarar!

2014-12-08.name: Echo of Medivh
2014-12-08.text: Put a copy of each friendly minion into your hand.
2014-12-08.flavor: Medivh's echo haunts Karazhan, eternally cheating at chess and Hearthstone.

2014-12-08.name: Enhance-o Mechano
2014-12-08.text: Battlecry: Give your other minions Windfury, Taunt, or Divine Shield\n(at random).
2014-12-08.flavor: His enhancements are gluten free!

2014-12-08.name: Fel Cannon
2014-12-08.text: At the end of your turn, deal 2 damage to a non-Mech minion.
2014-12-08.flavor: The box says, "New and improved, with 200% more fel!"

2014-12-08.name: Goblin Blastmage
2014-12-08.text: Battlecry: If you have a Mech, deal 4 damage randomly split among all enemies.
2014-12-08.flavor: If you can't find a bomb to throw, just pick up any goblin invention and throw that.

2014-12-08.name: Imp-losion
2014-12-08.text: Deal $2-$4 damage to a minion. Summon a 1/1 Imp for each damage dealt.
2014-12-08.flavor: The shrapnel is waaaaay worse than the explosion.

2014-12-08.name: Jeeves
2014-12-08.text: At the end of each player's turn, that player draws until they have 3 cards.
2014-12-08.flavor: This robot is a lean, mean, butlerin' machine.

2014-12-08.name: Kezan Mystic
2014-12-08.text: Battlecry: Take control of a random enemy Secret.
