2016-12-01.name: Lotus Agents
2016-12-01.text: Battlecry: Discover a Druid, Rogue, or Shaman card.
2016-12-01.flavor: Mostly, they stand around and look cool.

2016-12-01.name: Lotus Assassin
2016-12-01.text: Stealth. Whenever this attacks and kills a minion, gain Stealth.
2016-12-01.flavor: For 5000g, you can just give the Jade Lotus any name and they will assassinate and/or embarrass them.

2016-12-01.name: Lunar Visions
2016-12-01.text: Draw 2 cards. Minions drawn cost (2) less.
2016-12-01.flavor: The true mystery of lunar visions is how there is nothing to watch when there are so many channels.

2016-12-01.name: Piranha Launcher
2016-12-01.text: [x]After your hero attacks,\nsummon a 1/1 Piranha.
2016-12-01.flavor: A great improvement over the guppy launcher.

2016-12-01.name: Raza the Chained
2016-12-01.text: [x] Battlecry: If your deck has \nno duplicates, your Hero\n Power costs (0) this game.
2016-12-01.flavor: "Could you do me a favor and get the keys from Kazakus?"

2016-12-01.name: Red Mana Wyrm
2016-12-01.text: Whenever you cast a spell, gain +2 Attack.
2016-12-01.flavor: It has double the Attack.  "Go on."  And double the Health.  "Yes??"  And its trigger has twice the effect.  "WHAT???"  And it costs…  Five times more.

2016-12-01.name: Second-Rate Bruiser
2016-12-01.text: [x]Taunt Costs (2) less if your opponent has at least three minions.
2016-12-01.flavor: He'll be a first-rate bruiser once he gets used to his contacts.

2016-12-01.name: Spiked Hogrider
2016-12-01.text: Battlecry: If an enemy minion has Taunt, gain_Charge.
2016-12-01.flavor: Did you know the Hogchoppers compete every year at the Mirage Raceway?  They do.  It's a real group.

2016-12-01.name: Streetwise Investigator
2016-12-01.text: Battlecry: Enemy minions lose Stealth.
2016-12-01.flavor: "Hmmmm…  Call it a hunch, but I'm starting to think that there may be some kind of criminal activity going on in Gadgetzan."

2016-12-01.name: Virmen Sensei
2016-12-01.text: Battlecry: Give a friendly Beast +2/+2.
2016-12-01.flavor: There is no carrot.

2016-12-01.name: White Eyes
2016-12-01.text: Taunt\nDeathrattle: Shuffle\n'The Storm Guardian' into your deck.
2016-12-01.flavor: My life for Aya!

2016-12-01.name: Ancient of Blossoms
2016-12-01.text: Taunt
2016-12-01.flavor: His new shampoo is really working!

2016-12-01.name: Aya Blackpaw
2016-12-01.text: Battlecry and Deathrattle: Summon a{1} {0} Jade Golem. @ Battlecry and Deathrattle: Summon a Jade Golem.
2016-12-01.flavor: Though young, Aya took over as the leader of Jade Lotus through her charisma and strategic acumen when her predecessor was accidentally crushed by a jade golem.

2016-12-01.name: Big-Time Racketeer
2016-12-01.text: Battlecry: Summon a 6/6_Ogre.
2016-12-01.flavor: "It'd be a shame if someone disenchanted those Legendaries."

2016-12-01.name: Defias Cleaner
2016-12-01.text: Battlecry: Silence a minion with Deathrattle.
2016-12-01.flavor: His house cleaning service is quite thorough.  Not a spot to be found... or any of your stuff!

2016-12-01.name: Dragonfire Potion
2016-12-01.text: [x]Deal $5 damage to all\nminions except Dragons.
2016-12-01.flavor: No one was brave enough to fire the dragon in person… so they made the potion do it.

2016-12-01.name: Felfire Potion
2016-12-01.text: Deal $5 damage to all characters.
2016-12-01.flavor: Kazakus has a squad of imps bottling Felfire round-the-clock and he *still* can't keep up with demand.

2016-12-01.name: Fight Promoter
2016-12-01.text: [x]Battlecry: If you control\na minion with 6 or more\n_Health, draw two cards.
2016-12-01.flavor: "Yeah, I can get you Knuckles.  No, no, he's been clean for *weeks*."

2016-12-01.name: Jade Behemoth
2016-12-01.text: [x]Taunt Battlecry: Summon a{1} {0} Jade Golem.@[x]Taunt Battlecry: Summon a Jade Golem.
2016-12-01.flavor: I think we should talk about the jade elephant in the room.

2016-12-01.name: Kabal Crystal Runner
2016-12-01.text: Costs (2) less for each Secret you've played this_game.
2016-12-01.flavor: "Listen, I can cut you in on a little of this premium mana, but you can't tell my boss."

2016-12-01.name: Kabal Trafficker
2016-12-01.text: [x]At the end of your turn,\nadd a random Demon\nto your hand.
2016-12-01.flavor: She ships illicit mana crystals around the world in packages marked: FUNNEL CAKE.

2016-12-01.name: Leatherclad Hogleader
2016-12-01.text: Battlecry: If your opponent has 6 or more cards in hand, gain Charge.
2016-12-01.flavor: The Hogchoppers, the terrors of Tanaris, can always be found at one tavern or another in Gadgetzan, refueling for totally real and legit adventures that they go on.

2016-12-01.name: Luckydo Buccaneer
2016-12-01.text: Battlecry: If your weapon has at least 3 Attack, gain +4/+4.
2016-12-01.flavor: You can't just leave a Luckydo somewhere.  You gotta keep 'em with you!  Especially in Gadgetzan!

2016-12-01.name: Madam Goya
2016-12-01.text: Battlecry: Choose a friendly minion. Swap it with a minion in your deck.
2016-12-01.flavor: She has set up her Black Market here in Gadgetzan for one purpose, to make a KILLING when Beanie Babies make their inevitable comeback.

2016-12-01.name: Wind-up Burglebot
2016-12-01.text: Whenever this attacks a minion and survives, draw_a card.
2016-12-01.flavor: Don't blame the bot for his crimes...  Blame whoever keeps winding him up!

2016-12-01.name: Wrathion
2016-12-01.text: Taunt. Battlecry: Draw cards until you draw one that isn't a Dragon.
2016-12-01.flavor: Wrathion, son of Deathwing, is a dragon.  Why isn't he tagged as a dragon, you ask?  WHAT, ARE YOU TRYING TO BLOW HIS COVER??

2016-12-01.name: Abyssal Enforcer
2016-12-01.text: Battlecry: Deal 3 damage to all other characters.
2016-12-01.flavor: The Kabal print this on every package of illicit Mana Crystals: WARNING - DO NOT PUT WITHIN REACH OF ABYSSALS. THIS IS NOT APPROVED FOR USE BY FLAMING DEMONS OF ANY KIND.

2016-12-01.name: Don Han'Cho
2016-12-01.text: Battlecry: Give a random minion in your hand +5/+5.
2016-12-01.flavor: The brilliant mastermind of the Grimy Goons, Han sometimes thinks about ditching the idiot Cho, but that would just tear him apart.

2016-12-01.name: Greater Arcane Missiles
2016-12-01.text: Shoot three missiles at random enemies that deal $3 damage each.
2016-12-01.flavor: Wow, and I thought Arcane Missiles was great!

2016-12-01.name: Grimestreet Protector
2016-12-01.text: [x]Taunt\nBattlecry: Give adjacent\n_minions Divine Shield.
2016-12-01.flavor: Some new asphalt should do the trick.

2016-12-01.name: Inkmaster Solia
2016-12-01.text: [x]Battlecry: If your deck has no duplicates, the next spell you cast this turn costs (0).
2016-12-01.flavor: Solia marks the Kabal with intricate tattoos that grant immense power. Also it makes it harder for other gangs to recruit from their numbers. BACK OFF, GOONS.

2016-12-01.name: Jade Chieftain
2016-12-01.text: Battlecry: Summon a{1} {0} Jade Golem. Give it Taunt. @Battlecry: Summon a Jade Golem. Give it Taunt.
2016-12-01.flavor: Seeing his Jade Golem grow up into the tall, handsome 6/6 standing before him was the proudest moment of his life.

2016-12-01.name: Krul the Unshackled
2016-12-01.text: [x]Battlecry: If your deck has\nno duplicates, summon all\n_Demons from your hand._
2016-12-01.flavor: Spicklefizz pondered his life choices as he looked at the chain around his neck. "Become a warlock," they said. "You get to enslave demons," they said.

2016-12-01.name: Mayor Noggenfogger
2016-12-01.text: All targets are chosen randomly.
2016-12-01.flavor: This flavor text was randomly generated.  If it happens to form words and make sense, that is purely by chance.

2016-12-01.name: Kun the Forgotten King
2016-12-01.text: Choose One - Gain 10 Armor; or Refresh your Mana Crystals.
2016-12-01.flavor: Aya siphons a bit of Kun's soul to animate each golem in her Jade army. To his credit, he's being a great sport about it.

2017-04-04.name: Conceal
2017-04-04.text: Give your minions Stealth until your next_turn.
2017-04-04.flavor: Rogues conceal everything but their emotions.  You can't get 'em to shut up about feelings.

2017-04-04.name: Ice Lance
2017-04-04.text: Freeze a character. If it was already Frozen, deal $4 damage instead.
2017-04-04.flavor: The trick is not to break the lance.  Otherwise, you have "Ice Pieces."  Ice Pieces aren't as effective.

2017-04-04.name: Naturalize
2017-04-04.text: Destroy a minion.\nYour opponent draws 2_cards.
2017-04-04.flavor: Another one bites the dust.

2017-04-04.name: Northshire Cleric
2017-04-04.text: Whenever a minion is healed, draw a card.
2017-04-04.flavor: They help the downtrodden and distressed.  Also they sell cookies.

2017-04-04.name: Power Overwhelming
2017-04-04.text: Give a friendly minion +4/+4 until end of turn. Then, it dies. Horribly.
2017-04-04.flavor: We cannot even describe how horrible the death is.  It's CRAZY bad!  Maybe worse than that.  Just don't do it.

2017-04-04.name: Captain's Parrot
2017-04-04.text: Battlecry: Draw a Pirate from your deck.
2017-04-04.flavor: Pirates and Parrots go together like Virmen and Carrots.

2017-04-04.name: Divine Spirit
2017-04-04.text: Double a minion's Health.
2017-04-04.flavor: Double the trouble. Double the fun!

2017-04-04.name: Mind Blast
2017-04-04.text: Deal $5 damage to the enemy hero.
2017-04-04.flavor: This spell blasts you directly in the MIND.

2017-04-04.name: Murkspark Eel
2017-04-04.text: Battlecry: If your deck has only even-Cost cards, deal_2 damage.
2017-04-04.flavor: Makes shockingly good unagi.

2017-04-04.name: Acolyte of Pain
2017-04-04.text: Whenever this minion takes damage, draw a_card.
2017-04-04.flavor: He trained when he was younger to be an acolyte of joy, but things didn’t work out like he thought they would.

2017-04-04.name: Black Cat
2017-04-04.text: Spell Damage +1\n Battlecry: If your deck has only odd-Cost cards, draw a card.
2017-04-04.flavor: She's so odd, you can't even.

2017-04-04.name: Coldlight Oracle
2017-04-04.text: Battlecry: Each player draws 2 cards.
2017-04-04.flavor: They can see the future.   In that future both players draw more cards.   Spoooky.

2017-04-04.name: Divine Favor
2017-04-04.text: Draw cards until you have as many in hand as your opponent.
2017-04-04.flavor: This is not just a favor, but a divine one, like helping someone move a couch with a fold out bed!

2017-04-04.name: Ice Block
2017-04-04.text: Secret: When your hero takes fatal damage, prevent it and become Immune this turn.
2017-04-04.flavor: Ice is nice, and will suffice!

2017-04-04.name: Mind Control Tech
2017-04-04.text: [x]Battlecry: If your opponent\nhas 4 or more minions, take\n control of one at random.
2017-04-04.flavor: Mind Control technology is getting better, but that's not saying much.

2017-04-04.name: Shadowform
2017-04-04.text: Your Hero Power becomes 'Deal 2 damage'. If already in Shadowform: 3 damage.
2017-04-04.flavor: If a bright light shines on a priest in Shadowform… do they cast a shadow?

2017-04-04.name: Auchenai Soulpriest
2017-04-04.text: Your cards and powers that restore Health now deal damage instead.
2017-04-04.flavor: The Auchenai know the end is coming, but they're not sure when.

2017-04-04.name: Old Murk-Eye
2017-04-04.text: Charge. Has +1 Attack for each other Murloc on the battlefield.
2017-04-04.flavor: He's a legend among murlocs.  "Mrghllghghllghg!", they say.

2017-04-04.name: Spellbreaker
2017-04-04.text: Battlecry: Silence a_minion.
2017-04-04.flavor: Spellbreakers can rip enchantments from magic-wielders.  The process is painless and can be performed on an outpatient basis.

2017-04-04.name: Azure Drake
2017-04-04.text: Spell Damage +1\nBattlecry: Draw a card.
2017-04-04.flavor: They initially planned to be the Beryl or Cerulean drakes, but those felt a tad too pretentious.

2017-04-04.name: Doomguard
2017-04-04.text: Charge. Battlecry: Discard two random cards.
2017-04-04.flavor: Summoning a doomguard is risky. Someone is going to die.

2017-04-04.name: Elite Tauren Chieftain
2017-04-04.text: Battlecry: Give both players the power to ROCK! (with a Power Chord card)
2017-04-04.flavor: He's looking for a drummer.  The current candidates are: Novice Engineer, Sen'jin Shieldmasta', and Ragnaros the Firelord.

2017-04-04.name: Glitter Moth
2017-04-04.text: Battlecry: If your deck has only odd-Cost cards, double the Health of your other minions.
2017-04-04.flavor: Some moths are attracted to flame. This one's attracted to disco.

2017-04-04.name: Gloom Stag
2017-04-04.text: Taunt\nBattlecry: If your deck has only odd-Cost cards, gain +2/+2.
2017-04-04.flavor: Majestic. Ethereal. Still pretty down in the dumps, though.

2017-04-04.name: Leeroy Jenkins
2017-04-04.text: Charge. Battlecry: Summon two 1/1 Whelps for your opponent.
2017-04-04.flavor: At least he has Angry Chicken.

2017-04-04.name: Gelbin Mekkatorque
2017-04-04.text: Battlecry: Summon an AWESOME invention.
2017-04-04.flavor: He's the leader of the gnomes, and an incredible inventor.  He's getting better, too; He turns things into chickens WAY less than he used to.

2017-04-04.name: Genn Greymane
2017-04-04.text: [x]Start of Game: If your deck has only even- Cost cards, your starting Hero Power costs (1).
2017-04-04.flavor: Ever since Sylvanas killed his son, he's dreamed of getting… even.

2017-04-04.name: Holy Fire
2017-04-04.text: Deal $5 damage. Restore #5 Health to your hero.
2017-04-04.flavor: Often followed by Holy Smokes!

2017-04-04.name: Sylvanas Windrunner
2017-04-04.text: Deathrattle: Take\ncontrol of a random\nenemy minion.
2017-04-04.flavor: Sylvanas was turned into the Banshee Queen by Arthas, but he probably should have just killed her because it just pissed her off.

2017-04-04.name: Vanish
2017-04-04.text: Return all minions to their owner's hand.

2017-04-04.name: Prophet Velen
2017-04-04.text: Double the damage and healing of your spells and Hero Power.
2017-04-04.flavor: He's been exiled from his home, and all his brothers turned evil, but otherwise he doesn't have a lot to complain about.

2017-04-04.name: Ragnaros the Firelord
2017-04-04.text: Can't attack. At the end of your turn, deal 8 damage to a random enemy.
2017-04-04.flavor: Ragnaros was summoned by the Dark Iron dwarves, who were eventually enslaved by the Firelord.  Summoning Ragnaros often doesn’t work out the way you want it to.

2017-04-04.name: Baku the Mooneater
2017-04-04.text: [x]Start of Game: If your deck has only odd- Cost cards, upgrade your Hero Power.
2017-04-04.flavor: In her defense, it did look like a cookie.

2017-04-04.name: Mountain Giant
2017-04-04.text: Costs (1) less for each other card in your hand.
2017-04-04.flavor: His mother said that he was just big boned.

2017-04-04.name: Molten Giant
2017-04-04.text: Costs (1) less for each damage your hero has taken.
2017-04-04.flavor: He gets terrible heartburn.  BECAUSE HE IS FULL OF LAVA.

2017-04-06.name: Adaptation
2017-04-06.text: Adapt a friendly minion.
2017-04-06.flavor: Pray for salvation. If that fails, pray for extra horns or bigger teeth.

2017-04-06.name: Air Elemental
2017-04-06.text: Can't be targeted by spells or Hero Powers.
2017-04-06.flavor: Makes a mean puff pastry.

2017-04-06.name: Awaken the Makers
2017-04-06.text: Quest: Summon\n7 Deathrattle minions.\nReward: Amara, Warden of Hope.
2017-04-06.flavor: They keep hitting the Snooze button.

2017-04-06.name: Binding Heal
2017-04-06.text: Restore #5 Health to a minion and your hero.
2017-04-06.flavor: By accepting this healing, you agree to the following terms…

2017-04-06.name: Crystalline Oracle
2017-04-06.text: [x]Deathrattle: Copy a card\nfrom your opponent's deck\n_and add it to your hand.
2017-04-06.flavor: Being made of light has its disadvantages, but at least it's always looking on the bright side.

2017-04-06.name: Earthen Scales
2017-04-06.text: Give a friendly minion +1/+1, then gain Armor equal to its Attack.
2017-04-06.flavor: You can make your own Earthen Scales at home. Step 1: Roll around in the dirt. Step 2: Magic.

2017-04-06.name: Emerald Hive Queen
2017-04-06.text: Your minions cost (2) more.
2017-04-06.flavor: She rules the emerald hive at the end of the yellow brick trail.

2017-04-06.name: Emerald Reaver
2017-04-06.text: Battlecry: Deal 1 damage to each hero.
2017-04-06.flavor: Not to be confused with clubbing enthusiast Emerald Raver.

2017-04-06.name: Fire Fly
2017-04-06.text: Battlecry: Add a 1/2 Elemental to your hand.
2017-04-06.flavor: Archnemeses: small children with glass jars.

2017-04-06.name: Fire Plume's Heart
2017-04-06.text: [x]Quest: Play\n7 Taunt minions.\nReward: Sulfuras.
2017-04-06.flavor: Why does an active volcano need to be defended? To save its ash.

2017-04-06.name: Glacial Shard
2017-04-06.text: Battlecry: Freeze an_enemy.
2017-04-06.flavor: Ice, ice, baby!

2017-04-06.name: Hallucination
2017-04-06.text: Discover a card from your opponent's class.
2017-04-06.flavor: It's the good kind of hallucination.

2017-04-06.name: Iron Hide
2017-04-06.text: Gain 5 Armor.
2017-04-06.flavor: Week 6. I remain covered head to toe with scales. They do not yet realize that I am not a dinosaur.

2017-04-06.name: Jeweled Macaw
2017-04-06.text: Battlecry: Add a random Beast to your hand.
2017-04-06.flavor: It’s not LITERALLY jeweled. The goblins were terribly disappointed.

2017-04-06.name: Jungle Giants
2017-04-06.text: [x]Quest: Summon 5 minions with 5 or more Attack. Reward: Barnabus.
2017-04-06.flavor: Forming the Golakka Crater was the end of Barnabus' disastrous career as a dancer.

2017-04-06.name: Lakkari Sacrifice
2017-04-06.text: [x]Quest: Discard 6 cards.\nReward: Nether Portal.
2017-04-06.flavor: They asked, “And what must we give in return?” Gul’dan lowered his hood and answered: “Six… cards…”

2017-04-06.name: Lost in the Jungle
2017-04-06.text: Summon two 1/1 Silver Hand Recruits.
2017-04-06.flavor: George and Karl were never heard from again.

2017-04-06.name: Molten Blade
2017-04-06.text: Each turn this is in your hand, transform it into a new weapon.
2017-04-06.flavor: It’s a sword! It’s a knife! It’s a swizzle-stick!

2017-04-06.name: Open the Waygate
2017-04-06.text: [x]Quest: Cast 8 spells that\ndidn't start in your deck.\nReward: Time Warp.
2017-04-06.flavor: Although powerful, the incantation is simple. It’s just a jump to the left, and then a step to the right.

2017-04-06.name: Raptor Hatchling
2017-04-06.text: Deathrattle: Shuffle a 4/3 Raptor into your deck.
2017-04-06.flavor: They’re just baby teeth. Lots and lots of baby teeth.

2017-04-06.name: Stampede
2017-04-06.text: Each time you play a Beast this turn, add_a_random Beast to_your hand.
2017-04-06.flavor: Many hunters long for the pitter-patter of enormous feet.

2017-04-06.name: The Caverns Below
2017-04-06.text: [x]Quest: Play five minions\nwith the same name.\nReward: Crystal Core.
2017-04-06.flavor: Why can't it ever be The Taverns Below?

2017-04-06.name: The Last Kaleidosaur
2017-04-06.text: Quest: Cast 6 spells\non your minions.\nReward: Galvadon.
2017-04-06.flavor: “Impossible!” exclaimed the Silver Hand Recruit, his eyes filled with fear. Uther shook his head, turning the crystal until it caught the light: “Life finds a way.”

2017-04-06.name: The Marsh Queen
2017-04-06.text: [x]Quest: Play seven\n1-Cost minions.\nReward: Queen Carnassa.
2017-04-06.flavor: Question: What's scarier, one giant angry dinosaur or 15 smaller vicious ones? Answer: AHHHHHHH THEY FOUND MEEEEEE

2017-04-06.name: Unite the Murlocs
2017-04-06.text: [x]Quest: Summon\n10 Murlocs.\nReward: Megafin.
2017-04-06.flavor: Form feet and legs!  Form arms and body!  Oh.  Sorry.  I was thinking about Mechafin.

2017-04-06.name: Arcanologist
2017-04-06.text: Battlecry: Draw a Secret from your deck.
2017-04-06.flavor: What did you draw? Shhhh… it’s a secret.

2017-04-06.name: Biteweed
2017-04-06.text: Combo: Gain +1/+1 for each other card you've played this turn.
2017-04-06.flavor: AKA Edwin VanLeaf.

2017-04-06.name: Clutchmother Zavas
2017-04-06.text: Whenever you discard this, give it +2/+2 and return it to your hand.
2017-04-06.flavor: A bit of a snob: still refuses to drive anything with automatic transmission.

2017-04-06.name: Cornered Sentry
2017-04-06.text: Taunt. Battlecry: Summon three 1/1 Raptors for your_opponent.
2017-04-06.flavor: The Draenei are seriously considering cancelling "Bring Your Murderous Pet to Work Day."

2017-04-06.name: Corrupting Mist
2017-04-06.text: Corrupt every minion. Destroy them at the start of your next turn.
2017-04-06.flavor: The most terrifying of Un’goro magics is both silent… AND deadly.

2017-04-06.name: Crackling Razormaw
2017-04-06.text: Battlecry: Adapt a friendly_Beast.
2017-04-06.flavor: Wasn't clever enough to go AROUND the electric fence.

2017-04-06.name: Dinomancy
2017-04-06.text: Your Hero Power becomes 'Give a Beast +2/+2.'
2017-04-06.flavor: Anyone can dinomance. Just put your lips together and RAAWWWAARGGGH.

2017-04-06.name: Explore Un'Goro
2017-04-06.text: Replace your deck with_copies of "Discover a card."
2017-04-06.flavor: It turns out cards DO grow on trees!

2017-04-06.name: Fire Plume Harbinger
2017-04-06.text: Battlecry: Reduce the Cost of Elementals in your hand_by (1).
2017-04-06.flavor: Good for summoning elementals. Great for making s'mores.

2017-04-06.name: Flame Geyser
2017-04-06.text: Deal $2 damage.\nAdd a 1/2 Elemental to_your hand.
2017-04-06.flavor: Oh, a wise geyser eh?

2017-04-06.name: Golakka Crawler
2017-04-06.text: Battlecry: Destroy a Pirate and gain +1/+1.
2017-04-06.flavor: Universally adored by both control decks and ninjas.

2017-04-06.name: Grievous Bite
2017-04-06.text: Deal $2 damage to a minion and $1 damage to adjacent ones.
2017-04-06.flavor: Ooh.  I'll have a bite of this, and of this, and of this...

2017-04-06.name: Hydrologist
2017-04-06.text: Battlecry: Discover a Secret.
2017-04-06.flavor: Murloc hydrologists are pretty rare.  Most murloc undergrads pick computer science.

2017-04-06.name: Primalfin Champion
2017-04-06.text: [x]Deathrattle: Return any\nspells you cast on this\nminion to your hand.
2017-04-06.flavor: Sure, he'll return your stuff.  OVER HIS DEAD BODY!

2017-04-06.name: Primalfin Totem
2017-04-06.text: At the end of your turn, summon a 1/1 Murloc.
2017-04-06.flavor: Emits a sound only murlocs can hear, which is good because it’s REALLY annoying.

2017-04-06.name: Primordial Glyph
2017-04-06.text: Discover a spell. Reduce its Cost by (2).
2017-04-06.flavor: It's the Ancient Tol'vir symbol for "Whoops!"

2017-04-06.name: Pyros
2017-04-06.text: Deathrattle: Return this to_your hand as a 6/6 that costs (6).
2017-04-06.flavor: If you strike her down, she shall become more powerful than you can possibly… well, she'll become a 6/6 anyways.

2017-04-06.name: Radiant Elemental
2017-04-06.text: Your spells cost (1) less.
2017-04-06.flavor: It's a literal lava lamp!

2017-04-06.name: Ravasaur Runt
2017-04-06.text: Battlecry: If you control at_least 2 other minions, Adapt.
2017-04-06.flavor: Doesn't like to adapt unless others are watching. Some minions are such show-offs.

2017-04-06.name: Razorpetal Lasher

2017-08-10.name: Coldwraith
2017-08-10.text: Battlecry: If an enemy is Frozen, draw a card.
2017-08-10.flavor: He's freezing his bones off!

2017-08-10.name: Crypt Lord
2017-08-10.text: [x]Taunt\nAfter you summon a minion,\n gain +1 Health.
2017-08-10.flavor: The original fifth beetle!

2017-08-10.name: Deathspeaker
2017-08-10.text: Battlecry: Give a friendly minion Immune this turn.
2017-08-10.flavor: It helps to speak really, really loud.

2017-08-10.name: Doomed Apprentice
2017-08-10.text: Your opponent's spells cost (1) more.
2017-08-10.flavor: Jaina was never good at keeping up apprentices.

2017-08-10.name: Drakkari Defender
2017-08-10.text: Taunt\nOverload: (3)
2017-08-10.flavor: Sometimes, the best defense is an offensive troll.

2017-08-10.name: Drakkari Enchanter
2017-08-10.text: Your end of turn effects trigger twice.
2017-08-10.flavor: Drakkari sorceresses have the irritating habit of repeating themselves at the end of every sentence. Every sentence.

2017-08-10.name: Frozen Clone
2017-08-10.text: Secret: After your opponent plays a minion, add two copies of it to_your hand.
2017-08-10.flavor: It's like déjà vu, times two.

2017-08-10.name: Gnash
2017-08-10.text: Give your hero +3_Attack this turn. Gain 3 Armor.
2017-08-10.flavor: It's rude to gnash with your mouth open.

2017-08-10.name: Happy Ghoul
2017-08-10.text: Costs (0) if your hero was healed this turn.
2017-08-10.flavor: When life gives you snow…

2017-08-10.name: Howlfiend
2017-08-10.text: Whenever this minion takes damage, discard a_random card.
2017-08-10.flavor: The problem is that he carries those cards in his mouth.

2017-08-10.name: Howling Commander
2017-08-10.text: Battlecry: Draw a Divine_Shield minion from your deck.
2017-08-10.flavor: Enlistment in her battalion comes with several pairs of earplugs.

2017-08-10.name: Hyldnir Frostrider
2017-08-10.text: Battlecry: Freeze your other minions.
2017-08-10.flavor: Don't be fooled, that polar bear's the one in charge.

2017-08-10.name: Ice Breaker
2017-08-10.text: Destroy any Frozen minion damaged by_this.
2017-08-10.flavor: A great way to end a conversation.

2017-08-10.name: Mindbreaker
2017-08-10.text: Hero Powers are disabled.
2017-08-10.flavor: He's a mind breaker, dream taker, ghoul trainer, don't you mess around with him.

2017-08-10.name: Mountainfire Armor
2017-08-10.text: Deathrattle: If it's your opponent's turn,\ngain 6 Armor.
2017-08-10.flavor: Excuse me. Your mountain is on fire.

2017-08-10.name: Plague Scientist
2017-08-10.text: Combo: Give a friendly minion Poisonous.
2017-08-10.flavor: The excruciating pain means it's working!

2017-08-10.name: Prince Taldaram
2017-08-10.text: Battlecry: If your deck has_no 3-Cost cards, transform into a 3/3 copy of a minion.
2017-08-10.flavor: Three Princes stand before you. This one wants to copy others.

2017-08-10.name: Shadowblade
2017-08-10.text: Battlecry: Your hero is Immune this turn.
2017-08-10.flavor: It's tacky to call it "Shadeblade."

2017-08-10.name: Shallow Gravedigger
2017-08-10.text: Deathrattle: Add a random Deathrattle minion to your_hand.
2017-08-10.flavor: It's hard to put them six feet under when you're three feet tall.

2017-08-10.name: Simulacrum
2017-08-10.text: Copy the lowest Cost minion in your hand.
2017-08-10.flavor: It's like déjà vu, times two.

2017-08-10.name: Stitched Tracker
2017-08-10.text: Battlecry: Discover a copy of a minion in your deck.
2017-08-10.flavor: He's just exercising his right to bear arms.

2017-08-10.name: Treachery
2017-08-10.text: Choose a friendly minion and give it to_your opponent.
2017-08-10.flavor: Never look a gift minion in the mouth.

2017-08-10.name: Unwilling Sacrifice
2017-08-10.text: Choose a friendly minion. Destroy it and a random enemy minion.
2017-08-10.flavor: Stand right... there. Perfect, perfect! Now don't move.

2017-08-10.name: Val'kyr Soulclaimer
2017-08-10.text: [x]After this minion\nsurvives damage,\nsummon a 2/2 Ghoul.
2017-08-10.flavor: My Ghoul friend is back and you're gonna be in trouble.

2017-08-10.name: Vryghoul
2017-08-10.text: [x]Deathrattle: If it's your\nopponent's turn,\nsummon a 2/2 Ghoul.
2017-08-10.flavor: It's pronounced VERY GHOUL. Don't let anyone tell you different.

2017-08-10.name: Arfus
2017-08-10.text: Deathrattle: Add a random Death Knight card to your_hand.
2017-08-10.flavor: There must always be a Lick King.

2017-08-10.name: Arrogant Crusader
2017-08-10.text: Deathrattle: If it's your opponent's turn, summon a 2/2 Ghoul.
2017-08-10.flavor: To be honest, he was kind of a jerk even BEFORE he was bitten by that ghoul.

2017-08-10.name: Avalanche
2017-08-10.text: Freeze a minion and deal $3 damage to adjacent ones.
2017-08-10.flavor: One of our more snowbally cards.

2017-08-10.name: Blood Razor
2017-08-10.text: Battlecry and Deathrattle:\nDeal 1 damage to all_minions.
2017-08-10.flavor: For the close shave that you've always wanted. Caution: Very sharp.

2017-08-10.name: Chillblade Champion
2017-08-10.text: Charge\nLifesteal
2017-08-10.flavor: It slices, it dices, it vaporizes! The Chillblade will make a Champion out of even the lowliest gnome.

2017-08-10.name: Corpsetaker
2017-08-10.text: [x]Battlecry: Gain Taunt if your deck has a Taunt minion. Repeat for Divine Shield, Lifesteal, Windfury.
2017-08-10.flavor: Her extensive collection of corpses includes one of nearly every type.  She'd love for you to join it.

2017-08-10.name: Deathaxe Punisher
2017-08-10.text: Battlecry: Give a random Lifesteal minion in your hand +2/+2.
2017-08-10.flavor: Don't fear the Arcanite Reaper.

2017-08-10.name: Eternal Servitude
2017-08-10.text: Discover a friendly minion that died this game. Summon it.
2017-08-10.flavor: What do you mean I don't get overtime pay for this?!

2017-08-10.name: Exploding Bloatbat
2017-08-10.text: Deathrattle:\nDeal 2 damage to all enemy minions.
2017-08-10.flavor: We've all been there after a night of one-too-many funnel cakes.

2017-08-10.name: Ghastly Conjurer
2017-08-10.text: Battlecry: Add a 'Mirror Image' spell to your hand.
2017-08-10.flavor: Wearing purple after the holidays? GHASTLY!

2017-08-10.name: Grave Shambler
2017-08-10.text: Whenever your weapon is destroyed, gain +1/+1.
2017-08-10.flavor: I think one of the necromancers got a little carried away.

2017-08-10.name: Grim Necromancer
2017-08-10.text: Battlecry: Summon two 1/1 Skeletons.
2017-08-10.flavor: WARNING: Skeletons will NOT explode.

2017-08-10.name: Keening Banshee
2017-08-10.text: Whenever you play a card, remove the top 3 cards of_your deck.
2017-08-10.flavor: "What are your strengths?" the interviewer asked. "Well," she replied, "I'm really good at keening."

2017-08-10.name: Light's Sorrow
2017-08-10.text: After a friendly minion loses Divine Shield, gain +1 Attack.
2017-08-10.flavor: These sorrows cut deep.

2017-08-10.name: Lilian Voss
2017-08-10.text: Battlecry: Replace spells in your hand with random spells (from your opponent's class).
2017-08-10.flavor: She doesn't feel pity, or remorse, or fear. And she absolutely will not stop... ever, until all necromancers are dead.

2017-08-10.name: Meat Wagon
2017-08-10.text: [x]Deathrattle: Summon a minion from your deck with less Attack than this minion.
2017-08-10.flavor: Necromancers call it "Meals on Wheels."

2017-08-10.name: Night Howler
2017-08-10.text: Whenever this minion takes\ndamage, gain +2 Attack.
2017-08-10.flavor: Honestly, he howls during the day, too.

2017-08-10.name: Phantom Freebooter
2017-08-10.text: Battlecry: Gain stats equal to your weapon's.
2017-08-10.flavor: There's no such thing as a free boot.

2017-08-10.name: Prince Valanar
2017-08-10.text: Battlecry: If your deck has no 4-Cost cards, gain Lifesteal and Taunt.
2017-08-10.flavor: Three Princes stand before you. This one devours one after another.

2017-08-10.name: Professor Putricide
2017-08-10.text: After you play a Secret,\nput a random Hunter Secret into the battlefield.
2017-08-10.flavor: Among his more notable inventions: A tentacle-groomer, a plague that would wipe out all life on Azeroth, and a fidget spinner.

2017-08-10.name: Rattling Rascal
2017-08-10.text: [x]Battlecry: Summon a 5/5 Skeleton. Deathrattle: Summon one for your opponent.
2017-08-10.flavor: Don't give up, skeleton!

2017-08-10.name: Runeforge Haunter
2017-08-10.text: During your turn, your weapon doesn't lose Durability.
2017-08-10.flavor: Don't worry, he'll keep an eye on that for you.

2017-08-10.name: Saronite Chain Gang
2017-08-10.text: [x]Taunt\nBattlecry: Summon another\nSaronite Chain Gang.
2017-08-10.flavor: Desperately needs some alone time.

2017-08-10.name: Strongshell Scavenger
2017-08-10.text: Battlecry: Give your Taunt minions +2/+2.
2017-08-10.flavor: It isn't "grave robbing" when there's no grave. It's just scavenging…

2017-08-10.name: Ticking Abomination
2017-08-10.text: Deathrattle: Deal 5 damage to your minions.
2017-08-10.flavor: Abomination. Emphasis on the second syllable.

2017-08-10.name: Wicked Skeleton
2017-08-10.text: Battlecry: Gain +1/+1 for_each minion that died_this turn.
2017-08-10.flavor: It's minions like these that give normal, law-abiding skeletons a bad rap.

2017-08-10.name: Blood-Queen Lana'thel
2017-08-10.text: [x]Lifesteal Has +1 Attack for each card you've discarded this game.
2017-08-10.flavor: As a young blood-princess she learned the proper way for a lady to curtsy, how to address fellow members of royalty, and how to bite them.

2017-08-10.name: Bloodworm
2017-08-10.text: Lifesteal
2017-08-10.flavor: Queen Lana'thel insists on one of these, fried, every morning for breakfast.

2017-08-10.name: Bolvar, Fireblood
2017-08-10.text: Divine Shield\nAfter a friendly minion loses_Divine Shield, gain +2 Attack.
2017-08-10.flavor: He's so hot right now.

2017-08-10.name: Bone Baron
2017-08-10.text: Deathrattle: Add two 1/1 Skeletons to your hand.
2017-08-10.flavor: "Oil," "Rail," and "Blubber" were already taken.

2017-08-10.name: Cobalt Scalebane
2017-08-10.text: At the end of your turn, give another random friendly minion +3 Attack.
2017-08-10.flavor: You get a sword! And you get a sword! Everybody gets a sword!

2017-08-10.name: Corpse Raiser
2017-08-10.text: [x]Battlecry: Give a friendly\nminion "Deathrattle:\n Resummon this minion."
2017-08-10.flavor: He was just minding his business, farming corpses, when you meddling adventurers came along.

2017-08-10.name: Corpse Widow
2017-08-10.text: Your Deathrattle cards cost_(2) less.
2017-08-10.flavor: Her marriage survived death, but it decayed pretty quickly after that.

2017-08-10.name: Death Revenant
2017-08-10.text: Battlecry: Gain +1/+1 for each damaged minion.
2017-08-10.flavor: How's everyone doing? Hurt? Bleeding? Wounded? ... Excellent.

2017-08-10.name: Despicable Dreadlord
2017-08-10.text: At the end of your turn, deal 1 damage to all enemy minions.
2017-08-10.flavor: He's deathspicable.

2017-08-10.name: Devour Mind
2017-08-10.text: Copy 3 cards in your opponent's deck and add them to your hand.
2017-08-10.flavor: A mind is a terrible thing to waste. Seconds, anyone?

2017-08-10.name: Fatespinner
2017-08-10.text: Choose a Deathrattle (Secretly) - Deal 3 damage to all minions; or Give them +2/+2.
2017-08-10.flavor: Her clothing? Pure silk, of course.

2017-08-10.name: Skelemancer
2017-08-10.text: Deathrattle: If it's your opponent's turn, summon an 8/8 Skeleton.
2017-08-10.flavor: What do you mean there's no such thing as "Skelemancy?" But "Dinomancy" is ok?

2017-08-10.name: Sunborne Val'kyr
2017-08-10.text: Battlecry: Give adjacent minions +2 Health.
2017-08-10.flavor: Bring valor to Odyn's halls, Champion!

2017-08-10.name: Thrall, Deathseer
2017-08-10.text: Battlecry: Transform your minions into random ones that cost (2) more.
2017-08-10.flavor: "Do not be afraid. Approach. The dead will sleep… for now."

2017-08-10.name: Tomb Lurker
2017-08-10.text: [x]Battlecry: Add a random\nDeathrattle minion that died\nthis game to your hand.
2017-08-10.flavor: She hangs out in all the tombs, but she rarely posts.

2017-08-10.name: Venomancer
2017-08-10.text: Poisonous
2017-08-10.flavor: Eight times the death of regular-mancers.

2017-08-10.name: Voodoo Hexxer
2017-08-10.text: Taunt\nFreeze any character damaged by this minion.
2017-08-10.flavor: The Silver Hand recruits shuddered in terror when they saw the dreaded totem of the Hexxer: A tiny little snowman, impaled with pins.

2017-08-10.name: Webweave
2017-08-10.text: Summon two 1/2 Poisonous Spiders.
2017-08-10.flavor: O, what a tangled web we weave, hoping spiders dodge the cleave.

2017-08-10.name: Blackguard
2017-08-10.text: Whenever your hero is healed, deal that much damage to a random enemy minion.
2017-08-10.flavor: "Did I ever tell you the story of when I single-handedly took down a 29/29 C'thun?" - Reno Jackson

2017-08-10.name: Bone Drake
2017-08-10.text: Deathrattle: Add a random Dragon to your hand.
2017-08-10.flavor: The bone drake brings all the dragons to the yard. He would teach you, but you have no cards.

2017-08-10.name: Deathstalker Rexxar
2017-08-10.text: [x]Battlecry: Deal 2 damage\nto all enemy minions.
2017-08-10.flavor: "You were too slow, old friend. The hunt began long ago. And now... it will never end."

2017-08-10.name: Embrace Darkness
2017-08-10.text: [x]Choose an enemy minion.\nAt the start of your turn,\ngain control of it.
2017-08-10.flavor: Once you both get comfortable, darkness is actually pretty snuggly.

2017-08-10.name: Furnacefire Colossus
2017-08-10.text: Battlecry: Discard all weapons from your hand and gain their stats.
2017-08-10.flavor: Smelts in his mouth, not in your hand.

2017-08-10.name: Moorabi
2017-08-10.text: Whenever another minion is Frozen, add a copy of it to your hand.
2017-08-10.flavor: Most disturbing is how Moorabi covers all those frozen minions with flavored syrup.

2017-08-10.name: Necrotic Geist
2017-08-10.text: Whenever one of your other minions dies, summon a 2/2 Ghoul.
2017-08-10.flavor: An eye for an eye, and a ghoul for a ghoul.

2017-08-10.name: Nerubian Unraveler
2017-08-10.text: Spells cost (2) more.
2017-08-10.flavor: He loves a good yarn.

2017-08-10.name: Shadow Essence
2017-08-10.text: Summon a 5/5 copy of_a random minion in_your deck.
2017-08-10.flavor: Difficult to bottle up and sell. But it packs a punch.

2017-08-10.name: Skulking Geist
2017-08-10.text: Battlecry: Destroy all\n1-Cost spells in both hands and decks.
2017-08-10.flavor: It's as though a million Jade Idols cried out, and were suddenly silenced.

2017-08-10.name: Spectral Pillager
2017-08-10.text: [x]Combo: Deal damage equal\nto the number of other cards\nyou've played this turn.
2017-08-10.flavor: It turns out you CAN take it with you.

2017-08-10.name: Spellweaver
2017-08-10.text: Spell Damage +2
2017-08-10.flavor: Spells offer twice the moisture wicking of cotton.

2017-08-10.name: Spreading Plague
2017-08-10.text: Summon a 1/5 Scarab with Taunt. If your_opponent has more minions, cast this again.
2017-08-10.flavor: In the past, plagues were spread by mice or fleas. These days they're spread by elves.

2017-08-10.name: Abominable Bowman
2017-08-10.text: [x]Deathrattle: Summon\na random friendly Beast\nthat died this game.
2017-08-10.flavor: Frosty the Bowman... was an angry hateful soul... with a fresh hewn bow and a missing nose...

2017-08-10.name: Archbishop Benedictus
2017-08-10.text: Battlecry: Shuffle a copy of_your opponent's deck into your deck.
2017-08-10.flavor: Nobody expects the Archbishop's Benediction!

2017-08-10.name: Malfurion the Pestilent
2017-08-10.text: [x]Choose One - Summon 2 Poisonous Spiders; or 2 Scarabs with Taunt.
2017-08-10.flavor: "Cenarius once taught me about the precarious balance between life and death. I have come to understand: there IS no balance. Death always wins."

2017-08-10.name: Bonemare
2017-08-10.text: Battlecry: Give a friendly minion +4/+4 and Taunt.
2017-08-10.flavor: Attacks her job with unbridled enthusiasm.

2017-08-10.name: Glacial Mysteries
2017-08-10.text: Put one of each Secret from your deck into\nthe battlefield.
2017-08-10.flavor: The secret is in the frosting.

2017-08-10.name: Rotface
2017-08-10.text: [x]After this minion survives damage, summon a random Legendary minion.
2017-08-10.flavor: Daddy! I think I made a Legendary!

2017-08-10.name: Scourgelord Garrosh
2017-08-10.text: Battlecry: Equip a 4/3_Shadowmourne that also damages adjacent minions.
2017-08-10.flavor: "You dare to challenge me? Come! Draw your last breath - and then, you are mine."

2017-08-10.name: Shadowreaper Anduin
2017-08-10.text: Battlecry: Destroy all minions with 5 or more_Attack.
2017-08-10.flavor: "I will tell you what Velen never taught me. Whosoever stands before the Light… inevitably casts a shadow."

2017-08-10.name: Sindragosa
2017-08-10.text: Battlecry: Summon two 0/1 Frozen Champions.
2017-08-10.flavor: "I recognize your effort but I think your magic still has room for improvement." - Sindragosa after taking a class on giving constructive feedback.

2017-08-10.name: The Lich King
2017-08-10.text: [x]Taunt At the end of your turn, add a random Death Knight card to your hand.
2017-08-10.flavor: "All that I am: anger, cruelty, vengeance, 8 attack - I bestow upon you, my chosen knight."

2017-08-10.name: Frost Lich Jaina
2017-08-10.text: [x]Battlecry: Summon a 3/6 Water Elemental. Your Elementals have Lifesteal this game.
2017-08-10.flavor: "Arthas was a spoiled child, playing with toys he could neither control nor understand. Come into the cold. I will show you the true power of the Frozen Throne."

2017-08-10.name: Hadronox
2017-08-10.text: Deathrattle: Summon your Taunt minions that\ndied this game.
2017-08-10.flavor: The viziers of Azjol-Nerub released Hadronox as a last-ditch effort to hold back the Lich King. They did so by VERY carefully scooping him up in a LARGE newspaper and releasing him.

2017-08-10.name: Obsidian Statue
2017-08-10.text: [x]Taunt, Lifesteal\nDeathrattle: Destroy a\n random enemy minion.
2017-08-10.flavor: The original artist spent many hours with a fine chisel perfecting the facial expression for maximum tauntiness.

2017-08-10.name: Uther of the Ebon Blade
2017-08-10.text: Battlecry: Equip a 5/3 Lifesteal weapon.
2017-08-10.flavor: "Step forward. Confess! Once I was a mere servant of the Light. Now I alone stand in judgement."

2017-08-10.name: Valeera the Hollow
2017-08-10.text: Battlecry: Gain Stealth until your next turn.
2017-08-10.flavor: "Run away. Hide in your precious keeps, behind your walls and your bodyguards. Night always falls, and shadows will fill your hallowed halls. One day, one of those shadows will be me."

2017-08-10.name: Bloodreaver Gul'dan
2017-08-10.text: Battlecry: Summon all friendly Demons that_died_this_game.
2017-08-10.flavor: "Still you refuse to bend your knee? None can escape death, you old fool. And in death… all will serve me…"

2017-08-10.name: Ultimate Infestation
2017-08-10.text: [x]Deal $5 damage. Draw\n5 cards. Gain 5 Armor.\nSummon a 5/5 Ghoul.
2017-08-10.flavor: Ghouls in the pipe, five by five.

2017-08-10.name: Snowfury Giant
2017-08-10.text: Costs (1) less for each Mana Crystal you've Overloaded this game.
2017-08-10.flavor: This minion goes all the way to 11!

2017-12-07.name: Shifting Scroll
2017-12-07.text: Each turn this is in your hand, transform it into a random Mage spell.
2017-12-07.flavor: Next turn, this is going to be AMAZING.

2017-12-07.name: Arcane Artificer
2017-12-07.text: Whenever you cast a spell, gain Armor equal to its_Cost.
2017-12-07.flavor: Ethereal armor dissipates in 6 hours which can cause extreme awkwardness for first time buyers.

2017-12-07.name: Barkskin
2017-12-07.text: Give a minion +3 Health. Gain 3 Armor.
2017-12-07.flavor: Make like a tree… and gain armor.

2017-12-07.name: Candleshot
2017-12-07.text: Your hero is Immune while attacking.
2017-12-07.flavor: Once called Cahn’delar, Shortbow of the Ancient Whisker.

2017-12-07.name: Dark Pact
2017-12-07.text: Destroy a friendly minion. Restore #4 Health to your hero.
2017-12-07.flavor: "Don't worry about the fine print. Just sign here."

2017-12-07.name: Dire Mole
2017-12-07.flavor: You especially don't want to make a dire mountain out of a dire mole hill.

2017-12-07.name: Feral Gibberer
2017-12-07.text: After this minion attacks a hero, add a copy of it to_your hand.
2017-12-07.flavor: It's certainly not civilized gibbering.

2017-12-07.name: Gravelsnout Knight
2017-12-07.text: Battlecry: Summon a random 1-Cost minion for_your opponent.
2017-12-07.flavor: The mole of La Mancha rides again!

2017-12-07.name: Kingsbane
2017-12-07.text: [x]Always keeps enchantments. Deathrattle: Shuffle this into your deck.
2017-12-07.flavor: But it has a soft spot for emperors.

2017-12-07.name: Kobold Librarian
2017-12-07.text: Battlecry: Draw a card. Deal 2 damage to your_hero.
2017-12-07.flavor: Kobolds sort books using a gooey decimal system.

2017-12-07.name: Lesser Jasper Spellstone
2017-12-07.text: Deal $2 damage to a minion. @(Gain 3 Armor to upgrade.)
2017-12-07.flavor:
In ancient woods, elves fought the curse
The demon’s shadow to disperse
But hatred raged and frail souls turned
Now horned and hooved their forests burned.

2017-12-07.name: Psionic Probe
2017-12-07.text: Copy a spell in your opponent's deck and add it to your hand.
2017-12-07.flavor: She prefers calling it "Psionic Tickling."

2017-12-07.name: Unstable Evolution
2017-12-07.text: Transform a friendly minion into\none that costs (1) more. Repeatable this turn.
2017-12-07.flavor: They grow up so fast.

2017-12-07.name: Wax Elemental
2017-12-07.text: Taunt\nDivine Shield
2017-12-07.flavor: Takes double damage from wick-based weapons.

2017-12-07.name: Bladed Gauntlet
2017-12-07.text: Has Attack equal to your Armor. Can't attack heroes.
2017-12-07.flavor: CAUTION: DO NOT SCRATCH NOSE.

2017-12-07.name: Cavern Shinyfinder
2017-12-07.text: Battlecry: Draw a weapon from your deck.
2017-12-07.flavor: They call her the candled vandal.

2017-12-07.name: Cheat Death
2017-12-07.text: Secret: When a friendly minion dies, return it to your hand.\nIt costs (2) less.
2017-12-07.flavor: Reported.

2017-12-07.name: Crushing Hand
2017-12-07.text: Deal $8 damage to a minion. Overload: (3)
2017-12-07.flavor: Shamans always have the firmest handshakes.

2017-12-07.name: Drygulch Jailor
2017-12-07.text: Deathrattle: Add 3 Silver_Hand Recruits to_your_hand.
2017-12-07.flavor: Hard time: 6-10 turns for candle-nappin'.

2017-12-07.name: Drywhisker Armorer
2017-12-07.text: Battlecry: For each enemy minion, gain 2 Armor.
2017-12-07.flavor: Kobolds use anything for armor: Pots, pans, garbage cans… even other kobolds.

2017-12-07.name: Evasion
2017-12-07.text: Secret: After your hero takes damage, become Immune this turn.
2017-12-07.flavor: Works on weapons, missiles, and taxes.

2017-12-07.name: Kobold Hermit
2017-12-07.text: Battlecry: Choose a basic Totem. Summon it.
2017-12-07.flavor: To truly understand candles, it takes YEARS of quiet contemplation.

2017-12-07.name: Lesser Pearl Spellstone
2017-12-07.text: Summon a 2/2 Spirit with Taunt. @(Restore 3 Health to upgrade.)
2017-12-07.flavor:
In ages old, when Ancients broke
Azari of the Legion spoke
To tempt the mortals: gems of power
 The weak succumbed, their souls devoured.

2017-12-07.name: Lesser Ruby Spellstone
2017-12-07.text: Add 1 random Mage spell to your hand. @(Play 2 Elementals to_upgrade.)
2017-12-07.flavor:
The final stone undid its master
Spun into wards by nameless caster
Azari wailed a savage roar
Now sealed in nether, evermore.

2017-12-07.name: Murmuring Elemental
2017-12-07.text: Battlecry: Your next Battlecry this turn triggers_twice.
2017-12-07.flavor: Déjà Dude.

2017-12-07.name: Plated Beetle
2017-12-07.text: Deathrattle: Gain 3 Armor.
2017-12-07.flavor: "Ok, your party has defeated the beetle." "I put it on my head." "What?" "I put it on my head. Like a hat."

2017-12-07.name: Potion of Heroism
2017-12-07.text: Give a minion Divine_Shield.\nDraw a card.
2017-12-07.flavor: Also known as "Liquid Courage."

2017-12-07.name: Raven Familiar
2017-12-07.text: Battlecry: Reveal a spell in each deck. If yours costs more, draw it.
2017-12-07.flavor: Quoth the raven, 'Does yours cost more?'

2017-12-07.name: Scorp-o-matic
2017-12-07.text: Battlecry: Destroy a minion with 1 or less Attack.
2017-12-07.flavor: Back in my day, we had to manually scorp.

2017-12-07.name: Sudden Betrayal
2017-12-07.text: Secret: When a minion attacks your hero, instead it attacks one of_its neighbors.
2017-12-07.flavor: You thought he was your bro-bold, but turns out he's your foe-bold.

2017-12-07.name: Vulgar Homunculus
2017-12-07.text: Taunt\nBattlecry: Deal 2 damage to your hero.
2017-12-07.flavor: Fortunately he has an even number of fingers.

2017-12-07.name: Wandering Monster
2017-12-07.text: Secret: When an enemy attacks your hero, summon a 3-Cost minion as the new target.
2017-12-07.flavor: Not all who wander are lost. This one is lost though, for sure.

2017-12-07.name: Benevolent Djinn
2017-12-07.text: At the end of your turn, restore #3 Health to your_hero.
2017-12-07.flavor: Wish #1: funnel cakes. Wish #2: funnel cakes. Wish #3: FUNNEL CAKES.

2017-12-07.name: Boisterous Bard
2017-12-07.text: Battlecry: Give your other minions +1 Health.
2017-12-07.flavor: As a kid, she fought with rocks.  Now she fights with ROCK!

2017-12-07.name: Cave Hydra
2017-12-07.text: Also damages the minions next to whomever\nthis attacks.
2017-12-07.flavor: Can be upgraded into a Cave Lurker.

2017-12-07.name: Dragon Soul
2017-12-07.text: After you cast 3 spells in a turn, summon a 5/5 Dragon.
2017-12-07.flavor: Crafted by Deathwing's goblin horde, but the dragon added the rainbow sparkles himself.

2017-12-07.name: Dragonslayer
2017-12-07.text: Battlecry: Deal 6 damage to a Dragon.
2017-12-07.flavor: A pair of stout dwarves nearly averted the Cataclysm.

2017-12-07.name: Explosive Runes
2017-12-07.text: Secret: After your opponent plays a minion, deal $6 damage to it and any excess to their hero.
2017-12-07.flavor: Sometimes it's safer NOT to read the warning signs.

2017-12-07.name: Fungal Enchanter
2017-12-07.text: Battlecry: Restore #2 Health to all friendly characters.
2017-12-07.flavor: Qualifications: Born with pointy hat.

2017-12-07.name: Gilded Gargoyle
2017-12-07.text: Deathrattle: Add a Coin to your hand.
2017-12-07.flavor: You hear a coin rattling inside the slotted gargoyle...What could it mean?

2017-12-07.name: Greedy Sprite
2017-12-07.text: Deathrattle: Gain an empty Mana Crystal.
2017-12-07.flavor: Sparkliest of the seven deadly sprites.

2017-12-07.name: Healing Rain
2017-12-07.text: Restore #12 Health randomly split among all friendly characters.
2017-12-07.flavor: It's filled with electrolytes!

2017-12-07.name: Kobold Apprentice
2017-12-07.text: Battlecry: Deal 3 damage randomly split among all_enemies.
2017-12-07.flavor: Horrible secret: The Darkness is immune to Arcane Missiles.

2017-12-07.name: Kobold Barbarian
2017-12-07.text: At the start of your turn, attack a random enemy.
2017-12-07.flavor: What is best in life? To make candle. To keep candle. To hear lamentations of candle-takers.

2017-12-07.name: Lone Champion
2017-12-07.text: Battlecry: If you control no other minions, gain Taunt and Divine Shield.
2017-12-07.flavor: He is a champion, with no friends. He'll keep on fighting, til the end!

2017-12-07.name: Primal Talismans
2017-12-07.text: Give your minions "Deathrattle: Summon a random basic Totem."
2017-12-07.flavor: All that remained from the first kobold colony: a single talisman and the word "Flamestrike."

2017-12-07.name: Reckless Flurry
2017-12-07.text: Spend all your Armor. Deal that much damage to all minions.
2017-12-07.flavor: Look. Cautious Flurries will only get you so far in life.

2017-12-07.name: Rummaging Kobold
2017-12-07.text: Battlecry: Return one of your destroyed weapons to your hand.
2017-12-07.flavor: "Broken longsword is brand new shortsword." - Kobold Proverb

2017-12-07.name: Sewer Crawler
2017-12-07.text: Battlecry: Summon a 2/3_Giant Rat.
2017-12-07.flavor: His clothing is "ratty" in more ways than one.

2017-12-07.name: Shrieking Shroom
2017-12-07.text: At the end of your turn, summon a random\n1-Cost minion.
2017-12-07.flavor: Auditioning for the next Fungal Idol.

2017-12-07.name: Sonya Shadowdancer
2017-12-07.text: After a friendly minion dies, add a 1/1 copy of it to your hand. It costs (1).
2017-12-07.flavor: Love like you've never been hurt. Dance like a 1/1 is watching.

2017-12-07.name: Stoneskin Basilisk
2017-12-07.text: Divine Shield\n Poisonous
2017-12-07.flavor: He got that way from looking into a mirror.

2017-12-07.name: Toothy Chest
2017-12-07.text: At the start of your turn, set this minion's Attack to 4.
2017-12-07.flavor: Do you want to eat an adventurer?  I want to eat an adventurer!

2017-12-07.name: Twilight Acolyte
2017-12-07.text: Battlecry: If you're holding\na Dragon, swap this minion's Attack with another minion's.
2017-12-07.flavor: The dragons mostly keep him around as a snack.

2017-12-07.name: Twilight's Call
2017-12-07.text: Summon 1/1 copies of 2 friendly Deathrattle minions\nthat died this game.
2017-12-07.flavor: If you’re experiencing resurrection sickness, press 1.

2017-12-07.name: Unidentified Elixir
2017-12-07.text: Give a minion +2/+2. Gains a bonus effect in_your hand.
2017-12-07.flavor: "Here, taste this." (Slurp) "What is it?" "I don't know, I found it in one of the labs."

2017-12-07.name: Unidentified Maul
2017-12-07.text: Gains a bonus effect in_your hand.
2017-12-07.flavor: When all you have is an unidentified maul, everything else looks like an unidentified nail.

2017-12-07.name: Void Ripper
2017-12-07.text: Battlecry: Swap the\nAttack and Health of all_other_minions.
2017-12-07.flavor: You had to put the portable hole inside the bag of holding, didn't you?!

2017-12-07.name: Zola the Gorgon
2017-12-07.text: Battlecry: Choose a friendly minion. Add a Golden copy of it to your hand.
2017-12-07.flavor: Her name seems a bit cheesy.

2017-12-07.name: Astral Tiger
2017-12-07.text: Deathrattle: Shuffle a\n copy of this minion into_your_deck.
2017-12-07.flavor: Astral kitty litter is surprisingly hard to find.

2017-12-07.name: Branching Paths
2017-12-07.text: [x]Choose Twice - Draw a\ncard; Give your minions \n+1 Attack; Gain 6 Armor.
2017-12-07.flavor: Three paths diverged in a darkened hall, and I –\nI took the one less traveled by,\nAnd got eaten by a slime.

2017-12-07.name: Cataclysm
2017-12-07.text: Destroy all minions. Discard your hand.
2017-12-07.flavor: RUN FROM SKY CANDLES! THEY BURN! RUN!

2017-12-07.name: Cursed Disciple
2017-12-07.text: Deathrattle: Summon a 5/1 Revenant.
2017-12-07.flavor: Politer than his brother, the cursing disciple, but far more evil.

2017-12-07.name: Duskbreaker
2017-12-07.text: Battlecry: If you're holding\na Dragon, deal 3 damage to all other minions.
2017-12-07.flavor: Waking up at the break of dusk is just not as impressive.

2017-12-07.name: Ebon Dragonsmith
2017-12-07.text: Battlecry: Reduce the Cost of a random weapon in your hand by (2).
2017-12-07.flavor: Having a furnace-mouth is really handy for a blacksmith.

2017-12-07.name: Elven Minstrel
2017-12-07.text: Combo: Draw 2 minions from your deck.
2017-12-07.flavor: "After that gig in Hamlin went south, I swore off rats."

2017-12-07.name: Fal'dorei Strider
2017-12-07.text: [x]Battlecry: Shuffle 3 Ambushes into your deck. When drawn, summon a 4/4 Spider.
2017-12-07.flavor: What’s worse? Seeing the spider, or NOT seeing the spider, but knowing it’s somewhere in your deck?

2017-12-07.name: Flanking Strike
2017-12-07.text: Deal $3 damage to a minion. Summon a 3/3 Wolf.
2017-12-07.flavor: Wolves to the left and arrows to the right, here I am stuck in the middle with you.

2017-12-07.name: Hoarding Dragon
2017-12-07.text: Deathrattle: Give your opponent two Coins.
2017-12-07.flavor: Keeps his two cents to himself.

2017-12-07.name: Hooked Reaver
2017-12-07.text: Battlecry: If you have 15 or_less Health, gain +3/+3_and Taunt.
2017-12-07.flavor: The hook is just an accessory. He can reave just fine without it.

2017-12-07.name: Ironwood Golem
2017-12-07.text: Taunt\nCan only attack if you have 3 or more Armor.
2017-12-07.flavor: Marketed as a "rust-proof iron golem."

2017-12-07.name: Kobold Illusionist
2017-12-07.text: Deathrattle: Summon a 1/1 copy of a minion from your hand.
2017-12-07.flavor: He can make ANYTHING look like a candle.

2017-12-07.name: Kobold Monk
2017-12-07.text: Your hero can't be targeted by spells or Hero_Powers.
2017-12-07.flavor: There is no candle.

2017-12-07.name: Lesser Amethyst Spellstone
2017-12-07.text: Lifesteal. Deal $3 damage to a minion. (Take damage from your cards to upgrade.)
2017-12-07.flavor:
A purple stone Azari carved
For dark hearts, craving, power-starved.
The first to bow, the warlock Rin,
Embraced the darkness, slew her kin.

2017-12-07.name: Leyline Manipulator
2017-12-07.text: Battlecry: If you're holding any cards that didn't start in your deck, reduce their Cost by (2).
2017-12-07.flavor: The shortest distance between two points is a leyline.

2017-12-07.name: Oaken Summons
2017-12-07.text: Gain 6 Armor.\nRecruit a minion that costs (4) or less.
2017-12-07.flavor: The Guild used oak trees until they all turned to ash.

2017-12-07.name: Shimmering Courser
2017-12-07.text: Only you can target\nthis with spells and\nHero Powers.
2017-12-07.flavor: A courser is a courser of course, of course, she's more of a unicorn than a horse...

2017-12-07.name: Shroom Brewer
2017-12-07.text: Battlecry: Restore #4_Health.
2017-12-07.flavor: Side effects guaranteed!

2017-12-07.name: Sneaky Devil
2017-12-07.text: Stealth\nYour other minions have +1 Attack.
2017-12-07.flavor: The result of a tragic accident involving a Defias Thug, a Wand of Polymorph, and a bundle of Fel Lotus.

2017-12-07.name: The Darkness
2017-12-07.text: [x]Starts Dormant. Battlecry: Shuffle 3 Candles into the enemy deck. When drawn, this awakens.
2017-12-07.flavor: I would rather light a single candle than curse the darkness. But I'm willing to do both.

2017-12-07.name: Twig of the World Tree
2017-12-07.text: Deathrattle: Gain 10 Mana Crystals.
2017-12-07.flavor: For druids who want to branch out.

2017-12-07.name: Arcane Tyrant
2017-12-07.text: Costs (0) if you've cast a spell that costs (5) or more this turn.
2017-12-07.flavor: Tyrant is such a strong word.

2017-12-07.name: Call to Arms
2017-12-07.text: [x]Recruit 3 minions that\n cost (2) or less.
2017-12-07.flavor: More personal than a text to arms.

2017-12-07.name: Carnivorous Cube
2017-12-07.text: Battlecry: Destroy\na friendly minion.\nDeathrattle: Summon 2 copies of it.
2017-12-07.flavor: He's always grumpy until he's eaten his first barista of the morning.

2017-12-07.name: Corrosive Sludge
2017-12-07.text: Battlecry: Destroy your opponent's weapon.
2017-12-07.flavor: The result of centuries of terrible sanitation.

2017-12-07.name: Deck of Wonders
2017-12-07.text: Shuffle 5 Scrolls into your deck. When drawn, cast a random spell.
2017-12-07.flavor: "Pick a card, any card. Wait! No! Not that one!" - Last words of previous owner

2017-12-07.name: Dragon's Fury
2017-12-07.text: Reveal a spell from your deck. Deal damage equal to its Cost to all_minions.
2017-12-07.flavor: “C’mon Hucklemuck. She’ll never notice if we take just one little coin.”

2017-12-07.name: Fungalmancer
2017-12-07.text: Battlecry: Give adjacent minions +2/+2.
2017-12-07.flavor: Fungalmancy is the easy major for those who can't cut it at Waxmancy.

2017-12-07.name: Furbolg Mossbinder
2017-12-07.text: Battlecry: Transform a friendly minion into a 6/6_Elemental.
2017-12-07.flavor: Behold, the unstoppable power of MOSS!

2017-12-07.name: Green Jelly
2017-12-07.text: At the end of your turn, summon a 1/2 Ooze with_Taunt.
2017-12-07.flavor: This card really breaks out of the mold.

2017-12-07.name: Guild Recruiter
2017-12-07.text: Battlecry: Recruit a minion that costs (4) or less.
2017-12-07.flavor: The original telemarketer.

2017-12-07.name: Ixlid, Fungal Lord
2017-12-07.text: After you play a minion, summon a copy of it.
2017-12-07.flavor: We suggest crafting Ixlid; he'll grow on you. Literally.

2017-12-07.name: Lesser Emerald Spellstone
2017-12-07.text: Summon two 3/3_Wolves. (Play a Secret to upgrade.)
2017-12-07.flavor:
An emerald stone for Tauren hands
Who sought its strength to save their lands
Their tribes now lost, their rage released
Who’s hunting now? And who’s the beast?

2017-12-07.name: Lesser Onyx Spellstone
2017-12-07.text: Destroy 1 random enemy minion.\n@(Play 3 Deathrattle cards to upgrade.)
2017-12-07.flavor:
The trolls of old embraced the gift
A jewel of black for daggers swift
No party lasts who finds the stone
Those wielding it soon stand alone.

2017-12-07.name: Skull of the Man'ari
2017-12-07.text: At the start of your turn, summon a Demon from your hand.
2017-12-07.flavor: Don't trust the skull.

2017-12-07.name: Trogg Gloomeater
2017-12-07.text: Taunt\nPoisonous
2017-12-07.flavor: His breath smells like agony and despair, which is still better than most troggs.

2017-12-07.name: Windshear Stormcaller
2017-12-07.text: Battlecry: If you control all 4 basic Totems, summon Al'Akir_the_Windlord.
2017-12-07.flavor: Don't ever doubt Al'Akir's love for basic totems.

2017-12-07.name: Aluneth
2017-12-07.text: At the end of your turn, draw 3 cards.
2017-12-07.flavor: PHENOMENAL ARCANE POWER…itty bitty living space.

2017-12-07.name: Crystal Lion
2017-12-07.text: [x]Divine Shield\nCosts (1) less for each Silver\nHand Recruit you control.
2017-12-07.flavor: Standard issue recruit gear: 1 silver sword, 1 Lordaeron insignia, 2 bags of crystal kibble.

2017-12-07.name: Gather Your Party
2017-12-07.text: Recruit a minion.
2017-12-07.flavor: Thrilling adventure! Danger guaranteed! Loot uncertain! Death optional!  Who’s with me?

2017-12-07.name: Gemstudded Golem
2017-12-07.text: Taunt\nCan only attack if you have 5 or more Armor.
2017-12-07.flavor: Perfectly accessorized to attract adventurers.

2017-12-07.name: Grumble, Worldshaker
2017-12-07.text: Battlecry: Return your other minions to your hand. They cost (1).
2017-12-07.flavor: The grumbling grew to a mighty rumbling, and out of the caverns the kobolds came tumbling.

2017-12-07.name: Hungry Ettin
2017-12-07.text: Taunt\nBattlecry: Summon a random 2-Cost minion for your opponent.
2017-12-07.flavor: How can he be hungry… if he's Ettin!?

2017-12-07.name: Level Up!
2017-12-07.text: Give your Silver Hand Recruits +2/+2 and_Taunt.
2017-12-07.flavor: Ding!\n\nGrats.

2017-12-07.name: Possessed Lackey
2017-12-07.text: Deathrattle: Recruit a_Demon.
2017-12-07.flavor: If you don't keep up with your payments, it'll be a repossessed lackey.

2017-12-07.name: Rin, the First Disciple
2017-12-07.text: Taunt\nDeathrattle: Add 'The First Seal' to your hand.
2017-12-07.flavor: Signed and sealed, she delivers oblivion.

2017-12-07.name: Seeping Oozeling
2017-12-07.text: Battlecry: Gain the Deathrattle of a random minion in your deck.
2017-12-07.flavor: Uh, you might want to get that looked at.

2017-12-07.name: Spiteful Summoner
2017-12-07.text: [x]Battlecry: Reveal a spell from your deck. Summon a random minion with the same Cost.
2017-12-07.flavor: Sometimes she'll summon a Doomsayer. Out of spite.

2017-12-07.name: To My Side!
2017-12-07.text: [x]Summon an Animal\nCompanion, or 2 if your\ndeck has no minions.
2017-12-07.flavor: I hunt alone.  Well, me and Misha.  And Huffer.  And Leokk.

2017-12-07.name: Unidentified Shield
2017-12-07.text: Gain 5 Armor.\nGains a bonus effect in_your hand.
2017-12-07.flavor: The kobold stared at the bundle for a long time. “Ah hah!” he said. “It’s a shield.”

2017-12-07.name: Val'anyr
2017-12-07.text: Deathrattle: Give a minion in your hand +4/+2. When it dies, reequip this.
2017-12-07.flavor: Recently unearthed in one of the deepest kobold caves. Traded for a large candle.

2017-12-07.name: Corridor Creeper
2017-12-07.text: Costs (1) less whenever a minion dies while this is_in_your hand.
2017-12-07.flavor: It likes the smell of dead things, which is curious, as it has no visible nose.

2017-12-07.name: Crushing Walls
2017-12-07.text: Destroy your opponent's left and right-most minions.
2017-12-07.flavor: "It could be worse!" "It's worse."

2017-12-07.name: Lesser Diamond Spellstone
2017-12-07.text: Resurrect 2 different friendly minions. @(Cast 4 spells to upgrade.)
2017-12-07.flavor:
A diamond, white, this stone the eighth
A precious jewel for those of faith
A whispered prayer restores the lost
But none among them know the cost.

2017-12-07.name: Lesser Mithril Spellstone
2017-12-07.text: Summon one 5/5 Mithril Golem. (Equip a weapon to upgrade.)
2017-12-07.flavor:
To dwarves of stone the demon called
With promises of might, enthralled
In grasping greed they found their doom
Forever bound in mithril tombs.

2017-12-07.name: Lesser Sapphire Spellstone
2017-12-07.text: Summon 1 copy of a friendly minion. @(Overload 3 Mana Crystals to upgrade.)
2017-12-07.flavor:
A stone of blue, embraced with glee
By murloc lords beneath the sea
Soon numberless they swarmed the shore
First two, then four, then more...and more...

2017-12-07.name: Lynessa Sunsorrow
2017-12-07.text: [x]Battlecry: Cast each spell\nyou cast on your minions\n this game on this one.
2017-12-07.flavor: A diet of pure magic is great for the complexion but wreaks havoc on one's mood.

2017-12-07.name: Psychic Scream
2017-12-07.text: Shuffle all minions into your opponent's deck.
2017-12-07.flavor: Everybody! Hit the deck!

2017-12-07.name: Rhok'delar
2017-12-07.text: Battlecry: If your deck has no minions, fill your_hand with Hunter_spells.
2017-12-07.flavor: Rhok'delar is ready to Rhok'de'casbah!

2017-12-07.name: Silver Vanguard
2017-12-07.text: Deathrattle: Recruit an\n8-Cost minion.
2017-12-07.flavor: Float like a Faerie Dragon, sting like a Hivequeen.

2017-12-07.name: Temporus
2017-12-07.text: Battlecry: Your opponent takes two turns. Then you take two turns.
2017-12-07.flavor: Follows adventurers, seeking the ultimate time magic: the ability to reload.

2017-12-07.name: Geosculptor Yip
2017-12-07.text: At the end of your turn, summon a random minion with_Cost_equal_to_your Armor (up to 10).
2017-12-07.flavor: Once crafted a gauntlet out of earwax and pure ambition.

2017-12-07.name: Grand Archivist
2017-12-07.text: At the end of your turn, cast a spell from your deck (targets chosen randomly).
2017-12-07.flavor: Qualifications: Found pointy hat.

2017-12-07.name: Grizzled Guardian
2017-12-07.text: Taunt\nDeathrattle: Recruit 2_minions that cost (4)_or_less.
2017-12-07.flavor: Favorite sandwich? Grizzled cheese.

2017-12-07.name: Kathrena Winterwisp
2017-12-07.text: Battlecry and Deathrattle: Recruit a Beast.
2017-12-07.flavor: She’s not one of those treehugger elves – but she does like the occasional cuddle.

2017-12-07.name: King Togwaggle
2017-12-07.text: [x]Battlecry: Swap decks with your opponent. Give them a Ransom spell to swap back.
2017-12-07.flavor: Management of the Kobold Empire requires a careful balance between a lack of social services and fiscal irresponsibility.

2017-12-07.name: Marin the Fox
2017-12-07.text: Battlecry: Summon a 0/8 Treasure Chest for your opponent. (Break it for awesome loot!)
2017-12-07.flavor: My name is Marin the Fox. You took my treasure. Prepare to die.

2017-12-07.name: The Runespear
2017-12-07.text: After your hero attacks, Discover a spell\nand cast it with random targets.
2017-12-07.flavor: When asked what the runes do, the tauren smith smiled: "A little of this, a little of that..."

2017-12-07.name: Violet Wurm
2017-12-07.text: Deathrattle: Summon seven 1/1 Grubs.
2017-12-07.flavor: It's wurms all the way down.

2017-12-07.name: Woecleaver
2017-12-07.text: After your hero attacks, Recruit a minion.
2017-12-07.flavor: Turn that frown into TWO frowns!

2017-12-07.name: Dragoncaller Alanna
2017-12-07.text: Battlecry: Summon a 5/5 Dragon for each spell you cast this game that costs (5) or more.
2017-12-07.flavor: Her secret is using a gentle voice and carrying a baggie of hotdogs.

2017-12-07.name: Dragonhatcher
2017-12-07.text: At the end of your turn, Recruit a Dragon.
2017-12-07.flavor: Which came first?  The dragon or the dragonhatcher?

2017-12-07.name: Master Oakheart
2017-12-07.text: Battlecry: Recruit a 1, 2, and 3-Attack minion.
2017-12-07.flavor: His adventuring party consists of Goldshire Footman, Frostwolf Grunt and Hadronox.

2017-12-07.name: Sleepy Dragon
2017-12-07.text: Taunt
2017-12-07.flavor: Local villagers call her "Naps Under the Mountain."

2017-12-07.name: Voidlord
2017-12-07.text: [x]Taunt\n Deathrattle: Summon three\n1/3 Demons with Taunt.
2017-12-07.flavor: Never let it hold your checkbook.

2018-04-12.name: Zap!
2018-04-12.text: Deal $2 damage to a minion. Overload: (1)
2018-04-12.flavor: The material components for this spell are wool socks and a rug.

2018-04-12.name: Blazing Invocation
2018-04-12.text: Discover a Battlecry minion.
2018-04-12.flavor: A lot of shaman have started vaping their invocations.

2018-04-12.name: Chameleos
2018-04-12.text: Each turn this is in your hand, transform it into a card your opponent is holding.
2018-04-12.flavor: He's everyone you want to be.

2018-04-12.name: Dark Possession
2018-04-12.text: Deal $2 damage to a friendly character. Discover a Demon.
