2019-04-09.flavor: Them’s fightin’ words!

2019-04-09.name: Heistbaron Togwaggle
2019-04-09.text: Battlecry: If you control a_Lackey, choose a fantastic treasure.
2019-04-09.flavor: A staunch ally of Rafaam, at least while the shinies keep flowing.

2019-04-09.name: Mad Summoner
2019-04-09.text: [x]Battlecry: Fill each player's\nboard with 1/1 Imps.
2019-04-09.flavor: Does he summon because of his madness, or is he mad from all the summoning?

2019-04-09.name: Oblivitron
2019-04-09.text: [x]Deathrattle: Summon a\nMech from your hand and\ntrigger its Deathrattle.
2019-04-09.flavor: Reduce, reuse, re-rattle!

2019-04-09.name: Portal Overfiend
2019-04-09.text: [x]Battlecry: Shuffle 3 Portals into your deck. When drawn, summon a 2/2 Demon with Rush.
2019-04-09.flavor: It’s like an interdimensional game of demon tag.

2019-04-09.name: Safeguard
2019-04-09.text: [x]Taunt\nDeathrattle: Summon a 0/5\nVault Safe with Taunt.
2019-04-09.flavor: Keep it secret. Keep it safeguarded!

2019-04-09.name: Unidentified Contract
2019-04-09.text: Destroy a minion. Gains a bonus effect in_your hand.
2019-04-09.flavor: The terms of service are constantly changing.

2019-04-09.name: Unleash the Beast
2019-04-09.text: Twinspell\nSummon a 5/5 Wyvern with Rush.
2019-04-09.flavor: The Kirin Tor have always been lax in enforcing leash laws.

2019-04-09.name: Unseen Saboteur
2019-04-09.text: Battlecry: Your opponent casts a random spell from their hand (targets chosen randomly).
2019-04-09.flavor: Far more effective than the flamboyant saboteur.

2019-04-09.name: Violet Warden
2019-04-09.text: Taunt\nSpell Damage +1
2019-04-09.flavor: He's got magic, a shield, and an unwavering obsession with the color purple.

2019-04-09.name: Arch-Villain Rafaam
2019-04-09.text: Taunt\nBattlecry: Replace your hand and deck with Legendary minions.
2019-04-09.flavor: Minions must wash hands before being LIQUIDATED AND REPLACED BY SOMEONE BETTER.

2019-04-09.name: Blastmaster Boom
2019-04-09.text: [x]Battlecry: Summon two 1/1\nBoom Bots for each Bomb\nin your opponent's deck.
2019-04-09.flavor: He's gonna fly through the air with the greatest of grease.

2019-04-09.name: Chef Nomi
2019-04-09.text: Battlecry: If your deck is empty, summon six 6/6 Greasefire_Elementals.
2019-04-09.flavor: His cooking is always very well done.

2019-04-09.name: Exotic Mountseller
2019-04-09.text: Whenever you cast a spell, summon a random\n3-Cost Beast.
2019-04-09.flavor: *Taps roof of mammoth* “You can fit so many squirrels in this thing!”

2019-04-09.name: Swampqueen Hagatha
2019-04-09.text: [x]Battlecry: Add a 5/5\nHorror to your hand. Teach\nit two Shaman spells.
2019-04-09.flavor: Rafaam mainly enjoys working with Hagatha because she never laughs at Dr. Boom's jokes.

2019-04-09.name: Tak Nozwhisker
2019-04-09.text: [x]Whenever you shuffle a\ncard into your deck, add\na copy to your hand.
2019-04-09.flavor: "One for me and one for future me!"

2019-04-09.name: Tunnel Blaster
2019-04-09.text: [x]Taunt\nDeathrattle: Deal 3 damage\nto all minions.
2019-04-09.flavor: And you always thought they wore the candles just for fun.

2019-04-09.name: Underbelly Ooze
2019-04-09.text: After this minion survives damage, summon a copy_of it.
2019-04-09.flavor: It's always accepting of the less successful adventurers.

2019-04-09.name: Vereesa Windrunner
2019-04-09.text: Battlecry: Equip Thori'dal, the Stars' Fury.
2019-04-09.flavor: Good things come in threes: Windrunner sisters and arrows of Thori'dal.

2019-04-09.name: Batterhead
2019-04-09.text: Rush. After this attacks and kills a minion, it may_attack again.
2019-04-09.flavor: When it comes to problem-solving, he always uses his head.

2019-04-09.name: Catrina Muerte
2019-04-09.text: [x]At the end of your turn,\nsummon a friendly minion\nthat died this game.
2019-04-09.flavor: She always manages to lift your spirits.

2019-04-09.name: Fel Lord Betrug
2019-04-09.text: [x]Whenever you draw a minion, summon a copy with Rush that dies at end of turn.
2019-04-09.flavor: Nobody else likes rush hour.

2019-04-09.name: Heroic Innkeeper
2019-04-09.text: Taunt. Battlecry: Gain +2/+2 for each other friendly minion.
2019-04-09.flavor: We reserve the right to refuse service to any 1/1.

2019-04-09.name: Jepetto Joybuzz
2019-04-09.text: Battlecry: Draw 2 minions from your deck. Set their Attack, Health, and Cost to 1.
2019-04-09.flavor: “I’m a real toy now!”

2019-04-09.name: Lucentbark
2019-04-09.text: Taunt\nDeathrattle: Go Dormant. Restore 5 Health to awaken this minion.
2019-04-09.flavor: Always feels refreshed after a little dirt nap.

2019-04-09.name: Power of Creation
2019-04-09.text: Discover a 6-Cost minion. Summon two copies of it.
2019-04-09.flavor: Mostly used for party tricks, to be honest.

2019-04-09.name: The Forest's Aid
2019-04-09.text: Twinspell\nSummon five 2/2 Treants.
2019-04-09.flavor: Delicious Forest’s Aid! Made from real forests.

2019-04-09.name: Walking Fountain
2019-04-09.text: Lifesteal, Rush, Windfury
2019-04-09.flavor: The weirdest part is that it doesn't have legs.

2019-04-09.name: Whirlwind Tempest
2019-04-09.text: Your minions with Windfury have Mega-Windfury.
2019-04-09.flavor: And your minions with mega-windfury get... dizzy.

2019-04-09.name: Archivist Elysiana
2019-04-09.text: Battlecry: Discover 5 cards. Replace your deck with 2_copies of each.
2019-04-09.flavor: Your deck is just another organizational challenge to her.

2019-04-09.name: Burly Shovelfist
2019-04-09.text: Rush
2019-04-09.flavor: Shovel beats paper and rock!

2019-04-09.name: Mass Resurrection
2019-04-09.text: Summon 3 friendly minions that died\nthis game.
2019-04-09.flavor: One's company, two's a crowd, and three's a “mass” resurrection, apparently.

2019-04-09.name: Big Bad Archmage
2019-04-09.text: At the end of your turn, summon a random\n6-Cost minion.
2019-04-09.flavor: "My, my, what big minions I have!"

2019-04-09.name: Dimensional Ripper
2019-04-09.text: Summon 2 copies of a minion in your deck.
2019-04-09.flavor: The first dimensional ripper had a point.\nThe second fell flat.\nThe THIRD one really started to take shape!

2019-04-09.name: Jumbo Imp
2019-04-09.text: Costs (1) less whenever a friendly Demon dies while this is in your hand.
2019-04-09.flavor: Jumbo in size! Huge in E.V.I.L.!

2019-04-09.name: Kalecgos
2019-04-09.text: Your first spell each turn costs (0). Battlecry: Discover a spell.
2019-04-09.flavor: He was once the Aspect of Magic but gave it up to focus on cheap tricks.

2019-04-09.name: Nozari
2019-04-09.text: Battlecry: Restore both heroes to full Health.
2019-04-09.flavor: In another timeline, she was called Yeszari.

2019-04-09.name: The Boom Reaver
2019-04-09.text: Battlecry: Summon a copy of a minion in your deck. Give it Rush.
2019-04-09.flavor: “What’s better than reaving? BOOM reaving!”

2019-08-06.name: Totemic Surge
2019-08-06.text: Give your Totems +2_Attack.
2019-08-06.flavor: It's not really advanced shamanic magic, you just draw nasty eyebrows on them.

2019-08-06.name: Activate the Obelisk
2019-08-06.text: Quest: Restore 15_Health.\nReward: Obelisk's Eye.
2019-08-06.flavor: A one-eyed, one stone, towering purple minion healer.

2019-08-06.name: Bazaar Burglary
2019-08-06.text: [x]Quest: Add 4 cards from\nother classes to your hand.\nReward: Ancient Blades.
2019-08-06.flavor: Just when you set up your "All-Natural Scented Candles" at the farmer's market and then some STUPID KOBOLD COMES AND TAKES THEM ALL!

2019-08-06.name: Beaming Sidekick
2019-08-06.text: Battlecry: Give a friendly minion +2 Health.
2019-08-06.flavor: Sure, I'll carry the water! And the food! And the tents! And the cursed monkey paw!

2019-08-06.name: Brazen Zealot
2019-08-06.text: Whenever you summon a minion, gain +1 Attack.
2019-08-06.flavor: Some paladins really Light it up.

2019-08-06.name: Corrupt the Waters
2019-08-06.text: [x]Quest: Play 6 Battlecry\ncards.\nReward: Heart of Vir'naal.
2019-08-06.flavor: This is why Hagatha is banned from public pools.

2019-08-06.name: Embalming Ritual
2019-08-06.text: Give a minion Reborn.
2019-08-06.flavor: "Guess what! We're getting a new cat."

2019-08-06.name: Hack the System
2019-08-06.text: [x]Quest: Attack 5 times\nwith your hero.\nReward: Anraphet's Core.
2019-08-06.flavor: Anything can be hacked, if you're holding an axe.

2019-08-06.name: Into the Fray
2019-08-06.text: Give all Taunt minions in your hand +2/+2.
2019-08-06.flavor: "You are in my FRAY!"

2019-08-06.name: Jar Dealer
2019-08-06.text: [x]Deathrattle: Add a random\n1-Cost minion to your hand.
2019-08-06.flavor: What's in the jar? It could be anyone!

2019-08-06.name: Making Mummies
2019-08-06.text: [x]Quest: Play 5 Reborn\nminions.\nReward: Emperor Wraps.
2019-08-06.flavor: "I do say, this gives me the vapors every single time!"

2019-08-06.name: Mogu Cultist
2019-08-06.text: Battlecry: If your board is full of Mogu Cultists, sacrifice them all and summon Highkeeper Ra.
2019-08-06.flavor: Mogu cultists have the worst team-building exercises.

2019-08-06.name: Murmy
2019-08-06.text: Reborn
2019-08-06.flavor: Unlike other mummies, they rolled him up with rice, sliced cucumbers, and soy sauce on the side.

2019-08-06.name: Pharaoh Cat
2019-08-06.text: Battlecry: Add a random Reborn minion to your_hand.
2019-08-06.flavor: Mightiest of mousers, enduring in kingship of the upper and lower cat tree, conqueror of the red dot, the all-wise Catshepsut.

2019-08-06.name: Plague of Flames
2019-08-06.text: [x]Destroy all your minions.\nFor each one, destroy a\nrandom enemy minion.
2019-08-06.flavor: This is fine.

2019-08-06.name: Plague of Madness
2019-08-06.text: Each player equips\na 2/2 Knife with Poisonous.
2019-08-06.flavor: Don't bring a candle to a knife fight.

2019-08-06.name: Raid the Sky Temple
2019-08-06.text: Quest: Cast 10 spells.\nReward: Ascendant Scroll.
2019-08-06.flavor: "Why can't I hold all these scrolls?"

2019-08-06.name: Sinister Deal
2019-08-06.text: Discover a Lackey.
2019-08-06.flavor: "So, what's in the sack?" \n"Something... sinister." \n"Okay, it's a deal."

2019-08-06.name: Supreme Archaeology
2019-08-06.text: Quest: Draw 20 cards.\nReward: Tome of Origination.
2019-08-06.flavor: Archaeology is the discovery of rare and powerful artifacts. Supreme Archaeology is TAKING THEM!

2019-08-06.name: Unseal the Vault
2019-08-06.text: Quest: Summon 20_minions.\nReward: Pharaoh's Warmask.
2019-08-06.flavor: "Huh... That's a nice card back."

2019-08-06.name: Untapped Potential
2019-08-06.text: [x]Quest: End 4 turns\nwith any unspent Mana.\nReward: Ossirian Tear.
2019-08-06.flavor: The official term is "strategic laziness."

2019-08-06.name: Worthy Expedition
2019-08-06.text: Discover a Choose One card.
2019-08-06.flavor: This isn't where I parked my mount.

2019-08-06.name: Ancient Mysteries
2019-08-06.text: Draw a Secret from your deck. It costs (0).
2019-08-06.flavor: I'm not saying it was aliens, but it was TOTALLY aliens!

2019-08-06.name: Arcane Flakmage
2019-08-06.text: After you play a Secret, deal 2 damage to all enemy minions.
2019-08-06.flavor: Ancient pandaren proverb: He who is without secrets lacks flak.

2019-08-06.name: Bug Collector
2019-08-06.text: Battlecry: Summon a 1/1 Locust with Rush.
2019-08-06.flavor: The only one who likes BEEEES!!!

2019-08-06.name: Clever Disguise
2019-08-06.text: Add 2 random spells from another class to_your hand.
2019-08-06.flavor: "It me! Togwaggle!"

2019-08-06.name: Crystal Merchant
2019-08-06.text: If you have any unspent Mana at the end of your turn, draw a card.
2019-08-06.flavor: I won't ask about your mana curve if you don't ask where I got these.

2019-08-06.name: Dwarven Archaeologist
2019-08-06.text: After you Discover a card, reduce its cost by (1).
2019-08-06.flavor: She's making great progress on paying off that advanced degree.

2019-08-06.name: EVIL Totem
2019-08-06.text: At the end of your turn,\nadd a Lackey to your hand.
2019-08-06.flavor: A lot of people blame the parents when a totem goes bad.

2019-08-06.name: Expired Merchant
2019-08-06.text: [x]Battlecry: Discard your highest Cost card. Deathrattle: Add 2 copies of it to your hand.
2019-08-06.flavor: The "best by" date is more like a guideline.

2019-08-06.name: Fishflinger
2019-08-06.text: Battlecry: Add a\nrandom Murloc to each player's_hand.
2019-08-06.flavor: The scent of fish lingers on the fishflinger's fish fingers.

2019-08-06.name: Frightened Flunky
2019-08-06.text: Taunt\nBattlecry: Discover a Taunt_minion.
2019-08-06.flavor: Some people just aren't cut out to be supervillain material.

2019-08-06.name: Grandmummy
2019-08-06.text: [x]Reborn\n Deathrattle: Give a random\nfriendly minion +1/+1.
2019-08-06.flavor: A grandmummy’s love is eternal.

2019-08-06.name: Holy Ripple
2019-08-06.text: Deal $1 damage to all enemies. Restore #1_Health to all friendly characters.
2019-08-06.flavor: I still prefer the taste of banana fudge ripple.

2019-08-06.name: Injured Tol'vir
2019-08-06.text: Taunt\nBattlecry: Deal 3 damage to this minion.
2019-08-06.flavor: Me-OW!

2019-08-06.name: Kobold Sandtrooper
2019-08-06.text: Deathrattle: Deal 3 damage to the enemy_hero.
2019-08-06.flavor: Stay while, take candle.

2019-08-06.name: Micro Mummy
2019-08-06.text: [x]Reborn At the end of your turn, give another random friendly minion +1 Attack.
2019-08-06.flavor: The dramatically detailed terrifically trimmed replica of the real thing!

2019-08-06.name: Neferset Ritualist
2019-08-06.text: Battlecry: Restore adjacent minions to full_Health.
2019-08-06.flavor: The Neferset are great—they'll always make sure their friends are feline fine.

2019-08-06.name: Penance
2019-08-06.text: Lifesteal\nDeal $3 damage to a_minion.
2019-08-06.flavor: This is what happens when you don’t give a sincere apology.

2019-08-06.name: Pressure Plate
2019-08-06.text: Secret: After your opponent casts a spell, destroy a random enemy_minion.
2019-08-06.flavor: The appropriate dishware for stressful situations.

2019-08-06.name: Questing Explorer
2019-08-06.text: Battlecry: If you control a Quest, draw a card.
2019-08-06.flavor: Earned her merit badges the hard way—twelve zhevra hooves at a time.

2019-08-06.name: Quicksand Elemental
2019-08-06.text: Battlecry: Give all enemy minions -2 Attack this_turn.
2019-08-06.flavor: Use a light abrasive to buff blemishes away but use a heavy abrasive to debuff problems.

2019-08-06.name: Sandstorm Elemental
2019-08-06.text: Battlecry: Deal 1 damage to all enemy minions. Overload: (1)
2019-08-06.flavor: Doot doot doot doot doot [Pause] Doot doot doot doot doot DEE doot doot doot doot doot!

2019-08-06.name: Sandwasp Queen
2019-08-06.text: Battlecry: Add two 2/1 Sandwasps to your hand.
2019-08-06.flavor: Oooh, see that wasp! \nWatch that sting! \nDig in the Sandwasp Queen!

2019-08-06.name: Serpent Egg
2019-08-06.text: Deathrattle: Summon a 3/4 Sea Serpent.
2019-08-06.flavor: These things go from "adorable danger noodle!" to "MY FACE IS MELTING!" all too quickly.

2019-08-06.name: Sir Finley of the Sands
2019-08-06.text: [x]Battlecry: If your deck has\nno duplicates, Discover an\nupgraded Hero Power.
2019-08-06.flavor: "The sands shall be my sea! And this scarab shall be my, er, strange and wriggly boat!"

2019-08-06.name: Spitting Camel
2019-08-06.text: [x]At the end of your turn,\n__deal 1 damage to another__\nrandom friendly minion.
2019-08-06.flavor: Were you expectorating another bad pun?

2019-08-06.name: Subdue
2019-08-06.text: Set a minion's Attack and Health to 1.
2019-08-06.flavor: Like humility but more humiliating.

2019-08-06.name: Temple Berserker
2019-08-06.text: Reborn\nHas +2 Attack while damaged.
2019-08-06.flavor: He's back. He's angry. And he's here to wrap things up.

2019-08-06.name: Vilefiend
2019-08-06.text: Lifesteal
2019-08-06.flavor: Dreamed of becoming a Stylefiend, but fel was never in season.

2019-08-06.name: Whirlkick Master
2019-08-06.text: Whenever you play a Combo card, add a random Combo card to your hand.
2019-08-06.flavor: C-c-combo!

2019-08-06.name: Zephrys the Great
2019-08-06.text: Battlecry: If your deck has no duplicates, wish for the perfect card.
2019-08-06.flavor: "Of course it's perfect, you're just not seeing how to use it."

2019-08-06.name: BEEEES!!!
2019-08-06.text: [x]Choose a minion.\nSummon four 1/1 Bees\nthat attack it.
2019-08-06.flavor: Right before CEEEES!!!

2019-08-06.name: Bloodsworn Mercenary
2019-08-06.text: [x]Battlecry: Choose a\ndamaged friendly minion.\nSummon a copy of it.
2019-08-06.flavor: You look really hurt. You could use a friend!

2019-08-06.name: Candletaker
2019-08-06.text: Reborn
2019-08-06.flavor: "You no waaaake caaaandle!"

2019-08-06.name: Desert Hare
2019-08-06.text: Battlecry: Summon two 1/1 Desert Hares.
2019-08-06.flavor: After they're caught, they’re dessert hares.

2019-08-06.name: Desert Spear
2019-08-06.text: After your hero attacks, summon a 1/1 Locust with Rush.
2019-08-06.flavor: Goes on the right, next to the desert spoon.

2019-08-06.name: Dune Sculptor
2019-08-06.text: [x]After you cast a spell,\nadd a random Mage\nminion to your hand.
2019-08-06.flavor: Come for the magic show, stay for the sand castles.

2019-08-06.name: EVIL Recruiter
2019-08-06.text: Battlecry: Destroy a friendly Lackey to summon a 5/5 Demon.
2019-08-06.flavor: I'm starting to think the lackeys aren't evil, just taken advantage of.

2019-08-06.name: Flame Ward
2019-08-06.text: Secret: After a minion attacks your hero, deal $3 damage to all enemy minions.
2019-08-06.flavor: Not to be confused with the burn ward.

2019-08-06.name: Generous Mummy
2019-08-06.text: Reborn\nYour opponent's cards cost (1) less.
2019-08-06.flavor: Yeah, she's mummified, but her money hasn’t dried up!

2019-08-06.name: Golden Scarab
2019-08-06.text: Battlecry: Discover a\n4-Cost card.
2019-08-06.flavor: Who actually puts all the gold plating on these things, and why?

2019-08-06.name: History Buff
2019-08-06.text: Whenever you play a minion, give a random minion in your hand +1/+1.
2019-08-06.flavor: Actually... what happened was...

2019-08-06.name: Hooked Scimitar
2019-08-06.text: [x]Combo: Gain +2 Attack.
2019-08-06.flavor: Oooooooooooow. I'm hooked on a scimitar!

2019-08-06.name: Hunter's Pack
2019-08-06.text: Add a random Hunter Beast, Secret, and weapon to your_hand.
2019-08-06.flavor: Oh look! It's a trap!

2019-08-06.name: Infested Goblin
2019-08-06.text: Taunt\nDeathrattle: Add two 1/1 Scarabs with Taunt to your hand.
2019-08-06.flavor: Trust us. DON'T go cheap on the scarab repellent.

2019-08-06.name: Livewire Lance
2019-08-06.text: After your Hero attacks, add a Lackey to your_hand.
2019-08-06.flavor: The lance is heavy but it’s the battery pack that really does a number on the shoulders.

2019-08-06.name: Mischief Maker
2019-08-06.text: Battlecry: Swap the top card of your deck with your_opponent's.
2019-08-06.flavor: Fair trade is for noble-minded suckers with dignity and honor.

2019-08-06.name: Neferset Thrasher
2019-08-06.text: Whenever this attacks, deal 3 damage to your_hero.
2019-08-06.flavor: Tough to do skateboard tricks with four legs.

2019-08-06.name: Plague of Murlocs
2019-08-06.text: Transform all minions into random Murlocs.
2019-08-06.flavor: This is horrible! And adorable!

2019-08-06.name: Ramkahen Wildtamer
2019-08-06.text: Battlecry: Copy a random Beast in your hand.
2019-08-06.flavor: She gets to decide what cards go to the Hall of Fame.

2019-08-06.name: Salhet's Pride
2019-08-06.text: Deathrattle: Draw two\n1-Health minions from your_deck.
2019-08-06.flavor: Pride cometh before the maul.

2019-08-06.name: Vulpera Scoundrel
2019-08-06.text: Battlecry: Discover a spell or pick a mystery choice.
2019-08-06.flavor: A spell is a spell, but the mystery choice could be anything! (It's also a spell.)

2019-08-06.name: Weaponized Wasp
2019-08-06.text: Battlecry: If you control\na Lackey, deal 3_damage.
2019-08-06.flavor: Dr. Boom had one simple request: wasps with flippin' laser beams attached to their heads.

2019-08-06.name: Wretched Reclaimer
2019-08-06.text: [x]Battlecry: Destroy a friendly\nminion, then return it to life\nwith full Health.
2019-08-06.flavor: "Ok, here's the plan. We kill you, then bring you back." "Stronger?" "No, about the same."

2019-08-06.name: Ancestral Guardian
2019-08-06.text: Lifesteal\nReborn
2019-08-06.flavor: No one knows whose ancestor he is, but he's still upset that you never call.

2019-08-06.name: Body Wrapper
2019-08-06.text: Battlecry: Discover a friendly minion that died this game. Shuffle it into your deck.
2019-08-06.flavor: She uses pickle slices for the eyes. Keeps them well-preserved.

2019-08-06.name: Bone Wraith
2019-08-06.text: Taunt\nReborn
2019-08-06.flavor: It uses only the eco-friendly bones from free-range humanoids.

2019-08-06.name: Conjured Mirage
2019-08-06.text: Taunt\nAt the start of your turn, shuffle this minion into your deck.
2019-08-06.flavor: What you see is Isiset.

2019-08-06.name: Diseased Vulture
2019-08-06.text: After your hero takes damage on your turn, summon a random\n3-Cost minion.
2019-08-06.flavor: He's off the twig! He's kicked the bucket! THIS IS AN EX-VULTURE!

2019-08-06.name: Garden Gnome
2019-08-06.text: [x]Battlecry: If you're holding\na spell that costs (5) or more,\nsummon two 2/2 Treants.
2019-08-06.flavor: "Greetings, my little shrubs... It's whittlin' time."

2019-08-06.name: High Priest Amet
2019-08-06.text: [x]Whenever you summon a\nminion, set its Health equal\nto this minion's.
2019-08-06.flavor: All minions are equal, but some minions are more equal than others.

2019-08-06.name: Hyena Alpha
2019-08-06.text: [x]Battlecry: If you control\na Secret, summon two\n2/2 Hyenas.
2019-08-06.flavor: Everything the sun touches is ours—so long as it's already dead.

2019-08-06.name: Impbalming
2019-08-06.text: Destroy a minion. Shuffle 3 Worthless Imps into your deck.
2019-08-06.flavor: With your complexion, Imp Balm is a great demonizer.

2019-08-06.name: Psychopomp
2019-08-06.text: [x]Battlecry: Summon a random friendly minion that died this game. Give it Reborn.
2019-08-06.flavor: "Come with me if you want to re-live."

2019-08-06.name: Restless Mummy
2019-08-06.text: Rush\nReborn
2019-08-06.flavor: Life-separation anxiety syndrome.

2019-08-06.name: Sahket Sapper
2019-08-06.text: Deathrattle: Return a _random enemy minion to_ your_opponent's_hand.
2019-08-06.flavor: "Here, you dropped this."

2019-08-06.name: Shadow of Death
2019-08-06.text: Choose a minion. Shuffle 3 'Shadows' into your deck that summon a copy when drawn.
2019-08-06.flavor: Making new friends takes skill.

2019-08-06.name: Splitting Axe
2019-08-06.text: Battlecry: Summon copies of your Totems.
2019-08-06.flavor: The ancient shaman chant, "Control Axe, Control Vee."

2019-08-06.name: Sunstruck Henchman
2019-08-06.text: At the start of your turn, this has a 50% chance to_fall asleep.
2019-08-06.flavor: There is E.V.I.L. here that DOES sleep.

2019-08-06.name: Vessina
2019-08-06.text: While you're Overloaded, your other minions have +2 Attack.
2019-08-06.flavor: She wasn't happy when Hagatha sent her back to Uldum. But her "angry" hiss sounds like her "happy" hiss, so no one knew the difference.

2019-08-06.name: Anka, the Buried
2019-08-06.text: Battlecry: Change each Deathrattle minion in your hand into a 1/1 that costs (1).
2019-08-06.flavor: "You look familiar. Were you at my first funeral?"

2019-08-06.name: Anubisath Defender
2019-08-06.text: Taunt. Costs (0) if you've cast a spell that costs (5) or more this turn.
2019-08-06.flavor: Also comes running when he hears a can opener.

2019-08-06.name: Bazaar Mugger
2019-08-06.text: Rush\nBattlecry: Add a random minion from another class to your hand.
2019-08-06.flavor: Premium muggings at a discount price.

2019-08-06.name: Cloud Prince
2019-08-06.text: Battlecry: If you control a Secret, deal 6 damage.
2019-08-06.flavor: "In West Cloudidelphia, born and raised; flinging lightning for the rest of my days."

2019-08-06.name: Dark Pharaoh Tekahn
2019-08-06.text: Battlecry: For the rest of the game, your Lackeys are 4/4.
2019-08-06.flavor: He'll get that League of Explorers and their little murloc too!

2019-08-06.name: Desert Obelisk
2019-08-06.text:
[x]If you control 3 of these
at the end of your turn,
deal 5 damage to a
random enemy.
2019-08-06.flavor: The Obelisk of the Stars can hide an entire land from prying eyes! Or zap a rando.

2019-08-06.name: Elise the Enlightened
2019-08-06.text: Battlecry: If your deck has no duplicates, duplicate your hand.
2019-08-06.flavor: From cartographer to combatant, Elise has taken the road less traveled—because no one else could find it on a map.

2019-08-06.name: Faceless Lurker
2019-08-06.text: Taunt\nBattlecry: Double this minion's Health.
2019-08-06.flavor: Longtime lurker, first time attacker.

2019-08-06.name: Mortuary Machine
2019-08-06.text: After your opponent plays a minion, give it Reborn.
2019-08-06.flavor: The ankle bone's connected to the shin bone. The knuckle bone's connected to the... eh, it'll be fine.

2019-08-06.name: Naga Sand Witch
2019-08-06.text: [x]Battlecry: Change the Cost\nof spells in your hand to (5).
2019-08-06.flavor: 5 mana footlong, anyone?

2019-08-06.name: Oasis Surger
2019-08-06.text: Rush\nChoose One - Gain +2/+2; or Summon a copy of this minion.
2019-08-06.flavor: Surge's up, dude!

2019-08-06.name: Phalanx Commander
2019-08-06.text: Your Taunt minions\nhave +2 Attack.
2019-08-06.flavor: Turns out he's really good at herding cats.

2019-08-06.name: Plague of Wrath
2019-08-06.text: Destroy all damaged minions.
2019-08-06.flavor: "Thanks, I HATE it!"

2019-08-06.name: Sandhoof Waterbearer
2019-08-06.text: At the end of your turn, restore #5 Health to a damaged friendly character.
2019-08-06.flavor: Used to carrying for his team.

2019-08-06.name: Wasteland Assassin
2019-08-06.text: Stealth\nReborn
2019-08-06.flavor: They'll never see me coming, what with my glowing body, eyes and daggers.

2019-08-06.name: Armagedillo
2019-08-06.text: [x]Taunt At the end of your turn, give all Taunt minions in your hand +2/+2.
2019-08-06.flavor: We may never know what provoked it, but we will never forget the consequences.

2019-08-06.name: Armored Goon
2019-08-06.text: Whenever your hero attacks, gain 5 Armor.
2019-08-06.flavor: Armored except for non-critical areas, such as the head, torso, fists and thighs.

2019-08-06.name: Blatant Decoy
2019-08-06.text: [x]Deathrattle: Each player\nsummons the lowest Cost\nminion from their hand.
2019-08-06.flavor: "Hah! You is being tricked by ME! Togwaggle!"

2019-08-06.name: Hidden Oasis
2019-08-06.text: Choose One - Summon a 6/6 Ancient with Taunt; or Restore #12 Health.
2019-08-06.flavor: Amazing that it's been hidden, given the twenty-foot treant splashing around in it.

2019-08-06.name: Khartut Defender
2019-08-06.text: [x]Taunt, Reborn\nDeathrattle: Restore #3\nHealth to your hero.
2019-08-06.flavor: Gesundheit!

2019-08-06.name: Pharaoh's Blessing
2019-08-06.text: Give a minion +4/+4, Divine Shield, and Taunt.
2019-08-06.flavor: Life hack: Sneeze near a pharaoh.

2019-08-06.name: Reno the Relicologist
2019-08-06.text: Battlecry: If your deck has no duplicates, deal 10 damage randomly split among all enemy minions.
2019-08-06.flavor: All his life, Reno Jackson was only a gatling wand away from becoming the greatest and most terrifying mage who ever existed.

2019-08-06.name: Riftcleaver
2019-08-06.text: Battlecry: Destroy a minion. Your hero takes damage equal to its Health.
2019-08-06.flavor: Brings you face to face with your destructive impulses.

2019-08-06.name: Scarlet Webweaver
2019-08-06.text: Battlecry: Reduce the Cost of a random Beast in your_hand by (5).
2019-08-06.flavor: Isn't that nice? The spider made the explorer a sleeping bag!

2019-08-06.name: Swarm of Locusts
2019-08-06.text: Summon seven 1/1 Locusts with Rush.
2019-08-06.flavor: Good things never come in swarms.

2019-08-06.name: Wild Bloodstinger
2019-08-06.text: Battlecry: Summon a minion from your opponent's hand. Attack it.
2019-08-06.flavor: Tame Bloodstingers would politely invite your minion to tea.

2019-08-06.name: Dinotamer Brann
2019-08-06.text: Battlecry: If your deck has no duplicates, summon King Krush.
2019-08-06.flavor: Brann's new dino-taming hobby is going well—his pet can already make him sit, stand, and roll over!

2019-08-06.name: Earthquake
2019-08-06.text: Deal $5 damage to all minions, then deal $2 damage to all minions.
2019-08-06.flavor: Shake it, sh-sh-sh-shake it like a Kalimdor fissure.

2019-08-06.name: Overflow
2019-08-06.text: Restore #5 Health\nto all characters.\nDraw 5 cards.
2019-08-06.flavor: It's a high five followed by a low tide.

2019-08-06.name: Siamat
2019-08-06.text: [x]Battlecry: Gain 2 of Rush,\nTaunt, Divine Shield, or\nWindfury (your choice).
2019-08-06.flavor: TAUNT. TAUNT.

2019-08-06.name: Wasteland Scorpid
2019-08-06.text: Poisonous
2019-08-06.flavor: After they get to a certain size, it doesn't matter if they're poisonous or not.

2019-08-06.name: Wrapped Golem
2019-08-06.text: [x]Reborn At the end of your turn, summon a 1/1 Scarab with Taunt.
2019-08-06.flavor: The end result of one of the greatest wrap battles of all time.

2019-08-06.name: Octosari
2019-08-06.text: Deathrattle: Draw 8 cards.
2019-08-06.flavor: Eight arms of sand-flinging, foe-wringing, card-slinging fury!

2019-08-06.name: Pit Crocolisk
2019-08-06.text: Battlecry: Deal 5 damage.
2019-08-06.flavor: PIT! Not PET!

2019-08-06.name: Tip the Scales
2019-08-06.text: Summon 7 Murlocs from your deck.
2019-08-06.flavor: Hold on, I need to get some murlocs to weigh in on this.

2019-08-06.name: Tomb Warden
2019-08-06.text: Taunt\nBattlecry: Summon a copy of this minion.
2019-08-06.flavor: Also known as an ancient copy machine.

2019-08-06.name: Tortollan Pilgrim
2019-08-06.text: [x]Battlecry: Discover a copy of\na spell in your deck and cast\nit with random targets.
2019-08-06.flavor: A tortollan made it to the desert!

2019-08-06.name: Anubisath Warbringer
2019-08-06.text: Deathrattle: Give all minions in your hand +3/+3.
2019-08-06.flavor: Some dogs will bring you a bone or a squeaky toy. This one brings war!

2019-08-06.name: Mogu Fleshshaper
2019-08-06.text: [x]Rush. Costs (1) less for each\nminion on the battlefield.
2019-08-06.flavor: He's here to shape *clap* you up!

2019-08-06.name: Plague of Death
2019-08-06.text: Silence and destroy all_minions.
2019-08-06.flavor: Don't worry, there's a happy little funhouse right under that sand pit.

2019-08-06.name: Colossus of the Moon
2019-08-06.text: Divine Shield\nReborn
2019-08-06.flavor: Strike him down, and you'll face the Colossus of the New Moon.

2019-08-06.name: King Phaoris
2019-08-06.text: [x]Battlecry: For each spell in your hand, summon a random minion of the same Cost.
2019-08-06.flavor: When you're the king of the cats, the whole desert is your litterbox.

2019-08-06.name: Living Monument
2019-08-06.text: Taunt
2019-08-06.flavor: This is not the greatest card in the world. This is just a monument.

2019-08-06.name: Puzzle Box of Yogg-Saron
2019-08-06.text: Cast 10 random spells (targets chosen randomly).
2019-08-06.flavor: "PUT THE BOX DOWN, RENO!"

2019-12-10.name: Embiggen
2019-12-10.text: Give all minions in your deck +2/+2. They cost (1) more (up to 10).
2019-12-10.flavor: Did you set it to "wumbo?"

2019-12-10.name: Whispers of EVIL
2019-12-10.text: Add a Lackey to your_hand.
2019-12-10.flavor: Madame Lazul’s ASMR program is off to a promising start!

2019-12-10.name: Arcane Breath
2019-12-10.text: Deal $2 damage to a minion. If you're holding a Dragon, Discover a spell.
2019-12-10.flavor: One of many side effects from eating mana cookies.

2019-12-10.name: Blazing Battlemage
2019-12-10.flavor: Weaponized an ancient technique once used to slice cold butter.

2019-12-10.name: Bloodsail Flybooter
2019-12-10.text: Battlecry: Add two 1/1 Pirates to your hand.
2019-12-10.flavor: They’re pretty fly for some pirate guys.

2019-12-10.name: Clear the Way
2019-12-10.text: [x]Sidequest: Summon 3 Rush minions. Reward: Summon a 4/4 Gryphon with Rush.
2019-12-10.flavor: The terrifying part is the gryphons' squeaky voices afterward.

2019-12-10.name: Depth Charge
2019-12-10.text: At the start of your turn, deal 5 damage to ALL_minions.
2019-12-10.flavor: * Does not have Charge.

2019-12-10.name: Disciple of Galakrond
2019-12-10.text: Battlecry: Invoke Galakrond.
2019-12-10.flavor: Raising Galakrond will cause thurible, thurible damage.

2019-12-10.name: Dragon's Hoard
2019-12-10.text: Discover a Legendary_minion from another class.
2019-12-10.flavor: The Alliance loves this hoard.

2019-12-10.name: Dwarven Sharpshooter
2019-12-10.text: Your Hero Power can target_minions.
2019-12-10.flavor: Scissors, knives, needles, you name it! He'll shoot it.

2019-12-10.name: Elemental Allies
2019-12-10.text: [x]Sidequest: Play an Elemental 2 turns in a row. Reward: Draw 3 spells from your deck.
2019-12-10.flavor: Reno’s lucky he wasn’t caught by a fire elemental.

2019-12-10.name: Hot Air Balloon
2019-12-10.text: At the start of your turn, gain +1 Health.
2019-12-10.flavor: The Gadgetzan Pilgrim's Bounty parade is missing a float this year.

2019-12-10.name: Learn Draconic
2019-12-10.text: [x]Sidequest: Spend 8 Mana on spells. Reward: Summon a 6/6 Dragon.
2019-12-10.flavor: Upon taking up the spellbook, Reno realized with a start: "I can't read."

2019-12-10.name: Praise Galakrond!
2019-12-10.text: [x]Give a minion +1 Attack.\nInvoke Galakrond.
2019-12-10.flavor:
"Turn to Galakrond, Chapter 3 Verse 12.

'SNARL! ROAR! GRAAAAGH!'

Let us reflect on this wisdom."

2019-12-10.name: Rain of Fire
2019-12-10.text: Deal $1 damage to all_characters.
2019-12-10.flavor: You know it’s autumn when the skies rain brimstone and fire. Also: pumpkin spice!

2019-12-10.name: Righteous Cause
2019-12-10.text: Sidequest: Summon 5 minions.\nReward: Give your minions +1/+1.
2019-12-10.flavor: "And I hereby dub thee a cadet of the Explorer’s League! NEXT!"

2019-12-10.name: Sand Breath
2019-12-10.text: [x]Give a minion +1/+2.\nGive it Divine Shield if\nyou're holding a Dragon.
2019-12-10.flavor: After Uldum, EVERYONE had sand breath.

2019-12-10.name: Secure the Deck
2019-12-10.text: Sidequest: Attack twice with your hero. Reward: Add 3 'Claw' spells to your hand.
2019-12-10.flavor: "Tied it down, boss. I don't really know why you asked me to do that."

2019-12-10.name: Sky Raider
2019-12-10.text: Battlecry: Add a random Pirate to your hand.
2019-12-10.flavor: Maybe he should've hatched a plan that could actually carry booty back too.

2019-12-10.name: Storm's Wrath
2019-12-10.text: Give your minions +1/+1.\nOverload: (1)
2019-12-10.flavor: How many dragons does it take to destroy a hot air balloon? One, two, three, CRUNCH!

2019-12-10.name: Strength in Numbers
2019-12-10.text: Sidequest: Spend 10 Mana on minions.\nReward: Summon a minion from your deck.
2019-12-10.flavor: One minion, two minions... tree minions!

2019-12-10.name: Surging Tempest
2019-12-10.text: Has +1 Attack while you_have Overloaded Mana Crystals.
2019-12-10.flavor: "Overloaded? Should've gotten a surge protector."

2019-12-10.name: Toxic Reinforcements
2019-12-10.text: [x]Sidequest: Use your Hero Power three times. Reward: Summon three 1/1 Leper Gnomes.
2019-12-10.flavor: In the event of a sudden loss of cabin pressure, a slingshot will be deployed for convenient evacuation.

2019-12-10.name: Treenforcements
2019-12-10.text: [x]Choose One - Give a minion +2 Health and Taunt; or Summon a 2/2 Treant.
2019-12-10.flavor: Treemendous value!

2019-12-10.name: Violet Spellwing
2019-12-10.text: Deathrattle: Add an 'Arcane Missiles' spell to_your hand.
2019-12-10.flavor: A bird in the hand is worth three missiles in the grave.

2019-12-10.name: Breath of Dreams
2019-12-10.text: Draw a card. If you're holding a Dragon, gain an empty Mana Crystal.
2019-12-10.flavor: Ysera has the worst morning breath.

2019-12-10.name: Corrosive Breath
2019-12-10.text:
[x]Deal $3 damage to a
minion. If you're holding
a Dragon, it also hits
the enemy hero.
2019-12-10.flavor: It's a breath of fresh terror!

2019-12-10.name: Dragon Breeder
2019-12-10.text: Battlecry: Choose a friendly Dragon. Add a copy of it to_your hand.
2019-12-10.flavor: Deathwing would have been more well-adjusted if he'd been raised by this guy.

2019-12-10.name: Envoy of Lazul
2019-12-10.text: [x]Battlecry: Look at 3 cards. Guess which one is in your opponent's hand to get a copy of it.
2019-12-10.flavor: "Note to self: possess someone who's local and knows directions next time."

2019-12-10.name: Evasive Chimaera
2019-12-10.text: Poisonous\nCan't be targeted by spells or Hero Powers.
2019-12-10.flavor: One head only tells the truth, while the other head only tells lies. But they both spit poison.

2019-12-10.name: Grizzled Wizard
2019-12-10.text: Battlecry: Swap Hero Powers with your opponent until your next turn.
2019-12-10.flavor: When he was young, he was an Outrageous Magus.

2019-12-10.name: Invocation of Frost
2019-12-10.text: Freeze an enemy. \nInvoke Galakrond.
2019-12-10.flavor: Galakrond adores a little frosting.

2019-12-10.name: Nether Breath
2019-12-10.text: Deal $2 damage.\nIf you're holding a Dragon, deal $4 damage with Lifesteal instead.
2019-12-10.flavor:
"Whether the Nether is cold,
whether the Nether is hot,
we'll burn together,
whatever the Nether,
whether we like it or not."

2019-12-10.name: Parachute Brigand
2019-12-10.text: [x]After you play a Pirate,\nsummon this minion\nfrom your hand.
2019-12-10.flavor: She flies standby.

2019-12-10.name: Phase Stalker
2019-12-10.text: [x]After you use your Hero\nPower, cast a Secret\nfrom your deck.
2019-12-10.flavor: It's not just a phase! I don't have to tell you anything! GAWSH!

2019-12-10.name: Ritual Chopper
2019-12-10.text: Battlecry: Invoke Galakrond.
2019-12-10.flavor: Chop chop, Galakrond!

2019-12-10.name: Sanctuary
2019-12-10.text: [x]Sidequest: Take no damage for a turn. Reward: Summon a 3/6 minion with Taunt.
2019-12-10.flavor: Few quests are completed by cowering under a table.

2019-12-10.name: Shrubadier
2019-12-10.text: Battlecry: Summon a 2/2_Treant.
2019-12-10.flavor: Her shoots can kill.

2019-12-10.name: Tasty Flyfish
2019-12-10.text: Deathrattle: Give a Dragon in your hand +2/+2.
2019-12-10.flavor: Reinforced with vitamins and mrglrls.

2019-12-10.name: Transmogrifier
2019-12-10.text: Whenever you draw a card, transform it into a random Legendary minion.
2019-12-10.flavor: All it takes is some imagination and a cardboard box.

2019-12-10.name: Wyrmrest Purifier
2019-12-10.text: [x]Battlecry: Transform all Neutral cards in your deck into random cards from your class.
2019-12-10.flavor: She keeps your deck classy.

2019-12-10.name: Ancharrr
2019-12-10.text: After your hero attacks, draw a Pirate from your_deck.
2019-12-10.flavor: The problem with anchors is they often end up sinking to the bottom of your deck.

2019-12-10.name: Awaken!
2019-12-10.text: Invoke Galakrond. Deal_$1 damage to all_minions.
2019-12-10.flavor: This is an alarm clock you can't ignore.

2019-12-10.name: Blowtorch Saboteur
2019-12-10.text: Battlecry: Your opponent's next Hero Power costs (3).
2019-12-10.flavor: Before he came along, we went through a lot of duct tape.

2019-12-10.name: Breath of the Infinite
2019-12-10.text: Deal $2 damage to all minions. If you're holding a Dragon, only damage enemies.
2019-12-10.flavor: It's called "circular breathing."

2019-12-10.name: Bronze Explorer
2019-12-10.text: Lifesteal\nBattlecry: Discover a Dragon.
2019-12-10.flavor: Always ready to explore new friendships! Except with Deathwing.

2019-12-10.name: Chenvaala
2019-12-10.text: After you cast three spells in a turn, summon a 5/5_Elemental.
2019-12-10.flavor: Like the Dragon Soul. If dragons had souls of ice.

2019-12-10.name: Dark Skies
2019-12-10.text: [x]Deal $1 damage to a\nrandom minion. Repeat\nfor each card in your hand.
2019-12-10.flavor: "It's a drizzle of fire. A fine mist, really."

2019-12-10.name: Diving Gryphon
2019-12-10.text: Rush\nBattlecry: Draw a Rush minion_from_your_deck.
2019-12-10.flavor: Warning: May cause carousel flashbacks.

2019-12-10.name: Dragonblight Cultist
2019-12-10.text: [x]Battlecry: Invoke Galakrond.\nGain +1 Attack for each\nother friendly minion.
2019-12-10.flavor: Galakrond would be extra mad if he was resurrected with gnaw marks on his bones.

2019-12-10.name: Dragonrider Talritha
2019-12-10.text: Deathrattle: Give a Dragon in your hand +3/+3 and this Deathrattle.
2019-12-10.flavor: You can't just run away from your problems. Unless you have another dragon to jump to.

2019-12-10.name: Dread Raven
2019-12-10.text: Has +3 Attack for each other Dread Raven you_control.
2019-12-10.flavor: Fun Fact: A group of three Dread Ravens is an unkindness. Four is lethal!

2019-12-10.name: EVIL Quartermaster
2019-12-10.text: Battlecry: Add a Lackey to your hand. Gain 3 Armor.
2019-12-10.flavor: He trained for a whole year to become quarter-master. Three more, and he'll be a full-master.

2019-12-10.name: Fire Hawk
2019-12-10.text: Battlecry: Gain +1 Attack for each card in your opponent's hand.
2019-12-10.flavor: It’s our fault for making all those card backs that look like food.

2019-12-10.name: Goboglide Tech
2019-12-10.text: Battlecry: If you control a_Mech, gain +1/+1 and_Rush.
2019-12-10.flavor: The word "glide" is always in quotes in the manual.

2019-12-10.name: Lightning Breath
2019-12-10.text:
[x]Deal $4 damage to a
minion. If you're holding
a Dragon, also damage
its neighbors.
2019-12-10.flavor: Recipe: One dragon, four wool socks, thick shag carpet.

2019-12-10.name: Living Dragonbreath
2019-12-10.text: Your minions can't be_Frozen.
2019-12-10.flavor: If you want that muscular physique, you've really gotta feel the burn.

2019-12-10.name: Mindflayer Kaahrj
2019-12-10.text: Battlecry: Choose an\nenemy minion.\nDeathrattle: Summon a new copy of it.
2019-12-10.flavor: It’s pronounced "Kaahrj."

2019-12-10.name: Primordial Explorer
2019-12-10.text: Poisonous\nBattlecry: Discover a Dragon.
2019-12-10.flavor: "We're letting the poisonous dude carry the bags?"

2019-12-10.name: Ramming Speed
2019-12-10.text: Force a minion to attack one of its neighbors.
2019-12-10.flavor: Her deductible keeps going up.

2019-12-10.name: Scalerider
2019-12-10.text: Battlecry: If you're holding a Dragon, deal 2 damage.
2019-12-10.flavor: Do Re Me Fa So La Spear Throw!

2019-12-10.name: Seal Fate
2019-12-10.text: Deal $3 damage to an undamaged character. Invoke Galakrond.
2019-12-10.flavor: Firmly press the seal of your fates instead of leaving the flap open.

2019-12-10.name: Sky Claw
2019-12-10.text: Your other Mechs\nhave +1 Attack.\nBattlecry: Summon two 1/1 Microcopters.
2019-12-10.flavor: Carefully engineered to never grab the Mimiron plush toy.

2019-12-10.name: Skybarge
2019-12-10.text: [x]After you summon a\nPirate, deal 2 damage\nto a random enemy.
2019-12-10.flavor: It's more of a ship-gun than a gunship.

2019-12-10.name: Stormhammer
2019-12-10.text: Doesn't lose Durability while you control a_Dragon.
2019-12-10.flavor: It brings the storm before the calm.

2019-12-10.name: Azure Explorer
2019-12-10.text: Spell Damage +2\nBattlecry: Discover a Dragon.
2019-12-10.flavor: Has an appetite for knowledge!

2019-12-10.name: Bad Luck Albatross
2019-12-10.text: Deathrattle: Shuffle two 1/1 Albatross into your opponent's deck.
2019-12-10.flavor: Legend holds that it's bad luck to harm it. So maybe just pat it on the head, okay?

2019-12-10.name: Devoted Maniac
2019-12-10.text: Rush\nBattlecry: Invoke Galakrond.
2019-12-10.flavor: There are plenty of apathetic maniacs, but they couldn't be bothered.

2019-12-10.name: Dragonbane
2019-12-10.text: After you use your Hero Power, deal 5 damage to a random enemy.
2019-12-10.flavor: *Thunk* "That wasn’t a dragon!" *Thunk* "THAT wasn’t a dragon!"

2019-12-10.name: Dragonmaw Poacher
2019-12-10.text: Battlecry: If your opponent controls a Dragon, gain +4/+4 and Rush.
2019-12-10.flavor: I prefer my dragons over-easy.

2019-12-10.name: Evasive Feywing
2019-12-10.text: Can't be targeted by spells or Hero Powers.
2019-12-10.flavor: I've never heard of this fey-dragon called "Brightwing," but if I HAD, I’d say we’d be best friends.

2019-12-10.name: Fate Weaver
2019-12-10.text: [x]Battlecry: If you've Invoked\ntwice, reduce the Cost of\ncards in your hand by (1).
2019-12-10.flavor: Do not draw the attention of a Fate Weaver, for it will always loom over your destiny.

2019-12-10.name: Fiendish Rites
2019-12-10.text: Invoke Galakrond.\nGive your minions +1_Attack.
2019-12-10.flavor: "You have the right to sacrifice an ally. If you do not have an ally, then one will be sacrificed for you."

2019-12-10.name: Frizz Kindleroost
2019-12-10.text: Battlecry: Reduce the Cost of Dragons in your deck by_(2).
2019-12-10.flavor: Frizz knows that baby dragons need warmth, care, and the highest possible level of goblin engineering.

2019-12-10.name: Grave Rune
2019-12-10.text: Give a minion "Deathrattle: Summon 2 copies of this."
2019-12-10.flavor: I'm gravely sorry to rune this.

2019-12-10.name: Hippogryph
2019-12-10.text: Rush\nTaunt
2019-12-10.flavor: Known for its ferocious grace, the hippogryph is a truly majestic creature. Except when molting.

2019-12-10.name: Hoard Pillager
2019-12-10.text: Battlecry: Equip one of your destroyed weapons.
2019-12-10.flavor: Better to have stabbed and lost. And then found again!

2019-12-10.name: Lightforged Zealot
2019-12-10.text: Battlecry: If your deck has no Neutral cards, equip a __4/2_Truesilver_Champion._
2019-12-10.flavor: Card-carrying member of the Paladins Only Paladin Club.

2019-12-10.name: Molten Breath
2019-12-10.text: [x]Deal $5 damage to a\nminion. If you're holding\na Dragon, gain 5 Armor.
2019-12-10.flavor: Pizza so hot it burns OTHER PEOPLE’S MOUTHS.

2019-12-10.name: Nozdormu the Timeless
2019-12-10.text: Battlecry: Set each player to 10 Mana Crystals.
2019-12-10.flavor: Time is mana!

2019-12-10.name: Scion of Ruin
2019-12-10.text: Rush. Battlecry: If you've Invoked twice, summon 2_copies of this.
2019-12-10.flavor: Ruined! RUINED!

2019-12-10.name: Squallhunter
2019-12-10.text: Spell Damage +2\nOverload: (2)
2019-12-10.flavor: "Oh, the weather outside is frightful… But Squallhunter's so delightful!\n \nAnd since we've gone down this road--overload, overload, overload!"

2019-12-10.name: Troll Batrider
2019-12-10.text: Battlecry: Deal 3 damage to a random enemy minion.
2019-12-10.flavor: "Quiet! The bat can't hear where he's goin'!"

2019-12-10.name: Umbral Skulker
2019-12-10.text: [x]Battlecry: If you've Invoked\ntwice, add 3 Coins to\nyour hand.
2019-12-10.flavor: "Three gold?! Do you have any idea how long this quest chain was?"

2019-12-10.name: Veiled Worshipper
2019-12-10.text: [x]Battlecry: If you've Invoked\ntwice, draw 3 cards.
2019-12-10.flavor: If you’re not wearing your regulation cultist clothing, how will Galakrond know to devour you last?

2019-12-10.name: Wing Commander
2019-12-10.text: Has +2 Attack for each Dragon in your hand.
2019-12-10.flavor: "Flap! Flap! FLAP!"

2019-12-10.name: Zul'Drak Ritualist
2019-12-10.text: [x]Taunt Battlecry: Summon three random 1-Cost minions for your opponent.
2019-12-10.flavor: Generosity is a core value in cult culture.

2019-12-10.name: Aeroponics
2019-12-10.text: Draw 2 cards.\nCosts (2) less for each Treant you control.
2019-12-10.flavor: Good seeds can go far.

2019-12-10.name: Amber Watcher
2019-12-10.text: Battlecry: Restore #8_Health.
2019-12-10.flavor: Healing really resin-ates with him.

2019-12-10.name: Bandersmosh
2019-12-10.text: [x]Each turn this is in your hand, transform it into a 5/5 copy of a random Legendary minion.
2019-12-10.flavor: The Shudderwock finds him particularly frumious.

2019-12-10.name: Big Ol' Whelp
2019-12-10.text: Battlecry: Draw a card.
2019-12-10.flavor: A chonker, a real absolute unit.

2019-12-10.name: Chromatic Egg
2019-12-10.text: [x]Battlecry: Secretly Discover\na Dragon to hatch into.\nDeathrattle: Hatch!
2019-12-10.flavor: Nefarian was known for creating two things: horrible monsters and excellent breakfasts.

2019-12-10.name: Chronobreaker
2019-12-10.text: [x]Deathrattle: If you're holding\na Dragon, deal 3 damage\nto all enemy minions.
2019-12-10.flavor: If he asks to borrow your watch, just say no.

2019-12-10.name: Cobalt Spellkin
2019-12-10.text: Battlecry: Add two 1-Cost spells from your class to_your hand.
2019-12-10.flavor: Spews more spells than a sleep-talking wizard.

2019-12-10.name: Crazed Netherwing
2019-12-10.text: Battlecry: If you're holding\na Dragon, deal 3 damage to all other characters.
2019-12-10.flavor: Always tail swipes left.

2019-12-10.name: Cumulo-Maximus
2019-12-10.text: Battlecry: If you have Overloaded Mana Crystals, deal 5 damage.
2019-12-10.flavor: "Are your clouds not entertained?!"

2019-12-10.name: Dragon's Pack
2019-12-10.text: Summon two 2/3 Spirit Wolves with Taunt. If you've Invoked twice, give them +2/+2.
2019-12-10.flavor: Each dragon's pack is guaranteed to have at least one rare.

2019-12-10.name: Faceless Corruptor
2019-12-10.text: [x]Rush. Battlecry: Transform\none of your minions into\na copy of this.
2019-12-10.flavor: What does Madame Lazul have against faces?!

2019-12-10.name: Kobold Stickyfinger
2019-12-10.text: Battlecry: Steal your opponent's weapon.
2019-12-10.flavor: He no take candle. He take sword.

2019-12-10.name: Malygos, Aspect of Magic
2019-12-10.text: [x]Battlecry: If you're holding\na Dragon, Discover an\n upgraded Mage spell.
2019-12-10.flavor: It's official. We can say Malygeese.

2019-12-10.name: Necrium Apothecary
2019-12-10.text: Combo: Draw a Deathrattle minion from your deck and gain its Deathrattle.
2019-12-10.flavor: Necrium: Get the afterlife without the aftertaste!

2019-12-10.name: Platebreaker
2019-12-10.text: Battlecry: Destroy your opponent's Armor.
2019-12-10.flavor: Worst. Dinner guest. Ever.

2019-12-10.name: Rolling Fireball
2019-12-10.text: Deal $8 damage to a minion. Any excess damage continues to\nthe left or right.
2019-12-10.flavor: Why don't they ever run perpendicular?

2019-12-10.name: Shield of Galakrond
2019-12-10.text: Taunt\nBattlecry: Invoke Galakrond.
2019-12-10.flavor: Realistically, she's the shield for Galakrond's big toe.

2019-12-10.name: Skyfin
2019-12-10.text: Battlecry: If you're holding a Dragon, summon 2 random Murlocs.
2019-12-10.flavor: "Do you want to be a murloc or a dragon?" \n\n"Yes."

2019-12-10.name: Stowaway
2019-12-10.text: [x]Battlecry: If there are cards\nin your deck that didn't start\nthere, draw 2 of them.
2019-12-10.flavor: Cut him a break. Even economy class tickets are pretty expensive these days.

2019-12-10.name: Tentacled Menace
2019-12-10.text: Battlecry: Each player draws a card. Swap their_Costs.
2019-12-10.flavor: He calls this one the "Calamari Special."

2019-12-10.name: Time Rip
2019-12-10.text: Destroy a minion.\nInvoke Galakrond.
2019-12-10.flavor: "It's time. R.I.P."

2019-12-10.name: Waxadred
2019-12-10.text: [x]Deathrattle: Shuffle a Candle into your deck that resummons Waxadred when drawn.
2019-12-10.flavor: Waxadred the dragon fought for his king, frolicking through the fields melting everything!

2019-12-10.name: Abyssal Summoner
2019-12-10.text: [x]Battlecry: Summon a\nDemon with Taunt and stats\nequal to your hand size.
2019-12-10.flavor: But gnomes have tiny hands...

2019-12-10.name: Camouflaged Dirigible
2019-12-10.text: Battlecry: Give your other Mechs Stealth until your_next turn.
2019-12-10.flavor: "What does that cloud look like to you?" \n\n"Trouble."

2019-12-10.name: Candle Breath
2019-12-10.text: Draw 3 cards. Costs (3)_less while you're holding a Dragon.
2019-12-10.flavor: "And Waxadred shall light their fires, with roaring breath hotter than pyres!\n \nCome before him, scamp and vandal, pledge your faith and lift your candle!"

2019-12-10.name: Corrupt Elementalist
2019-12-10.text: Battlecry: Invoke Galakrond twice.
2019-12-10.flavor: Her element is "Horns."

2019-12-10.name: Dragoncaster
2019-12-10.text: Battlecry: If you're holding a Dragon, your next spell this turn costs (0).
2019-12-10.flavor: It’s challenging to perform magic on dragonback. It’s so easy to drop the rabbit.

2019-12-10.name: Emerald Explorer
2019-12-10.text: Taunt\nBattlecry: Discover a Dragon.
2019-12-10.flavor: Make it a double dragon!

2019-12-10.name: Evasive Wyrm
2019-12-10.text: Divine Shield. Rush.\nCan't be targeted by spells or Hero Powers.
2019-12-10.flavor: Deftly dodges spells like a real wiggle wyrm.

2019-12-10.name: Flik Skyshiv
2019-12-10.text: [x]Battlecry: Destroy a\nminion and all copies of it\n(wherever they are).
2019-12-10.flavor: Junior explorers scan the night sky in fear of her candle’s flame!

2019-12-10.name: Gyrocopter
2019-12-10.text: Rush\nWindfury
2019-12-10.flavor: The hula doll is still absolutely required.

2019-12-10.name: Kronx Dragonhoof
2019-12-10.text: [x]Battlecry: Draw Galakrond.\nIf you're already Galakrond,\nunleash a Devastation.
2019-12-10.flavor: The only one who knows how to properly prepare Galakrond's coffee.

2019-12-10.name: Nithogg
2019-12-10.text: [x]Battlecry: Summon two 0/3 Eggs. Next turn they hatch into 4/4 Drakes with Rush.
2019-12-10.flavor: Not to be confused with Nithogger.

2019-12-10.name: Utgarde Grapplesniper
2019-12-10.text: Battlecry: Both players draw a card. If it's a Dragon, summon it.
2019-12-10.flavor: Note: The dragon may be a little cranky upon arrival.

2019-12-10.name: Veranus
2019-12-10.text: Battlecry: Change the Health of all enemy minions to 1.
2019-12-10.flavor: As an empty nester, she just misses her little ones.

2019-12-10.name: Evasive Drakonid
2019-12-10.text: Taunt\nCan't be targeted by spells or Hero Powers.
2019-12-10.flavor: Doesn't respond to spells, hero powers, calls, or text messages.

2019-12-10.name: Galakrond, the Nightmare
2019-12-10.text: [x]Battlecry: Draw 1 card.\nIt costs (0).\n(@)
2019-12-10.flavor: The enormous creature unfurled terrifying claws dripping with poisonous ichor. King Togwaggle was pleased, but inwardly disappointed the great Nightmare refused to wear the candle.

2019-12-10.name: Galakrond, the Tempest
2019-12-10.text: [x]Battlecry: Summon two\n2/2 Storms with Rush.\n(@)
2019-12-10.flavor: Hagatha cried out over the winds: "Truly, you are as powerful as the Maelstrom!" To which the Tempest answered: "I AM THE MAELSTROM."

2019-12-10.name: Galakrond, the Unbreakable
2019-12-10.text: [x]Battlecry: Draw 1 minion.\nGive it +4/+4.\n(@)
2019-12-10.flavor: The ground quaked beneath the behemoth as Dr. Boom continued: "…with over 400 TONS of solid Storm Silver plate." Then he beeped a small remote. "And luxury spikes!"

2019-12-10.name: Galakrond, the Unspeakable
2019-12-10.text: [x]Battlecry: Destroy 1\nrandom enemy minion.\n(@)
2019-12-10.flavor: Lazul called Galakrond’s name, her voice echoed by whispers from the deep. Both of Galakrond’s eyes opened… and then other eyes opened, as well.

2019-12-10.name: Galakrond, the Wretched
2019-12-10.text: [x]Battlecry: Summon\n1 random Demon.\n(@)
2019-12-10.flavor: Fel-flames slowly writhed around the skeleton, until the great bones knit themselves together into a demonic monstrosity. Rafaam shielded his face from the heat but could not hide his grin.

2019-12-10.name: Goru the Mightree
2019-12-10.text: [x]Taunt Battlecry: For the rest of the game, your Treants have +1/+1.
2019-12-10.flavor: He's untreefeated.

2019-12-10.name: Lightforged Crusader
2019-12-10.text: [x]Battlecry: If your deck has no Neutral cards, add 5 random Paladin cards to your hand.
2019-12-10.flavor: Self-appointed president of the Paladins Only Paladin Club.

2019-12-10.name: Shu'ma
2019-12-10.text: At the end of your turn,\nfill your board with 1/1_Tentacles.
2019-12-10.flavor: How to tell your mother to go away.

2019-12-10.name: Valdris Felgorge
2019-12-10.text: Battlecry: Increase your maximum hand size to 12. Draw 4 cards.
2019-12-10.flavor: I don't mean to pry, but you don't by chance happen to have six fingers on both of your hands?

2019-12-10.name: Deathwing, Mad Aspect
2019-12-10.text: Battlecry: Attack ALL\nother minions.
2019-12-10.flavor: Bite that one, bite that other one, claw this one, swallow that one whole....

2019-12-10.name: Mana Giant
2019-12-10.text:
[x]Costs (1) less for each
card you've played this
game that didn't start
in your deck.
2019-12-10.flavor: Spell more and save more with a GIANT discount!

2019-12-10.name: Murozond the Infinite
2019-12-10.text: Battlecry: Play all cards your opponent played last_turn.
2019-12-10.flavor: "Well, I'm glad YOU knew what I should be doing this turn."

2019-12-10.name: Twin Tyrant
2019-12-10.text: Battlecry: Deal 4 damage to two random enemy minions.
2019-12-10.flavor: They can never agree on whether it's too hot or too cold.

2019-12-10.name: Zzeraku the Warped
2019-12-10.text: [x]Whenever your hero\ntakes damage, summon\na 6/6 Nether Drake.
2019-12-10.flavor: The extra Z is for "zesty."

2019-12-10.name: Dragonqueen Alexstrasza
2019-12-10.text: [x]Battlecry: If your deck has no duplicates, add 2 other random Dragons to your hand. They cost (0).
2019-12-10.flavor: Givin' lives and takin' names.

2019-12-10.name: Sathrovarr
2019-12-10.text: Battlecry: Choose a friendly minion. Add a copy of it to_your hand, deck, and battlefield.
2019-12-10.flavor: Just wait until you also find a copy in your pocket. And your desk! And your FRIDGE!!

2019-12-10.name: Ysera, Unleashed
2019-12-10.text: [x]Battlecry: Shuffle 7 Dream Portals into your deck. When drawn, summon a random Dragon.
2019-12-10.flavor: Releash the Dragon!

2020-01-21.name: Boom Squad
2020-01-21.text: Discover a Lackey, Mech, or Dragon.
2020-01-21.flavor: Discover the meaning of squad goals.

2020-01-21.name: Cleric of Scales
2020-01-21.text: Battlecry: If you're holding a Dragon, Discover a spell from your deck.
2020-01-21.flavor: If she can't find a spell, it's a clerical error.

2020-01-21.name: Fiendish Servant
2020-01-21.text: [x]Deathrattle: Give this\nminion's Attack to a random\nfriendly minion.
2020-01-21.flavor: Putting the "r" in fiend.

2020-01-21.name: Risky Skipper
2020-01-21.text: After you play a minion, deal 1 damage to all_minions.
2020-01-21.flavor: Sworn enemy of the Safety Matey.

2020-01-21.name: Air Raid
2020-01-21.text: Twinspell\nSummon two 1/1 Silver_Hand Recruits with Taunt.
2020-01-21.flavor: It's difficult to get an air raid together. You have to get twenty-five people, and they all want to play a paladin!

2020-01-21.name: Explosive Evolution
2020-01-21.text: Transform a minion into a random one that costs (3) more.
2020-01-21.flavor: Let's give a big hand for goblin experimentation!

2020-01-21.name: Fresh Scent
2020-01-21.text: Twinspell\nGive a Beast +2/+2.
2020-01-21.flavor: *Sniff, sniff* Elite troops... *sniff, sniff* ...armed to the teeth and... *sniff, sniff* ...BAAACON!

2020-01-21.name: Licensed Adventurer
2020-01-21.text: [x]Battlecry: If you control\na Quest, add a Coin\nto your hand.
2020-01-21.flavor: "Just point me in the vague direction of the things you want smashed, and you got yourself a deal!"

2020-01-21.name: Rising Winds
2020-01-21.text: Twinspell\nChoose One - Draw a card; or Summon a 3/2_Eagle.
2020-01-21.flavor: Do not talk to me or my chick ever again.

2020-01-21.name: Shotbot
2020-01-21.text: Reborn
2020-01-21.flavor: Impact detected. Assuming hero pose.

2020-01-21.name: Skyvateer
2020-01-21.text: Stealth\nDeathrattle: Draw a card.
2020-01-21.flavor: When you go without fruits in an airship, you get a nasty case of skyvy.

2020-01-21.name: Steel Beetle
2020-01-21.text: Battlecry: If you're holding a spell that costs (5) or more, gain 5 Armor.
2020-01-21.flavor: Steel you can trust—fashioned from the husk of an over-sized creepy-crawly.

2020-01-21.name: Twisted Knowledge
2020-01-21.text: Discover 2 Warlock cards.
2020-01-21.flavor: People eat eight spiders in their sleep per year. Centaurs have two rib cages. Dwarves are just counterfeit titans.

2020-01-21.name: Waxmancy
2020-01-21.text: Discover a Battlecry minion. Reduce its Cost by (2).
2020-01-21.flavor: The waxmancer works with flame and form, giving shape to figures warm. \n\nSome think he's a crazy creeper, but crafting minions is simply cheaper.

2020-01-21.name: Arcane Amplifier
2020-01-21.text: Your Hero Power deals 2_extra damage.
2020-01-21.flavor: Not on good terms with warlocks.

2020-01-21.name: Bomb Wrangler
2020-01-21.text: Whenever this minion takes damage, summon a_1/1 Boom Bot.
2020-01-21.flavor: Bomb Wranglers tend to have short fuses and even shorter lifespans.

2020-01-21.name: Chaos Gazer
2020-01-21.text: [x]Battlecry: Corrupt a playable card in your opponent's hand. They have 1 turn to play it!
2020-01-21.flavor: No matter the game rules, it's always playing Go Fish.

2020-01-21.name: Chopshop Copter
2020-01-21.text: After a friendly Mech dies, add a random Mech to your hand.
2020-01-21.flavor: Invention is the mother of entropy.

2020-01-21.name: Dark Prophecy
2020-01-21.text: Discover a 2-Cost minion. Summon it and give it +3 Health.
2020-01-21.flavor: It's always a dark prophecy with Madame Lazul. Where's my happy, fluffy prophecy?!

2020-01-21.name: Skydiving Instructor
2020-01-21.text: [x]Battlecry: Summon a\n1-Cost minion from\nyour deck.
2020-01-21.flavor: "Is it dangerous?"\n \n"For me? Not at all. Now jump!"

2020-01-21.name: Escaped Manasaber
2020-01-21.text: [x]Stealth Whenever this attacks, gain 1 Mana Crystal this turn only.
2020-01-21.flavor: Captive manasabers don't behave much better--they're always scratching your furniture and coughing up mana balls.

2020-01-21.name: Frenzied Felwing
2020-01-21.text: Costs (1) less for each damage dealt to your opponent this turn.
2020-01-21.flavor: Not to be confused with the "friendsy” felwing.

2020-01-21.name: Grand Lackey Erkh
2020-01-21.text: After you play a Lackey, add a Lackey to your hand.
2020-01-21.flavor: Esteemed leader of Rafaam's Inhuman Resources department.

2020-01-21.name: Sky Gen'ral Kragg
2020-01-21.text: [x]Taunt Battlecry: If you've played a Quest this game, summon a 4/2 Parrot with Rush.
2020-01-21.flavor: He's gunning for Sky Adm'ral.

2020-01-21.name: The Fist of Ra-den
2020-01-21.text: [x]After you cast a spell, summon a Legendary minion of that Cost. Lose 1 Durability.
2020-01-21.flavor: The mighty Ra-den was known as the Keeper of Storms. Unfortunately, he could not keep his fist.

2020-01-21.name: Boompistol Bully
2020-01-21.text: Battlecry: Enemy Battlecry_cards cost (5)_more next turn.
2020-01-21.flavor: Preventing insults with injuries.

2020-01-21.name: Hailbringer
2020-01-21.text: [x]Battlecry: Summon two 1/1\nIce Shards that Freeze.
2020-01-21.flavor: Knows every way to greet someone.

2020-01-21.name: Rotnest Drake
2020-01-21.text: [x]Battlecry: If you're holding\na Dragon, destroy a random\nenemy minion.
2020-01-21.flavor: Clean your room, or I'm taking your favorite minion away!

2020-01-21.name: Scalelord
2020-01-21.text: Battlecry: Give your Murlocs Divine Shield.
2020-01-21.flavor: It's about what they have in common, not what makes them different.

2020-01-21.name: Shadow Sculptor
2020-01-21.text: Combo: Draw a card for each card you've played this turn.
2020-01-21.flavor: Carving out new territory in the realm of shadow puppetry.

2020-01-21.name: Aeon Reaver
2020-01-21.text: Battlecry: Deal damage to_a minion equal to its_Attack.
2020-01-21.flavor: Ripping centuries asunder helps him manage his busy schedule.

2020-01-21.name: Animated Avalanche
2020-01-21.text: [x]Battlecry: If you played\nan Elemental last turn,\nsummon a copy of this.
2020-01-21.flavor: Always sliding down mountains because it can't stop talking with its hands.

2020-01-21.name: Winged Guardian
2020-01-21.text: Taunt, Reborn\nCan't be targeted by spells or Hero Powers.
2020-01-21.flavor: Take these broken wings, be reborn, and learn to fly again.

2020-01-21.name: Eye of the Storm
2020-01-21.text: Summon three 5/6 Elementals with Taunt. Overload: (3)
2020-01-21.flavor: If that's the eye, I would hate to see the rest of the storm.

2020-01-21.name: The Amazing Reno
2020-01-21.text: Battlecry: Make all minions disappear. *Poof!*
2020-01-21.flavor: "Reno!" "Please address me by my proper title." " Amazing Reno..."
